attribute.description:
Defines the minimum allowed 6-bit RSRP level for E-UTRAN TDD.
0 Minimum allowed RPSP level for E-UTRAN TDD is not considered for fast return to LTE. 1 -140 dBm 2 -138 dBm . . . 17 -108 dBm 18 -106 dBm 19 -105 dBm 20 -104 dBm . . . 44 -80 dBm 45 -79 dBm 46 -78 dBm 47 -76 dBm . . . 61 -48 dBm 62 -46 dBm 63 -44 dBm
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLRLC: ETDDRSRPLEVEMR

attribute.name: eFddRepOff
attribute.description:
FDD 6-bit measurement reporting offset for E-UTRAN RSRP.
Changes the offset for RSRP of E-UTRAN FDD, used by MSs, when prioritizing the cells for measurement reporting, in case of 6-bit measurement reporting with enhanced measurement reports.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLESC: EFDDREPOFF
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: eTddRepOff
attribute.description:
TDD 6-bit measurement reporting offset for E-UTRAN RSRP.
Changes the offset for RSRP of E-UTRAN TDD, used by MSs when prioritizing the cells for measurement reporting in case of 6-bit measurement reporting with enhanced measurement reports.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLESC: ETDDREPOFF
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: eFddRepThr
attribute.description:
FDD 6-bit reporting threshold for E-UTRAN RSRP.
Changes the threshold for RSRP measurement reporting of E-UTRAN FDD, used by MSs in case of 6-bit measurement reporting with enhanced measurement reports. MSs may only report those E-UTRAN FDD cells, for which the measured value of RSRP is equal to or higher than value this attribute.
0 E-UTRAN FDD reporting threshold is not considered for measurement reporting.
1 -130 dBm
2 -118 dBm
3 -106 dBm
4 -100 dBm
5 -94 dBm
6 -88 dBm
7 Never report E-UTRAN FDD cells
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLESC: EFDDREPTHR
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: eTddRepThr
attribute.description:
TDD reporting threshold for E-UTRAN RSRP.
Changes the threshold for RSRP measurement reporting of E-UTRAN TDD, used by MSs in case of 6-bit measurement reporting with enhanced measurement reports. MSs may only report those E-UTRAN TDD cells, for which the measured value of RSRP is equal to or higher than value of this attribute.
0 E-UTRAN TDD reporting threshold is not considered for measurement reporting.
1 -130 dBm
2 -118 dBm
3 -106 dBm
4 -100 dBm
5 -94 dBm
6 -88 dBm
7 Never report E-UTRAN TDD cells
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLESC: ETDDREPTHR
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: fddRepOff
attribute.description:
Reporting offset for UTRAN FDD.
Changes the reporting offset for CPICH Ec/No of UTRAN FDD, used by MSs when prioritizing the cells for measurement reporting.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSUC: FDDREPOFF

attribute.name: fddRepThr
attribute.description:
Reporting threshold for UTRAN FDD.
Changes the reporting threshold for CPICH Ec/No measurement reporting of UTRAN FDD. MSs may report only those UTRAN FDD cells for which the measured value of CPICH Ec/No is equal to or higher than value of this attribute.
0 FDD reporting threshold is not considered for measurement reporting.
1 -21.5 dB
2 -18.5 dB
3 -15.5 dB
4 -12.5 dB
5 -9.5 dB
6 -6.5 dB
7 Never report UTRAN FDD cells.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSUC: FDDREPTHR

attribute.name: umfiIdleList
attribute.description:
Holds the UTRAN FDD measurement frequency information defined for idle list.
Expressed as mfddarfcn-mscrcode-diversity where:
mfddarfcn ARFCN for the UTRAN FDD cell Numeral 0 - 16383
mscrcode Scrambling code Numeral 0 - 511
diversity Diversity, with following values: DIV Diversity is applied for the UTRAN FDD cell. NODIV Diversity is not applied for the UTRAN FDD cell.
A maximum number of 32 ARFCNs for the UTRAN FDD cell can be defined in idle UTRAN measurement frequency list in the cell. Each ARFCN may be connected to one or several scrambling codes. For a specific combination of ARFCN and scrambling code only one value of information unit diversity, DIV or NODIV, can be defined in the UTRAN measurement frequency list.
The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLUMC: UMFI
attribute.dependencies: When RAT priority based cell reselection, set by the attribute prioCr, is active in a cell, then it is not allowed to remove UTRAN FDD ARFCN with RAT priority defined, if there is no other E-UTRAN or UTRAN FDD ARFCN with RAT priority defined in the cell.
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: umfiActiveList
attribute.description:
Holds the UTRAN FDD measurement frequency information defined for active list.
Expressed as mfddarfcn-mscrcode-diversity where:
mfddarfcn ARFCN for the UTRAN FDD cell Numeral 0 - 16383
mscrcode Scrambling code Numeral 0 - 511
diversity Diversity, with following values: DIV Diversity is applied for the UTRAN FDD cell. NODIV Diversity is not applied for the UTRAN FDD cell.
A maximum number of 32 ARFCNs for the UTRAN FDD cell can be defined in active UTRAN measurement frequency list in the cell. Each ARFCN may be connected to one or several scrambling codes. For a specific combination of ARFCN and scrambling code only one value of information unit diversity, DIV or NODIV, can be defined in the UTRAN measurement frequency list.
The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLUMC: UMFI
attribute.dependencies: When RAT priority based cell reselection, set by the attribute prioCr, is active in a cell, then it is not allowed to remove UTRAN FDD ARFCN with RAT priority defined, if there is no other E-UTRAN or UTRAN FDD ARFCN with RAT priority defined in the cell.
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: tmfiIdleList
attribute.description:
Holds the UTRAN TDD measurement frequency information defined for idle list.
Expressed as mtddarfcn-cellparam-tstd-sctd, where:
mtddarfcn ARFCN for the UTRAN TDD cell Numeral 0 - 16383
cellparam Cell parameter Represents code group, scrambling code, long basic midamble code and short basic midamble code of the UTRAN TDD cell Numeral 0 - 127
tstd TSTD indicator, with following values: DIV TSTD is applied in the UTRAN TDD cell. NODIV TSTD is not applied in the UTRAN TDD cell.
sctd SCTD indicator, with following values: DIV SCTD is applied in the UTRAN TDD cell. NODIV SCTD is not applied in the UTRAN TDD cell.
A maximum number of 8 ARFCNs for the UTRAN TDD cell can be defined in the idle UTRAN measurement frequency list in the cell. Each ARFCN may be connected to only one combination of information units cellparam, tscd, and sctd.
The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLUMC: TMFI
attribute.dependencies: When RAT priority based cell reselection, set by the attribute prioCr, is active in a cell, then it is not allowed to remove UTRAN TDD ARFCN with RAT priority defined, if there is no other E-UTRAN or UTRAN TDD ARFCN with RAT priority defined in the cell.
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: tmfiActiveList
attribute.description:
Holds the UTRAN TDD measurement frequency information defined for active list.
Expressed as mtddarfcn-cellparam-tstd-sctd, where:
mtddarfcn ARFCN for the UTRAN TDD cell Numeral 0 - 16383
cellparam Cell parameter Represents code group, scrambling code, long basic midamble code and short basic midamble code of the UTRAN TDD cell Numeral 0 - 127
tstd TSTD indicator, with following values: DIV TSTD is applied in the UTRAN TDD cell. NODIV TSTD is not applied in the UTRAN TDD cell.
sctd SCTD indicator, with following values: DIV SCTD is applied in the UTRAN TDD cell. NODIV SCTD is not applied in the UTRAN TDD cell.
Each ARFCN may be connected to one or several values of information unit cellparam. For a specific combination of mtddarfcn and cellparam only one value of information unit tstd, DIV or NODIV, and only one value of information unit sctd, DIV or NODIV, can be defined in the active UTRAN measurement frequency list.
A maximum number of 32 ARFCNs for the UTRAN TDD cell can be defined in the active UTRAN measurement frequency list in the cell.
The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLUMC: TMFI
attribute.dependencies: When RAT priority based cell reselection, set by the attribute prioCr, is active in a cell, then it is not allowed to remove UTRAN TDD ARFCN with RAT priority defined, if there is no other E-UTRAN or UTRAN TDD ARFCN with RAT priority defined in the cell.
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

class.name: Gprs
class.description:
This MOC describes GPRS cell data and GPRS resource data.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='sumOfmaxSBlkAndtrafBlkNotExceeds11' test="(((@maxSBlk + @trafBlk) lt 12))">The sum of values of the attributes maxSBlk and trafBlk cannot exceed 11 in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='sumOfmaxSBlkAndtrafBlkNotExceeds11' test="(((@maxSBlk + @trafBlk) lt 12))">The sum of values of the attributes maxSBlk and trafBlk cannot exceed 11 in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: gprsId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: chCsDl
attribute.description:
Sets GPRS Coding Scheme that is used downlink.
Depends on RLGSC: CHCSDL
attribute.dependencies: To change attribute, optional feature GPRS must be supported. If the attribute LinkQualityControl.la is set to ON, this attribute is used as the initial CS at the beginning of a TBF. If the attribute LinkQualityControl.la is set to OFF, this attribute is used as the static CS.

attribute.name: flexHighGprs
attribute.description:
Abis resource allocation handling for EGPRS capable channels.
Sets Abis resource allocation on EGPRS capable channels with flexibly allocated Abis path for non EGPRS capable MSs.
0 64k resources are not allocated. 1 64k resources are allocated when available.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLGSC: FLEXHIGHGPRS

attribute.name: gprsSupState
attribute.description:
State of support for GPRS in the cell.
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLGSI RLGSE
attribute.dependencies:
The GeranCell.cgi must be defined before activating GPRS support.
If any PLMN relation to NSE is defined in the BSC, before activation of GPRS in a non-shared active cell, the PLMN defined in this cell must have defined relation to an NSE. It means the MCC and MNC of CGI of this cell must be the same as PLMN connected to an NSE.
If any PLMN relation to NSE is defined in the BSC, before activation of GPRS in a non-shared active cell, all PLMNs defined in any existing active non-shared cells of this BSC, with GPRS support activated, must have defined relations to NSEs. It means the MCC and MNC of CGI of any existing active non-shared cells of this BSC, with GPRS support activated, must be the same as PLMNs connected to NSEs.
If any PLMN relation to NSE is defined in the BSC, before activation of GPRS in a non-shared active cell, all active NSEs must have defined PLMN relations.
attribute.disturbances: If the attribute GeranCell.state is set to ACTIVE, change of this attribute to NO starts a forced release of all packet connections and removal of all PDCHs in the cell.

attribute.name: pskOnBcch
attribute.description:
8-PSK modulation on Broadcast BCCH frequency allowed.
Indicates if 8-PSK modulation and 16/32QAM are allowed downlink for E-PDCHs and E2A-PDCHs on the BCCH frequency.
DISABLED GMSK is always used on the BCCH frequency. ENABLED 8-PSK may be used on the BCCH frequency.
Depends on RLGSC: PSKONBCCH
attribute.sideEffects: The use of 8-PSK and 16/32-QAM on the BCCH frequency affects the MS measurements of cell signal strength.

attribute.name: scAlloc
attribute.description:
GPRS restrictions for a certain subcell.
Depends on RLGSC: SCALLOC
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality Quality based Timeslot Allocation, set by attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.qtaStatus is active in the cell, change of this attribute has no impact on BSC behavior.
attribute.precondition: A subcell structure must be defined.

attribute.name: rtti
attribute.description:
State of functionality Reduced transmission time interval in the cell.
The availability of attribute values commercial agreements.
Depends on RLGSC: RTTI

attribute.name: ian
attribute.description:
Improved Acknowledge/Negative Acknowledge status in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements relating to optional feature Reduced Latency.
Depends on RLGSC: IAN

attribute.name: cbchD
attribute.description:
Indicates if the the CBCH description is distributed on the PBCCH frequency.
To set this attribute to Yes, CBCH channel must be defined and activated in the system.
Depends on RLPDC: CBCHD
attribute.dependencies: A PBCCH has to be allocated in the cell in order to apply the functionality of this attribute.
attribute.precondition: The optional feature GPRS must be available in the system.

attribute.name: prachBlk
attribute.description:
Reserves a number of PRACH radio blocks within a multiframe.
Depends on RLPDC: PRACHBLK
attribute.dependencies: A PBCCH has to be allocated in the cell in order to apply the functionality of this attribute.
attribute.precondition: The optional feature GPRS must be available in the system.

attribute.name: maxSBlk
attribute.description:
Defines the maximum number of PBCCH radio blocks to be used within a multiframe.
Depends on RLPDC: MAXSBLK
attribute.dependencies: The sum of maxSBlk and trafBlk cannot exceed 14. A PBCCH has to be allocated in the cell in order to apply the functionality of this attribute.
attribute.precondition: The optional feature GPRS must be available in the system.

attribute.name: maxSMsg
attribute.description:
Describes the maximum number of PSI messages that preferably are scheduled on one PBCCH block.
Depends on RLPDC: MAXSMSG
attribute.dependencies: A PBCCH has to be allocated in the cell in order to apply the functionality of this attribute.
attribute.precondition: The optional feature GPRS must be available in the system.

attribute.name: trafBlk
attribute.description:
The number of radio blocks within a multiframe where neither paging nor PSI appears. This attribute corresponds to BS_PAG_BLKS_RES in PSI 1.
Depends on RLPDC: TRAFBLK
attribute.dependencies: The sum of maxSBlk and trafBlk cannot exceed 14. A PBCCH has to be allocated in the cell in order to apply the functionality of this attribute.
attribute.precondition: The optional feature GPRS must be available in the system.

class.name: PowerSavings
class.description:
Contains configuration data for the functionality Power Savings in the cell.
This class can also contain instances of PwsDisablingPeriod class, which represent data for disabling periods per day of the week.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='checkMinReqTchForBtsPS' test='(@btsPsWantedState = 0) or (@minReqTch le @btsPsHyst)'>The value of the attribute minReqTch cannot exceed value of the attribute btsPsHyst in <name path="."/></assert> <assert id='checkMinReqTchForMcpaPS' test='(@mcpaPsWantedState = 0) or (@minReqTch le @mcpaPsHyst)'>The value of the attribute minReqTch cannot exceed value of the attribute mcpaPsHyst in <name path="."/></assert> <assert id='btsPsOrMcpaPsIsOff' test='(@mcpaPsWantedState=0 or @btsPsWantedState=0)'>Attributes btsPsWantedState and mcpaPsWantedState cannot be set to ON at the same time in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='checkMinReqTchForBtsPS' test='(@btsPsWantedState = 0) or (@minReqTch le @btsPsHyst)'>The value of the attribute minReqTch cannot exceed value of the attribute btsPsHyst in <name path="."/></assert> <assert id='checkMinReqTchForMcpaPS' test='(@mcpaPsWantedState = 0) or (@minReqTch le @mcpaPsHyst)'>The value of the attribute minReqTch cannot exceed value of the attribute mcpaPsHyst in <name path="."/></assert> <assert id='btsPsOrMcpaPsIsOff' test='(@mcpaPsWantedState=0 or @btsPsWantedState=0)'>Attributes btsPsWantedState and mcpaPsWantedState cannot be set to ON at the same time in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: powerSavingsId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: btsPsActualState
attribute.description:
Actual state of the functionality BTS Power Savings in the cell.
Depends on DBTSP

attribute.name: btsPsWantedState
attribute.description:
Administrative state of the functionality BTS Power Savings in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVI RLSVE
attribute.dependencies: This attribute cannot be set to ON, if the functionality MCPA Power Savings, set by the attribute mcpaPsWantedState, is active.

attribute.name: minReqTch
attribute.description:
The threshold for minimal number of required idle TCH BPCs in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVC: MINREQTCH
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value cannot exceed the value of attribute btsPsHyst when attribute btsPsWantedState is set to ON. The attribute value cannot exceed the value of attribute mcpaPsHyst when attribute mcpaPsWantedState is set to ON. When GSM Automatic Shared Carrier feature is active in the cell, this attribute can be automatically changed by the BSC.

attribute.name: btsPsHyst
attribute.description:
BTS Power Savings hysteresis.
The attribute value is expressed as the number of idle TCH BPCs.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVC: BTSPSHYST
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value must be equal to or greater than the value of attribute minReqTch when attribute btsPsWantedState is ON. When GSM Automatic Shared Carrier feature is active in the cell, this attribute can be automatically changed by the BSC.

attribute.name: bcchPs
attribute.description:
Defines the type of BCCH Power Savings state in the cell.
The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVI RLSVE

attribute.name: bcchPsType
attribute.description:
The type of BCCH Power Savings in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVC: BCCHPSTYPE

attribute.name: preCcch
attribute.description:
Indicates if BCCH Power Savings is allowed for TNs preceding TN0 and TNs with CCCH.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVC: PRECCCH

attribute.name: pro
attribute.description:
BCCH Power Savings Power Reduction Offset.
Changes the maximum down regulation for the BCCH Power Savings Power Control and fixed down regulation for the BCCH Power Savings Power Reduction, regardless of the modulation used.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVC: PRO
attribute.dependencies: Change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior, if the functionality Reduced BCCH Spectrum, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.rBcchSp, is ACTIVE in the cell.

attribute.name: mcpaPsActualState
attribute.description:
Actual state of the functionality MCPA Power Savings in the cell.
Depends on DBTSP

attribute.name: mcpaPsWantedState
attribute.description:
Administrative state of the functionality MCPA Power Savings in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVI RLSVE
attribute.dependencies: This attribute cannot be set to ON, if the functionality BTS Power Savings, set by the attribute btsPsWantedState, is active.

attribute.name: mcpaPsHyst
attribute.description:
The hysteresis for MCPA Power Savings.
The attribute value is expressed as the number of idle TCH BPCs.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVC: MCPAPSHYST
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value must be equal to or greater than the value of attribute minReqTch when attribute mcpaPsWantedState is ON. When GSM Automatic Shared Carrier feature is active in the cell, this attribute can be automatically changed by the BSC.

attribute.name: bpcDel
attribute.description:
Changes BPC deletion method when disabling a TRX due to BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVC: BPCDEL

class.name: LchAvailSupervision
class.description:
Contains data for supervision of logical channels availability for the cell.
When a subcell structure is defined, this MO holds configuration attributes for the underlaid subcell and LchAvailSupervision Overlaid MO holds configuration for overlaid subcell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: lchAvailSupervisionId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: sdcchSupervisionConnected
attribute.description:
Supervision of seizure of SDCCH logical channels in the cell.
Depends on RLVLI: CHTYPE=SDCCH RLVLE: CHTYPE=SDCCH
attribute.dependencies: To change this attribute, attribute LchAvailSupervisionBsc.sdcchSupervisionStatus must be set to PASSIVE.

attribute.name: tchSupervisionConnected
attribute.description:
Supervision of seizure of TCH logical channels in the cell.
Depends on RLVLI: CHTYPE=TCH RLVLE: CHTYPE=TCH
attribute.dependencies: To change this attribute, attribute LchAvailSupervisionBsc.tchSupervisionStatus must be set to PASSIVE.

attribute.name: bcchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type BCCH.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=BCCH ACL

attribute.name: bcchLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for for the channel type BCCH.
When BCCH is defined in the UL subcell: - The default value for BCCH in the cell or the UL subcell is equal to 1. - The default value for BCCH in the OL subcell and all other channel types is equal to 0.
When BCCH is defined in the OL subcell: - The default value for BCCH in the cell or the UL subcell is equal to 0. - The default value for BCCH in the OL subcell is equal to 1. - The default value for other channel types is equal to 0.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=BCCH LVA

attribute.name: cbchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type CBCH.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=CBCH ACL

attribute.name: cbchLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for for the channel type CBCH.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=CBCH LVA

attribute.name: sdcchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type SDCCH.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=SDCCH ACL

attribute.name: sdcchLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for for the channel type SDCCH.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=SDCCH LVA
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality Quality based Timeslot Allocation is activated in the cell, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.qtaStatus, the limit value used for the alarm CELL LOGICAL CHANNEL AVAILABILITY SUPERVISION can be lower than the value of the attribute.

attribute.name: tchAmrFrAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 3.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR SPV=3 ACL

attribute.name: tchAmrFrLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 3.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR SPV=3 LVA

attribute.name: tchAmrHrAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH/H with speech version 3.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=HR SPV=3 ACL

attribute.name: tchEfrAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 2.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR SPV=2 ACL

attribute.name: tchEfrLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 2.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR SPV=2 LVA

attribute.name: tchFrAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 1.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR SPV=1 ACL

attribute.name: tchFrLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 1.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR SPV=1 LVA

attribute.name: tchHrAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH/H with speech version 1.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=HR SPV=1 ACL

attribute.name: tchHrLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type TCH/H with speech version 1.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=HR SPV=1 LVA

attribute.name: tchAmrWbAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 5.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCH SPV=5 ACL

attribute.name: tchAmrWbLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 5.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCH SPV=5 LVA

attribute.name: btsPsTchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH when BTS power saving is used.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=BTSPSTCH ACL
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute can be set only when the value of the attribute PowerSavings.mcpaPsWantedState is set to OFF.

attribute.name: tchAmrHrLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type TCH/H with speech version 3.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=HR SPV=3 LVA

attribute.name: btsPsSdcchLva
attribute.description:
LVA for the channel type SDCCH when BTS power saving is used.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=BTSPSDCCH LVA
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute can be set only when the value of the attribute PowerSavings.mcpaPsWantedState is set to OFF. When the functionality Quality based Timeslot Allocation is activated in the cell, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.qtaStatus, the limit value used for the alarm CELL LOGICAL CHANNEL AVAILABILITY SUPERVISION can be lower than the value of the attribute.

attribute.name: btsPsSdcchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type SDCCH when BTS power saving is used.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=BTSPSDCCH ACL
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute can be set only when the value of the attribute PowerSavings.mcpaPsWantedState is set to OFF.

attribute.name: tchBpcAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type BPC with TCHs.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCHBPC ACL

attribute.name: tchBpcLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type BPC with TCHs.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=TCHBPC LVA

attribute.name: btsPsTchLva
attribute.description:
LVA for the channel type TCH when BTS power saving is used.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=BTSPSTCH LVA
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute can be set only when the value of the attribute PowerSavings.mcpaPsWantedState is set to OFF.

attribute.name: btsPsTchBpcAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type BPC with TCHs when BTS power saving is used.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=BTSPSTCHBPC ACL
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute can be set only when the value of the attribute PowerSavings.mcpaPsWantedState is set to OFF.

attribute.name: btsPsTchBpcLva
attribute.description:
LVA for the channel type BPC with TCHs when BTS power saving is used.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=BTSPSTCHBPC LVA
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute can be set only when the value of the attribute PowerSavings.mcpaPsWantedState is set to OFF.

attribute.name: psSdcchLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type SDCCH.
Attribute is valid for BTS power savings and MCPA power savings.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=PSSDCCH LVA
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality Quality based Timeslot Allocation is activated in the cell, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.qtaStatus, the limit value used for the alarm CELL LOGICAL CHANNEL AVAILABILITY SUPERVISION can be lower than the value of the attribute.

attribute.name: psSdcchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type SDCCH.
Attribute is valid for BTS power savings and MCPA power savings.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=PSSDCCH ACL

attribute.name: psTchLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type TCH.
Attribute is valid for BTS power savings and MCPA power savings.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=PSTCH LVA

attribute.name: psTchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH.
Attribute is valid for BTS power savings and MCPA power savings.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=PSTCH ACL

attribute.name: psTchBpcLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type SDCCH.
Attribute is valid for BTS power savings and MCPA power savings.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=PSSDCCH LVA

attribute.name: psTchBpcAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type BPC with TCHs.
Attribute is valid for BTS power savings and MCPA power savings.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=PSTCHBPC ACL

attribute.name: slcaState
attribute.description:
State of the supervision of logical channels availability.
If an alarm is issued for the cell when attribute is set to DEACTIVATED or PERMANENTLY_DEACTIVATED, the alarm is ceased and the supervision is disconnected. When attribute is set to ACTIVATED, no alarm is issued if a cell is in state HALTED. If the cell state is changed to HALTED during the supervision, any earlier given alarm will cease and the supervision of this cell will be passive until the cell becomes ACTIVE again. An alarm is issued if the actual number of logical channels falls below the alarm limit value for a period of time.
Depends on RLSLI RLSLE
attribute.dependencies:
For the cell with a defined subcell structure, the supervision for BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings related thresholds is activated, when the following conditions are fulfilled: -The functionality BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings is activated in the cell, -The functionality Supervision of Logical Channels Availability is activated in both subcells.
For the cell without a defined subcell structure, the supervision for BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings related thresholds is activated, when the following conditions are fulfilled: -The functionality BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings is activated in the cell, -The functionality Supervision of Logical Channels Availability is activated for the cell.
For the cell with a defined subcell structure, the supervision BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings related thresholds is deactivated, when at least one of the following conditions is fulfilled: -The functionality BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings is deactivated in the cell, -The functionality Supervision of Logical Channels Availability is deactivated in at least one subcell.
For the cell without a defined subcell structure, the supervision for BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings related thresholds is deactivated, when at least one of the following conditions is fulfilled: -The functionality BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings is deactivated in the cell, -The functionality Supervision of Logical Channels Availability is deactivated for the cell.
attribute.sideEffects: When a subcell structure is defined for the cell and supervision of logical channels availability is set to PERMANENTLY_DISCONNECTED in at least one subcell, then BTS power savings and MCPA power savings related thresholds are set to their default values. When a subcell structure is not defined and supervision of logical channels availability is set to PERMANENTLY_DISCONNECTED in the cell, then BTS power savings and MCPA power savings related thresholds are set to default values.

attribute.name: ecBcchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type EC-BCCH.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=ECBCCH ACL

attribute.name: ecBcchLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for for the channel type EC-BCCH.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=ECBCCH LVA

class.name: Dtm
class.description:
Contains the data needed for DTM configuration in cell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: allocPref
attribute.description:
Preference at channel allocation. Sets whether the CS part TCH in a DTM connection is allocated with quality considerations or with packing considerations. When quality is chosen, FR TCH is preferred. When packing is chosen, HR TCH is preferred.
Depends on RLDUC: ALLOCPREF
attribute.precondition: The optional feature DTM must be available in the system.

attribute.name: dtmId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: maxLapdm
attribute.description:
Maximum allowed length of signalling messages on main DCCH.
Changes the maximum number of LAPDm frames on which layer 3 can be segmented into and sent on the main DCCH.
Depends on RLDUC: MAXLAPDM
attribute.precondition: The optional feature DTM must be available in the system.

attribute.name: dtmState
attribute.description:
State of the functionality Dual Transfer Mode in the cell.
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDUI RLDUE
attribute.dependencies: Cannot be set to YES, if the attribute GeranCell.xRange is set to YES.

attribute.name: optMsClass
attribute.description:
Optional DTM multislot class 11 support.
Depends on RLDUC: OPTMSCLASS
attribute.precondition: The optional feature DTM must be available in the system.

class.name: CapacityLock
class.description:
Contains capacity and alarm data for the internal GERAN cell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: capacityLockId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: numts
attribute.description:
The number of TS related licenses.
Indicates the licensed capacity use for TS related capacity locks in the cell, expressed as the number of TSs.
Depends on RFCLP

attribute.name: numegprsts
attribute.description:
The number of EGPRS TS related licenses.
Indicates the licensed capacity use for EGPRS TS related capacity locks in the cell, expressed as the number of EGPRS TSs.
Depends on RFCLP

attribute.name: a54Scc
attribute.description:
The number of possible SCCs using A5/4 ciphering in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFCAC: A54SCC
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value can be decreased only if the attribute GeranCell.state is set to HALTED. When Market Adaptation M-286 is activated, the value of the attribute can be decreased when the attribute GeranCell.state is set to ACTIVE.

attribute.name: aFrCscc
attribute.description:
The number of SCCs configured for AMR FR with SPV3 transcoders in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFCAC: AFRCSCC
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value can be decreased only if the attribute GeranCell.state is set to HALTED. When Market Adaptation M-286 is activated, the value of the attribute can be decreased when the attribute GeranCell.state is set to ACTIVE.

attribute.name: aHrCscc
attribute.description:
The number of SCCs configured for AMR HR with SPV3 transcoders in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFCAC: AHRCSCC
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value can be decreased only if the attribute GeranCell.state is set to HALTED. When Market Adaptation M-286 is activated, the value of the attribute can be decreased when the attribute GeranCell.state is set to ACTIVE.

attribute.name: aWbCscc
attribute.description:
The number of SCCs configured for AMR-WB with SPV5 transcoders in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFCAC: AWBCSCC
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value can be decreased only if the attribute GeranCell.state is set to HALTED. When Market Adaptation M-286 is activated, the value of the attribute can be decreased when the attribute GeranCell.state is set to ACTIVE.

attribute.name: efrCscc
attribute.description:
The number of SCCs configured for EFR with SPV2 transcoders in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFCAC: EFRCSCC
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value can be decreased only if the attribute GeranCell.state is set to HALTED. When Market Adaptation M-286 is activated, the value of the attribute can be decreased when the attribute GeranCell.state is set to ACTIVE.

attribute.name: hrCscc
attribute.description:
The number of SCCs configured for HR with SPV1 transcoders in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFCAC: HRCSCC
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value can be decreased only if the attribute GeranCell.state is set to HALTED. When Market Adaptation M-286 is activated, the value of the attribute can be decreased when the attribute GeranCell.state is set to ACTIVE.

attribute.name: vCscc
attribute.description:
The number of SCCs configured for VAMOS in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFCAC: VCSCC
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value can be decreased only if the attribute GeranCell.state is set to HALTED. When Market Adaptation M-286 is activated, the value of the attribute can be decreased when the attribute GeranCell.state is set to ACTIVE.

class.name: DiffChannelAllocPrioProfileBsc
class.description: Contains DCA priority profiles in the BSC.

attribute.name: diffChannelAllocPrioProfileBscId
attribute.description:
Holds destination name of DCA priority profile and is also used when identifying the MO.
Depends on RLPPI: PP RLPPE: PP
attribute.dependencies: The default priority profile can not be modified or deleted. A maximum of 32 priority profiles can exist in addition to the permanent default priority profile.

attribute.name: usedByGeranCellForSdcch
attribute.description:
Contains data from the cells, in which SDCCH is connected to the DCA priority profile.
If a subcell structure is defined for the cell, data for the underlaid subcell is shown in this list.
Depends on RLPRP: PP CHTYPE=SDCCH

attribute.name: usedByOverlaidSubcellForSdcch
attribute.description:
Contains data from the overlaid subcells, in which SDCCH is connected to the DCA priority profile.
Depends on RLPRP: PP CHTYPE=SDCCH

attribute.name: usedByGeranCellForTchFr
attribute.description:
Contains data from the cells, in which TCH/F is connected to the DCA priority profile.
If a subcell structure is defined for the cell, data for the underlaid subcell is shown in this list.
Depends on RLPRP: PP CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR

attribute.name: usedByGeranCellForTchHr
attribute.description:
Contains data from the cells, in which TCH/H is connected to the DCA priority profile.
If a subcell structure is defined for the cell, data for the underlaid subcell is shown in this list.
Depends on RLPRP: PP CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=HR

attribute.name: usedByOverlaidSubcellForTchFr
attribute.description:
Contains data from the overlaid subcells, in which TCH/F is connected to the DCA priority profile.
Depends on RLPRP: PP CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR

attribute.name: usedByOverlaidSubcellForTchHr
attribute.description:
Contains data from the overlaid subcells, in which TCH/H is connected to the DCA priority profile.
Depends on RLPRP: PP CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=HR

attribute.name: templatePP
attribute.description:
Contains the diffChannelAllocPrioProfileBscId of an existing priority profile.
This attribute applies only at MO creation. It is used if you need to copy the data of some existing priority profile, otherwise priority profile will be defined with the same data as the permanent default priority profile.
Depends on RLPPI: PP1

attribute.name: bscProfileIndividual
attribute.description: Internal id.

class.name: EUtranFrequency
class.description: Contains data for E-UTRAN frequency defined in E-UTRAN measurement frequency list.

attribute.name: eUtranFrequencyId
attribute.description:
Holds E-UTRAN ARFCN for the cell and is used when identifying the MO.
Depends on RLEFC: EARFCN
attribute.precondition: The MO identified by this attribute cannot be created or deleted if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: minChBw
attribute.description:
Indicates the minimum value of the channel bandwidth of all valid E-UTRAN cells on E-UTRAN ARFCN.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLESC: MINCHBW
attribute.specification: This attribute corresponds to 3GPP specification parameter Measurement Bandwidth.
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: listIndication
attribute.description:
Changes the list type the E-UTRAN measurement frequency belongs to.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLEFC: LISTTYPE
attribute.sideEffects: Changes of the list type impact all other attributes in the MOC EUtranFrequency. Change from IDLE to ACTIVE or from ACTIVE to IDLE deletes the values of attributes pcid1..pcid10, pcidg, pcidp1..pcidp10 and pcidps1..pcidps10.

attribute.name: pcid1
attribute.description:
Indicates the 1st physical layer cell identity for E-UTRAN.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSEI: PCID RLSEE: PCID
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: pcidg
attribute.description:
Describes the physical layer cell identity group.
Indicates a group of E-UTRAN forbidden cells. The value 1 of each bit means that this group of cells is forbidden. Bit 1 is the least significant, bit 6 is the most significant.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSEC: PCIDG
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: pcidp1
attribute.description:
Indicates the 1st physical layer cell identity pattern for E-UTRAN.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSEI: PCIDP RLSEE: PCIDP
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: coverageE
attribute.description:
E-UTRAN coverage indicator for the E-UTRAN ARFCN.
If the attribute listIndication is set to IDLE or BOTH, the default value of this attribute is GOOD.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLRLC: COVERAGEE
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute coverageE cannot be changed when the value of the attribute listIndication is set to ACTIVE.

attribute.name: ratPrioE
attribute.description:
Indicates the RAT priority for E-UTRAN cell in priority based cell reselection algorithm.
The RAT priority for E-UTRAN cell must be unique, that is, cannot be the same as any RAT priority already set for the GERAN or UTRAN frequency in the cell. The same priority can be set for all E-UTRAN frequencies.
0 Lowest priority
.
.
.
7 Highest priority
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSRC: RATPRIO
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute ratPrioE cannot be the same as the value of already set attributes ratPrio and ratPrioU, ratPrioT. The value of the attributes ratPrioE and InterRanMobility.ratPrio cannot be changed in the same transaction.

attribute.name: hPrioThrE
attribute.description:
Defines the reselection thresholds of RSRP for E-UTRAN cell with higher priority than GERAN cell.
If the attribute listIndication is set to IDLE or BOTH, the default value of this attribute is equal to 22.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSRC: HPRIOTHR

attribute.name: lPrioThrE
attribute.description:
Defines the reselection thresholds of RSRP for E-UTRAN cells with lower priority than GERAN cells.
If the attribute listIndication is set to IDLE or BOTH, the default value of this attribute is equal to 22.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSRC: LPRIOTHR

attribute.name: qRxLevMinE
attribute.description:
Defines the minimum required RXLEV for cells on the target E-UTRAN frequency.
0 -140 dBm
1 -138 dBm
2 -136 dBm
.
.
.
29 -82 dBm
30 -80 dBm
31 -78 dBm
If the attribute listIndication is set to IDLE or BOTH, the default value of this attribute is equal to 0.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSRC: QRXLEVMINE

attribute.description:
