attribute.name: eUtranFrequencyIndividual
attribute.description: Internal id.

class.name: UtranFddFrequency
class.description:
Contains data for UTRAN FDD frequency defined in idle list.
MOC UtranFddFrequency can be created only if utranFddFrequencyId (ARFCN) exists in umfiIdleList.

attribute.name: utranFddFrequencyId
attribute.description:
Holds ARFCN from the idle list for the UTRAN FDD cell.
Depends on RLUMC : UMFI
attribute.dependencies: The MO UtranFddFrequency can be deleted only if the attribute utranFddFrequencyId is removed from umfiIdleList.

attribute.name: coverageU
attribute.description:
UTRAN coverage indicator for the UTRAN FDD ARFCN.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLRWC: COVERAGEU

attribute.name: ratPrioU
attribute.description:
The RAT priority for the UTRAN FDD cell in priority based cell reselection algorithm.
The RAT priority for UTRAN FDD cell must be unique, that is, cannot be the same as any RAT priority already set for the GERAN or E-UTRAN frequency in the cell. The same priority can be set for all UTRAN FDD frequencies.
0 Lowest priority
.
.
.
7 Highest priority
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSRC: RATPRIO
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute ratPrioU cannot be the same as the value of already set attributes ratPrio and ratPrioE. The value of the attributes ratPrioU and InterRanMobility.ratPrio cannot be changed in the same transaction.

attribute.name: hPrioThrU
attribute.description:
Defines the reselection thresholds of RSCP for UTRAN cells with higher priority than GERAN cells.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSRC: HPRIOTHR

attribute.name: lPrioThrU
attribute.description:
Defines reselection thresholds of RSCP for UTRAN cells with lower priority than GERAN cells.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSRC: LPRIOTHR

attribute.name: qRxLevMinU
attribute.description:
Defines the minimum required RXLEV for cells on the target UTRAN FDD frequency.
0 -119 dBm
1 -117 dBm
2 -115 dBm
.
.
.
29 -61dBm
30 -59 dBm
31 -57 dBm
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSRC: QRXLEVMINU

class.name: UtranTddFrequency
class.description:
Contains data for UTRAN TDD frequency defined in idle list.
MOC UtranTddFrequency can be created only if utranTddFrequencyId (ARFCN) exists in tmfiIdleList.

attribute.name: utranTddFrequencyId
attribute.description:
Holds ARFCN from the idle list for the UTRAN TDD cell.
Depends on RLUMC : TMFI
attribute.dependencies: The MO UtranTddFrequency can be deleted only if the attribute utranTddFrequencyId is removed from tmfiIdleList.

attribute.name: ratPrioT
attribute.description:
The RAT priority for the UTRAN TDD cell in priority based cell reselection algorithm.
The RAT priority for UTRAN TDD cell must be unique, that is, cannot be the same as any RAT priority already set for the GERAN or E-UTRAN frequency in the cell. The same priority can be set for all UTRAN TDD frequencies.
0 Lowest priority
.
.
.
7 Highest priority
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSRC: RATPRIO
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute ratPrioT cannot be the same as the value of already set attributes ratPrio and ratPrioE. The value of the attributes ratPrioT and InterRanMobility.ratPrio cannot be changed in the same transaction.

attribute.name: hPrioThrT
attribute.description:
Defines the reselection thresholds of RSCP for UTRAN cells with higher priority than GERAN cells.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSRC: HPRIOTHR

attribute.name: lPrioThrT
attribute.description:
Defines the reselection thresholds of RSCP for UTRAN cells with lower priority than GERAN cells.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSRC: LPRIOTHR

attribute.name: qRxLevMinT
attribute.description:
Defines the minimum required RXLEV for cells on the target UTRAN TDD frequency.
0 -119 dBm
1 -117 dBm
2 -115 dBm
.
.
.
29 -61dBm
30 -59 dBm
31 -57 dBm
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSRC: QRXLEVMINU

attribute.name: coverageT
attribute.description:
UTRAN coverage indicator for the UTRAN TDD ARFCN.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLRTC: COVERAGET

class.name: PriorityProfileLevelBsc
class.description: Contains configuration for priority level in priority profile.

attribute.name: priorityProfileLevelBscId
attribute.description:
Holds priority level in priority profile and is also used when identifying the MO.
Depends on RLPPC: PP

attribute.name: inac
attribute.description:
Inaccessible channel percentage.
Contains percentage of deblocked channels that are inaccessible for the priority level at channel allocation.
Depends on RLPPC: INAC
attribute.dependencies: It is not allowed to change this attribute for default priority profile.

attribute.name: probF
attribute.description:
Allocation failure probability.
Contains percentage probability of failure to allocate the last remaining accessible channel for the priority level. Attribute tAlloc must be taken into consideration when setting the value of this attribute.
Depends on RLPPC: PROBF
attribute.dependencies: It is not allowed to change this attribute for default priority profile.

class.name: Trc
class.description: Contains TRC and Ater interface configuration, related to supervision and flow control.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='aterFCWinMinLesserEqualsThatAterFCWinMax' test='@aterFCWinMin le @aterFCWinMax'>The value of the attribute aterFCWinMin must be less than or equal to the value of the attribute aterFCWinMax in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='aterFCWinMinLesserEqualsThatAterFCWinMax' test='@aterFCWinMin le @aterFCWinMax'>The value of the attribute aterFCWinMin must be less than or equal to the value of the attribute aterFCWinMax in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: trcId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: aterDropLevel
attribute.description:
Threshold for high rate for dropped calls on Ater interface.
Sets a threshold for high rate of dropped calls. If the rate is higher than or equal to the specified threshold value, an alarm is raised. If the alarm is issued, the RTLTT devices can either still be used for traffic or automatically removed from traffic in accordance with aterDropNoTraf attribute value. The check is performed every three minutes.
If attribute is set to no value, then no alarm is raised, independently of the percentage of the dropped calls rate.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=ATERDROPLEVEL

attribute.name: aterDropNoTraf
attribute.description:
RTLTT devices ability to traffic seizure.
Defines if RTLTT devices, having a high call drop rate, are kept out of traffic seizure.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=ATERDROPNOTRAF
attribute.dependencies: Attribute has effect only if the value of attribute aterDropLevel is in range 10-60.

attribute.name: aterFCStepUpLmt
attribute.description:
New window size in handling of Ater Flow Control.
Sets up the new window size in Handling of Ater Flow Control. Window size in Handling of Ater Flow Control is increased by one when the number of positive consecutive responses is equal to the value of the attribute.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=ATERFCSTEPUPLMT

attribute.name: aterFCWinMax
attribute.description:
Maximum window size in Handling of Ater Flow Control.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=ATERFCWINMAX

attribute.name: aterFCWinMin
attribute.description:
Minimum window size in Handling of Ater Flow Control.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=ATERFCWINMIN

attribute.name: timerT3Trc
attribute.description:
Reset Acknowledge Guard Timer T3 in TRC.
The timer starts when a reset message is received in the TRC and expires in the time specified by this attribute.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TIMERT3TRC

attribute.name: traDropLevel
attribute.description:
Threshold for high rate of dropped calls.
Sets a threshold for high rate of dropped calls. If the rate is higher than or equal to the specified threshold value, an alarm is raised. If the alarm is issued, the TRA devices can either still be used for traffic or automatically removed from traffic, depending on value of attribute traDropNoTraf. If attribute is set to no value, then no alarm is raised. The check is performed every five minutes.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TRADROPLEVEL

attribute.name: traDropNoTraf
attribute.description:
Threshold for maximum percentage of TRA devices not used for traffic seizure.
Sets a threshold for maximum percentage of TRA devices having high rate of dropped calls that are not used for traffic seizure for every pool. If attribute is set to no value, then TRA devices with high call drop rate are used for traffic seizure.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TRADROPNOTRAF
attribute.dependencies: Setting of attribute has effect only if the value of attribute traDropLevel is in range 10-60.

class.name: CircuitSwitchedDataBsc
class.description: Contains configuration data for CS connections in the BSC.

attribute.name: circuitSwitchedDataBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: hscsdUpgTimer
attribute.description:
Time interval for multislot configuration connections.
Indicates the time interval for which a queue, containing multislot configuration connections, is checked. A multislot configuration connection not having fulfilled the wanted total radio interface data rate, is supervised in order to try to allocate enough resources later during the connection. The multislot configuration connection is inserted in a queue belonging to the cell where the connection is established.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HSCSDUPGTIMER

attribute.name: maxChDataRate
attribute.description:
Maximum channel data rate allowed for CS connections in the BSC.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=MAXCHDATARATE

attribute.name: pHHscsd
attribute.description:
Preemption handling for HSCSD.
Indicates if downgrading due to preemption is to be initiated for HSCSD call if congestion occurs at channel allocation.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=PHHSCSD

class.name: VamosBsc
class.description: Contains the data needed to configure VAMOS functionality on BSC level.

attribute.name: vamosBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: afrVamos
attribute.description:
VAMOS allocation using AMR FR transcodersin the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVBC: AFRVAMOS

attribute.name: ahrVamos
attribute.description:
VAMOS allocation using AMR HR transcoders in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVBC: AHRVAMOS

attribute.name: awbVamos
attribute.description:
VAMOS allocation using AMR WB transcoders in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVBC: AWBVAMOS

attribute.name: efrVamos
attribute.description:
VAMOS allocation using EFR transcoders in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVBC: EFRVAMOS

attribute.name: frVamos
attribute.description:
VAMOS allocation using FR transcoders in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVBC: FRVAMOS

attribute.name: hrVamos
attribute.description:
VAMOS allocation using non-AMR HR transcoders in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVBC: HRVAMOS

attribute.name: vamosState
attribute.description:
State of the functionality VAMOS in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVBI RFVBE
attribute.dependencies: To set this attribute to OFF, the attribute Vamos.vamosState must be set to OFF for all cells.
attribute.precondition: To set this attribute to ON, all TRH RPs of type RPG3 must be blocked.

class.name: SpeechCodingBsc
class.description: Contains speech coding data for the BSC.

attribute.name: speechCodingBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: amrFrSupport
attribute.description:
AMR FR support state and codec set.
Indicates if AMR FR is supported and which codec set is active in the BSC. If AMR FR is supported, TCH/F Speech Version 3 can be selected at channel allocation.
0 AMR FR not supported. 1 AMR FR supported, codec set 1. 2 AMR FR supported, codec set 2. 3 AMR FR supported, codec set 3. 4 AMR FR supported, codec set 4. 5 AMR FR supported, codec set 5.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AMRFRSUPPORT

attribute.name: amrHrSupport
attribute.description:
AMR HR support state and codec set.
Indicates if AMR HR is supported and which codec set is active in the BSC. If AMR HR is supported, TCH/H Speech Version 3 can be selected at channel allocation.
0 AMR HR not supported. 1 AMR HR supported, codec set 1. 2 AMR HR supported, codec set 2. 3 AMR HR supported, codec set 3. 4 AMR HR supported, codec set 4.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AMRHRSUPPORT

attribute.name: amrSpeechVerUse
attribute.description:
AMR used speech version priority.
Specifies if the used speech version for AMR is placed at the top in the list of speech versions at handover. At setup of DTM connection and reallocation of the CS channel is required, this attribute is not considered.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AMRSPEECHVERUSE

attribute.name: amrWbDha
attribute.description:
Control of Dynamic HR Allocation functions for AMR-WB.
Indicates if functions Dynamic HR Allocation and Dynamic HR Allocation part of Abis Triggered HR Allocation are allowed for AMR-WB connections.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AMRWBDHA
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE in at least one internal cell in the BSC. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE in all internal cells in the BSC.

attribute.name: amrWbDymaPrio
attribute.description:
Prioritization between AMR-WB and AMR-NB when Dynamic FR/HR Mode Adaptation is active.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AMRWBDYMAPRIO

attribute.name: amrWbFb
attribute.description:
AMR WB fallback support state.
Indicates if the BSC supports fallback to AMR NB when AMR WB resources cannot be allocated for AMR WB call. Can be turned off if avoiding handovers is preferred than allocating AMR WB resources for AMR WB calls.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AMRWBFB

attribute.name: amrWbPrio
attribute.description:
Control of optimization functions for AMR WB.
Indicates if optimization functions: Dynamic FR/HR Mode Adaptation, TCH Optimization, Abis Packing, Cell Load Sharing, and Subcell Load Distribution are allowed for AMR WB connections.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AMRWBPRIO

attribute.name: amrWbSpVerUse
attribute.description:
AMR WB speech version priority.
Specifies if the used speech version for AMR WB is placed at the top in the list of speech versions at handover.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AMRWBSPVERUSE

attribute.name: amrWbSupport
attribute.description:
AMR WB support state and codec set.
Indicates if AMR WB is supported and which codec set is active in the BSC. If support is on, TCH/F Speech Version 5 can be selected at channel allocation.
0 AMR-WB not supported. 1 AMR-WB supported, codec set 1.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AMRWBSUPPORT

attribute.name: amrFR3CodecSetIcm
attribute.description:
Initial codec mode in AMR FR codec set 3.
Specifies the initial codec mode to be used in AMR FR codec set 3 when the channel is activated (at call set up or at handover). This attribute is specified if a non-standard setting is preferred. If attribute value is not defined, initial codec mode is chosen according to the specification 3GPP TS 45.009.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: ICMODE
attribute.dependencies: To set this attribute amrFR3CodecSet must have two or more values. The value of this attribute must be one of the values specified for the attribute amrFR3CodecSet.
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrFR3CodecSet
attribute.description:
Codec modes in AMR FR codec set 3. Defines the bit rate of the coded speech after the speech encoding.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: MODE
attribute.dependencies: For n codec modes amrFR3CodecSet values there must be n-1 thresholds amrFR3CodecSetThr and n-1 hysteresis amrFR3CodecSetHyst values.

attribute.name: amrFR3CodecSetHyst1
attribute.description:
First hysteresis used with amrFR3CodecSetThr1 for changing the codec mode in AMR FR codec set 3. Hysteresis value is used to avoid continuous rapid changes between two codec modes.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: HYST
attribute.dependencies: Attribute must be set if amrFR3CodecSet has 2 or more values assigned otherwise attribute must be assigned to no value. amrFR3CodecSetThr1+amrFR3CodecSetHyst1 =< amrFR3CodecSetThr2+amrFR3CodecSetHyst2 =< amrFR3CodecSetThr3+amrFR3CodecSetHyst3
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrFR3CodecSetThr1
attribute.description:
First threshold for changing the codec mode in AMR FR codec set 3. Defines a threshold to change codec mode between mode with lowest bit rate and mode with second lowest bit rate. Codec modes are defined by amrFR3CodecSet. Attribute value corresponds to the ratio between signal strength and interference signal strength expressed in dB. When the ratio between signal strength and interference signal strength reaches the value specified by threshold, the codec mode is changed. The hysteresis amrFR3CodecSetHyst1 is used along with the threshold to avoid continuous rapid changes between two codec modes.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: THR
attribute.dependencies: Attribute must be set if amrFR3CodecSet has 2 or more values assigned otherwise attribute must be assigned to no value. amrFR3CodecSetThr1 =< amrFR3CodecSetThr2 =< amrFR3CodecSetThr3 amrFR3CodecSetThr1+amrFR3CodecSetHyst1 =< amrFR3CodecSetThr2+amrFR3CodecSetHyst2 =< amrFR3CodecSetThr3+amrFR3CodecSetHyst3
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrFR4CodecSet
attribute.description:
Codec modes in AMR FR codec set 4. Defines the bit rate of the coded speech after the speech encoding.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: MODE
attribute.dependencies: For n codec modes there must be n-1 thresholds and n-1 hysteresis values.

attribute.name: amrFR4CodecSetHyst1
attribute.description:
First hysteresis used with amrFR4CodecSetThr1 for changing the codec mode in AMR FR codec set 4. Hysteresis value is used to avoid continuous rapid changes between two codec modes.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: HYST
attribute.dependencies: Attribute Attribute must be set if amrFR4CodecSet has 2 or more values assigned otherwise attribute must be assigned to no value. amrFR4CodecSetThr1+amrFR4CodecSetHyst1 =< amrFR4CodecSetThr2+amrFR4CodecSetHyst2 =< amrFR4CodecSetThr3+amrFR4CodecSetHyst3
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrFR4CodecSetIcm
attribute.description:
Initial codec mode in AMR FR codec set 4.
Specifies the initial codec mode to be used in AMR FR codec set 4 when the channel is activated (at call set up or at handover). This attribute is specified if a non-standard setting is preferred. If attribute value is not defined, initial codec mode is chosen according to the specification 3GPP TS 45.009.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: ICMODE
attribute.dependencies: To set this attribute amrFR4CodecSet must have two or more values. The value of this attribute must be one of the values specified for the attribute amrFR4CodecSet.
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrFR4CodecSetThr1
attribute.description:
First threshold for changing the codec mode in AMR FR codec set 4. Defines a threshold to change codec mode between mode with lowest bit rate and mode with second lowest bit rate. Codec modes are defined by amrFR4CodecSet. Attribute value corresponds to the ratio between signal strength and interference signal strength expressed in dB. When the ratio between signal strength and interference signal strength reaches the value specified by threshold, the codec mode is changed. The hysteresis amrFR4CodecSetHyst1 is used along with the threshold to avoid continuous rapid changes between two codec modes.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: THR
attribute.dependencies: Attribute must be set if amrFR4CodecSet has 2 or more values assigned otherwise attribute must be assigned to no value. amrFR4CodecSetThr1 =< amrFR4CodecSetThr2 =< amrFR4CodecSetThr3 amrFR4CodecSetThr1+amrFR4CodecSetHyst1 =< amrFR4CodecSetThr2+amrFR4CodecSetHyst2 =< amrFR4CodecSetThr3+amrFR4CodecSetHyst3
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrHR3CodecSet
attribute.description:
Codec modes in AMR HR codec set 3. Defines the bit rate of the coded speech after the speech encoding. One of the following modes must be included in the set, 4750, 5150 or 5900.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: MODE
attribute.dependencies: For n codec modes amrHR3CodecSet values there must be n-1 thresholds amrHR3CodecSetThr and n-1 hysteresis amrHR3CodecSetHyst values.

attribute.name: amrHR3CodecSetHyst1
attribute.description:
First hysteresis used with amrHR3CodecSetThr1 for changing the codec mode in AMR HR codec set 3. Hysteresis value is used to avoid continuous rapid changes between two codec modes.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: HYST
attribute.dependencies: Attribute must be set if amrHR3CodecSet has 2 or more values assigned otherwise attribute must be assigned to no value. amrHR3CodecSetThr1+amrHR3CodecSetHyst1 =< amrHR3CodecSetThr2+amrHR3CodecSetHyst2 =< amrHR3CodecSetThr3+amrHR3CodecSetHyst3
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrHR3CodecSetIcm
attribute.description:
Initial codec mode in AMR HR codec set 3.
Specifies the initial codec mode to be used in AMR HR codec set 3 when the channel is activated (at call set up or at handover). This attribute is specified if a non-standard setting is preferred. If attribute value is not defined, initial codec mode is chosen according to the specification 3GPP TS 45.009.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: ICMODE
attribute.dependencies: To set this attribute amrHR3CodecSet must have two or more values. The value of this attribute must be one of the values specified for the attribute amrHR3CodecSet.
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrHR3CodecSetThr1
attribute.description:
First threshold for changing the codec mode in AMR HR codec set 3. Defines a threshold to change codec mode between mode with lowest bit rate and mode with second lowest bit rate. Codec modes are defined by amrHR3CodecSet. Attribute value corresponds to the ratio between signal strength and interference signal strength expressed in dB. When the ratio between signal strength and interference signal strength reaches the value specified by threshold, the codec mode is changed. The hysteresis amrHR3CodecSetHyst1 is used along with the threshold to avoid continuous rapid changes between two codec modes.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: THR
attribute.dependencies: Attribute must be set if amrHR3CodecSet has 2 or more values assigned otherwise attribute must be assigned to no value. amrHR3CodecSetThr1 =< amrHR3CodecSetThr2 =< amrHR3CodecSetThr3 amrHR3CodecSetThr1+amrHR3CodecSetHyst1 =< amrHR3CodecSetThr2+amrHR3CodecSetHyst2 =< amrHR3CodecSetThr3+amrHR3CodecSetHyst3
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrHR4CodecSet
attribute.description:
Codec modes in AMR HR codec set 4. Defines the bit rate of the coded speech after the speech encoding. One of the following modes must be included in the set, 4750, 5150 or 5900.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: MODE
attribute.dependencies: For n codec modes amrHR4CodecSet values there must be n-1 thresholds amrHR4CodecSetThr and n-1 hysteresis amrHR4CodecSetHyst values.

attribute.name: amrHR4CodecSetHyst1
attribute.description:
First hysteresis used with amrHR4CodecSetThr1 for changing the codec mode in AMR HR codec set 4. Hysteresis value is used to avoid continuous rapid changes between two codec modes.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: HYST
attribute.dependencies: Attribute must be set if amrHR4CodecSet has 2 or more values assigned otherwise attribute must be assigned to no value. amrHR4CodecSetThr1+amrHR4CodecSetHyst1 =< amrHR4CodecSetThr2+amrHR4CodecSetHyst2 =< amrHR4CodecSetThr3+amrHR4CodecSetHyst3
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrHR4CodecSetIcm
attribute.description:
Initial codec mode in AMR HR Codec Set 4.
Specifies the initial codec mode to be used in AMR HR codec set 4 when the channel is activated (at call set up or at handover). This attribute is specified if a non-standard setting is preferred. If attribute value is not defined, initial codec mode is chosen according to the specification 3GPP TS 45.009.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: ICMODE
attribute.dependencies: To set this attribute amrHR4CodecSet must have two or more values. The value of this attribute must be one of the values specified for the attribute amrHR4CodecSet.
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrHR4CodecSetThr1
attribute.description:
First threshold for changing the codec mode in AMR HR codec set 4. Defines a threshold to change codec mode between mode with lowest bit rate and mode with second lowest bit rate. Codec modes are defined by amrHR4CodecSet. Attribute value corresponds to the ratio between signal strength and interference signal strength expressed in dB. When the ratio between signal strength and interference signal strength reaches the value specified by threshold, the codec mode is changed. The hysteresis amrHR4CodecSetHyst1 is used along with the threshold to avoid continuous rapid changes between two codec modes.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: THR
attribute.dependencies: Attribute must be set if amrHR4CodecSet has 2 or more values assigned otherwise attribute must be assigned to no value. amrHR4CodecSetThr1 =< amrHR4CodecSetThr2 =< amrHR4CodecSetThr3 amrHR4CodecSetThr1+amrHR4CodecSetHyst1 =< amrHR4CodecSetThr2+amrHR4CodecSetHyst2 =< amrHR4CodecSetThr3+amrHR4CodecSetHyst3
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrWB1CodecSetHyst1
attribute.description:
First hysteresis used with amrWB1CodecSetThr1 for changing the codec mode in AMR WB codec set 1. Hysteresis value is used to avoid continuous rapid changes between two codec modes.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: HYST
attribute.dependencies: amrWB1CodecSetThr1+amrWB1CodecSetHyst1 =< amrWB1CodecSetThr2+amrWB1CodecSetHyst2
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrWB1CodecSetIcm
attribute.description:
Initial codec mode in AMR WB codec set 1.
Specifies the initial codec mode to be used in AMR WB codec set 1 when the channel is activated (at call set up or at handover). This attribute is specified if a non-standard setting is preferred. If attribute value is not defined, initial codec mode is chosen according to the specification 3GPP TS 45.009.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: ICMODE
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: amrWB1CodecSetThr1
attribute.description:
First threshold for changing the codec mode in AMR WB codec set 1.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: THR
attribute.dependencies: amrWB1CodecSetThr1 =< amrWB1CodecSetThr2 amrWB1CodecSetThr1+amrWB1CodecSetHyst1 =< amrWB1CodecSetThr2+amrWB1CodecSetHyst2
attribute.precondition: Codec set statistics collection must not be in progress.

attribute.name: enhancedAmrSignaling
attribute.description:
State of the Enhanced AMR Signaling functionality in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFEAI RFEAE

attribute.name: sacchDlThr
attribute.description:
Threshold for start of repetition of SACCH blocks on downlink. The value is used by used by Enhanced AMR Signaling functionality.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFEAC: SACCHDLTHR

attribute.name: sacchUlThr
attribute.description:
Threshold for start of repetition of SACCH blocks on uplink. The value is used by used by Enhanced AMR Signaling functionality.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFEAC: SACCHULTHR

attribute.name: mccSupport
attribute.description:
MCC support state on the TRA R6, R6B, and R7 boards.
0 Not activated on TRA R6, R6B, and R7 boards. 1-2 Activated on TRA R6, R6B, and R7 boards.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=MCCSUPPORT

attribute.name: speechVerUsed
attribute.description:
Used speech version priority.
Specifies if the used speech version is placed at the top in the list of allowed speech versions at handover. At setup of DTM connection and reallocation of the CS channel is required, this attribute value is not considered.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=SPEECHVERUSED

attribute.name: speQIndCollect
attribute.description:
Speech Quality Supervision activation state.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=SPEQINDCOLLECT

attribute.name: tfoConfigTra
attribute.description:
TFO support on TRA R6 boards activation state.
Indicates whether the support for TFO on TRA R6 boards is activated. TFO support on TRA R6 implies a channel reduction from 24 to 16 channels for each ASICircuit supporting TFO.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TFOCONFIGTRA
attribute.disturbances: Some alarms could be issued due to pool idle level supervision, blocking supervision and Self Configuration Transcoder Pools functionalities.
attribute.takesEffect: After blocking and undblocking all related RPs.

attribute.name: tfoStatus
attribute.description:
TFO support activation state.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TFOSTATUS
attribute.precondition: To activate TFO support, TRA Unit must be TFO-capable.

attribute.name: cmr15Handling
attribute.description:
Codec Mode Request 15 handling.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=CMR15HANDLING

attribute.name: amrFR3CodecSetHyst2
attribute.description:
Second hysteresis used with amrFR3CodecSetThr2 for changing the codec mode in AMR FR codec set 3. Hysteresis value is used to avoid continuous rapid changes between two codec modes.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLADC: HYST
attribute.dependencies: Attribute must be set if amrFR3CodecSet has 3 or 4 values assigned otherwise attribute must be assigned to no value. amrFR3CodecSetThr1+amrFR3CodecSetHyst1 =< amrFR3CodecSetThr2+amrFR3CodecSetHyst2 =< amrFR3CodecSetThr3+amrFR3CodecSetHyst3

class.name: GprsBsc
class.description: Contains configuration data for GPRS, GPH and cells that supports GPRS.

attribute.name: gprsBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: chCoding
attribute.description:
Channel Coding Scheme for basic GPRS.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=CHCODING

attribute.name: gprs5TsDlAct
attribute.description:
GPRS full support of MS Multislot classes 30-33 activation state.
Indicates whether the full support for GPRS MS Multislot classes 30-33 is activated.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=GPRS5TSDLACT

attribute.name: gprsAvAInt
attribute.description:
GPRS availability alarm interval.
Specifies the time interval without GPRS traffic after which NO GPRS TRAFFIC alarm is raised. The value is given as a number of scans, where the time between each scan is 5 minutes.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=GPRSAVAINT

attribute.name: gprsEDAAct
attribute.description:
GPRS Extended Dynamic Allocation activation state.
Indicates whether the support for GPRS Extended Dynamic Allocation is activated.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=GPRSEDAACT

attribute.name: gprsNeutralAct
attribute.description:
GPRS neutral UL/DL state handling activation state.
Indicates whether the support for GPRS neutral UL/DL state handling is activated.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=GPRSNEUTRALACT

attribute.name: mBCRAC
attribute.description:
Multi band cell radio access capabilities.
Specifies if channels in all frequency bands or only in the BCCH frequency band are considered at PDCH allocation and PDCH reservation when the MS Radio Access Capability is unknown.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=MBCRAC
attribute.statusInformation: Since G18.Q2 release, change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior.

attribute.name: naccAct
attribute.description:
Network Assisted Cell Change state.
Indicates whether Network Assisted Cell Change in the cells, which have GPRS activated in BSC, is activated.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=NACCACT

attribute.name: onDemandGphDev
attribute.description:
On demand and SPDCH capable 16 kbps GPH devices.
Specifies the number of GPH devices (16 kbps) in an RPP that can be used for on-demand and semi-dedicated PDCHs only.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=ONDEMANDGPHDG2
attribute.statusInformation: Since G19.Q1 release, change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior.

attribute.name: onDemandGphDG2
attribute.description:
GARP-2 ODPDCH and SPDCH capable 16 kbps GPH devices.
Specifies the number of GPH devices (16 kbps) on a GARP-2 that can be used for on-demand and semi-dedicated PDCHs only.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=ONDEMANDGPHDG2

attribute.name: pulSchedInt
attribute.description:
PULS interval.
Specifies the minimum time interval between scheduling attempts for UL TBF in EUL TBF mode or DL TBF in Delayed Release TBF mode.
The availability of the attribute values, other than the default one, depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=PULSCHEDINT

class.name: ActiveQueueManagementBsc
class.description: Contains configuration data for active queue management in the BSC.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='aqmMinIpSizeLesserEqualsThataqmMaxIpSize' test='@aqmMinIpSize le @aqmMaxIpSize'>The value of the attribute aqmMinIpSize must be less than or equal to the value of the attribute aqmMaxIpSize in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='aqmMinIpSizeLesserEqualsThataqmMaxIpSize' test='@aqmMinIpSize le @aqmMaxIpSize'>The value of the attribute aqmMinIpSize must be less than or equal to the value of the attribute aqmMaxIpSize in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: activeQueueManagementBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: aqmMaxIpSize
attribute.description:
Specifies the maximum size of IP packet to discard when AQM is used.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AQMMAXIPSIZE
attribute.dependencies: The value must be set higher or equal to the value of attribute aqmMinIpSize.

attribute.name: aqmMinBuff
attribute.description:
The minimum buffer level for AQM.
Specifies the minimum buffer value, which ensures that at least a few IP packets are buffered at a low leak rate.
The availability of the attribute values, other than the default one, depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AQMMINBUFF

attribute.name: aqmMinIpSize
attribute.description:
Specifies the minimum size of IP packet to discard when AQM is used.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AQMMINIPSIZE
attribute.dependencies: The value must be set lower or equal to value of attribute aqmMaxIpSize.

attribute.name: aqmRttConst
attribute.description:
Constant part of round-trip time for AQM.
Specifies the constant part of the end-to-end round-trip time, that is used to estimate the pipe capacity. The constant part includes delays in server, core network, BSC, MS, and laptop as well as transmission delays on, for example the Gn, Gb, and Abis interface.
The availability of the attribute values, other than the default one, depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AQMRTTCONST

attribute.name: aqmSupport
attribute.description:
AQM support state.
The availability of the attribute value, other than the default one, depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=AQMSUPPORT

class.name: LinkQualityControlBsc
class.description: Contains information for the selection of MCSs to be used for RLC data blocks in every EGPRS.

attribute.name: linkQualityControlBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: lqcAct
attribute.description:
EGPRS LQC activation state.
Specifies whether the function EGPRS Link Quality Control is activated for DL and UL EGPRS TBFs.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LQCACT

attribute.name: lqcDefaultMcsDl
attribute.description:
The MCS that is used for DL EGPRS TBFs when EGPRS LQC is not activated on DL.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LQCDEFAULTMCSDL

attribute.name: lqcDefaultMcsUl
attribute.description:
The MCS that is used for UL EGPRS TBFs when EGPRS LQC is not activated on UL.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LQCDEFAULTMCSUL

attribute.name: lqcDefMcsDlE2A
attribute.description:
The MCS or EGPRS2 DAS that is used for DL EGPRS2-A TBFs when EGPRS2-A LQC is not activated on DL.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LQCDEFMCSDLE2A

attribute.name: lqcDefMcsUlE2A
attribute.description:
The MCS or UAS that is used for UL E2A-TBFs when EGPRS2-A LQC is not activated on UL.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LQCDEFMCSULE2A

attribute.name: lqcHighMcs
attribute.description:
The maximum MCS supported by EGPRS LQC for both UL and DL EGPRS TBFs.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LQCHIGHMCS

attribute.name: lqcHighMcsDlE2A
attribute.description:
The maximum MCS or DAS supported by EGPRS LQC for E2A-TBFs.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LQCHIGHMCSDLE2A

attribute.name: lqcHighMcsUlE2A
attribute.description:
The maximum MCS or UAS supported by EGPRS LQC for E2A-TBFs.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LQCHIGHMCSULE2A

attribute.name: lqcModeUplink
attribute.description:
LA and IR activation for UL.
Specifies whether LA, LA/IR, or LA/IR Block Error Rate is used for UL EGPRS TBFs in RLC Acknowledged mode when the function EGPRS Link Quality Control is activated in the UL direction.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LQCMODEUL

attribute.name: lqcUnAck
attribute.description:
Unacknowledged mode MCS.
Controls the behavior of EGPRS LQC for TBFs using RLC Unacknowledged mode when the function EGPRS Link Quality Control is activated. It applies for both UL and DL EGPRS TBFs. Unacknowledged mode is used for those applications where a certain Block Error Rate is acceptable. This attribute can be used to reduce the Block Error Rate, possibly at the expense of throughput.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LQCUNACK
attribute.disturbances: Changing the attribute to MAX_THROUGHPUT value may result in high Block Error Rate in poor radio conditions. Change to other values may also reduce throughput in good radio conditions.

attribute.name: egprsIrUl
attribute.description:
Indicates whether the support for IR on UL is activated.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=EGPRSIRUL

class.name: QualityOfServiceBsc
class.description: Contains configuration data for the functionality Quality of Service in the BSC.

attribute.name: qualityOfServiceBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: qosConvPrio
attribute.description:
THP for QoS traffic class Conversational.
Indicates the Traffic Handling Priority to set when converting traffic class Conversational to Interactive.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=QOSCONVPRIO

attribute.name: qosMapping
attribute.description:
QoS mapping state.
Activates, changes or deactivates support for QoS based on Release 97 QoS profiles mapped to Release 99 QoS profiles.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=QOSMAPPING
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality GPRS Quality of Service Admission Control, set by attribute IoTBsc.qosAcStatus, is active in the BSC, this attribute cannot be set to BACKGROUND_THP3_THP2 or THP3_THP2_THP1.

attribute.name: qosStreamPrio
attribute.description:
Handling of QoS traffic class Streaming.
Indicates how to handle streaming PFCs when streaming is not supported or when a streaming PFC cannot get any effective streaming PDCHs.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=QOSSTREAMPRIO

attribute.name: qosThp1
attribute.description:
The weight to use for interactive PFCs of QoS THP 1.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=QOSTHP1

attribute.name: qosThp2
attribute.description:
The weight to use for interactive PFCs of QoS THP 2.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=QOSTHP2

attribute.name: pcuQos
attribute.description:
Packet control unit QoS support state.
Indicates whether the support for 3GPP TS 48.018 Packet Flow Management in the Packet Control Unit and support for QoS based on Release 99 QoS profiles is activated.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=PCUQOS
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality GPRS Quality of Service Admission Control, set by attribute IoTBsc.qosAcStatus, is active in the BSC, this attribute cannot be set to ACTIVE.

attribute.name: tbfModeAct
attribute.description:
Change of TBF mode activation state.
Specifies if change of TBF mode for QoS traffic classes Streaming, Interactive, and Background is activated.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TBFMODEACT

attribute.name: loadOpt
attribute.description:
GPRS/EGPRS Load Optimization activation state.
The availability of the attribute values, other than the default one, depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LOADOPT

attribute.name: lOptEThr
attribute.description:
Bit rate threshold for EGPRS TBFs using GPRS/EGPRS Load Optimization.
Specifies if an E-TBF is considered to be in bad radio conditions. The bit rate is measured per PDCH and is valid for both UL and DL.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LOPTETHR

attribute.name: lOptGThr
attribute.description:
Bit rate threshold for GPRS TBFs using Load Optimization.
Specifies when a GPRS TBF is considered to be in bad radio conditions. The bit rate is measured per PDCH and is valid for both UL and DL.
The availability of the attribute values, other than the default one, depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LOPTGTHR

class.name: CellLoadSharingBsc
class.description: Contains the BSC level data used to distribute cell traffic load during peaks in traffic.

attribute.name: cellLoadSharingBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: clsTimeInterval
attribute.description:
Time interval for check of idle TCH BPCs.
When specified interval expires, it initiates the checking of the level of idle TCH BPCs for cells active for cell load sharing.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=CLSTIMEINTERVAL

attribute.name: dtcbSc
attribute.description:
State of Distance to Cell Border criteria at subcell change evaluations.
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=DTCBSC

attribute.name: eBandIncluded
attribute.description:
Extended band usage.
Specifies if channels in the P-GSM 900 band only, or all channels in available GSM 900 bands, are to be considered for handling the GSM radio functions as follows:
HR Packing Cell Load Sharing Subcell Load Distribution Adaptive Configuration of Logical Channels Dynamic HR Allocation GSM - UMTS Cell Reselection and Handover
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=EBANDINCLUDED
attribute.statusInformation: Since G18.Q2 release, change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior.

attribute.name: tfoPrio
attribute.description:
Types of handover allowed for TFO connections.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TFOPRIO

attribute.name: clsBscState
attribute.description:
State of Cell Load Sharing functionality in the BSC.
Depends on RLLSI RLLSE

class.name: HierarchicalCellStructureBsc
class.description: Contains the data needed for HCS configuration in the BSC.

attribute.name: hierarchicalCellStructureBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: hcsChAvailTimer
attribute.description:
Interval for check of idle TCH BPCs for HCS.
Sets the time interval for initiation-checking of the level of idle TCH BPCs for active cells for HCS.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HCSCHAVAILTIMER

attribute.name: hcsTrafDisState
attribute.description:
HCS traffic distribution state.
Indicates whether taking into account the traffic load situation in a cell by HCS evaluation algorithm is activated.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HCSTRAFDISSTATE

attribute.name: maxCellsInLayer
attribute.description:
Maximum number of cells that can be prioritized by HCS in the same layer.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=MAXCELLSINLAYER

attribute.name: maxDbDevInLayer
attribute.description:
Maximum signal strength deviation in HCS layer.
Specifies the maximum signal strength that a cell can deviate from the highest ranked cell in the same layer and still be prioritized by HCS.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=MAXDBDEVINLAYER

attribute.name: modHoToHcs
attribute.description:
HCS counter setting.
Specifies which STS counters must be increased for handover cause "better cell, due to HCS".
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=MODHOTOHCS

attribute.name: upDwnRatio
attribute.description:
The ratio between up and down power regulation.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=UPDWNRATIO
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE in at least one internal cell in the BSC. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE in all internal cells in the BSC.

attribute.name: hcsLayer1Band
attribute.description:
Designates Hierarchical Cell Structure band for cell layer 1.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: LAYER HCSBAND
attribute.dependencies: The layers must be defined in an increasing order. For instance, if hcsLayer2Band is set to BAND1, it is impossible to set hcsLayer1Band to BAND2.

attribute.name: hcsLayer2Band
attribute.description:
Designates Hierarchical Cell Structure band for cell layer 2.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: LAYER HCSBAND
attribute.dependencies: The layers must be defined in an increasing order. For instance, if hcsLayer3Band is set to BAND2, it is impossible to set hcsLayer2Band to BAND3 and if hcsLayer1Band is set to BAND2, it is impossible to set hcsLayer2Band to BAND1.

attribute.name: hcsLayer7Band
attribute.description:
Designates Hierarchical Cell Structure band for cell layer 7.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: LAYER HCSBAND
attribute.dependencies: The layers must be defined in an increasing order. For instance, if hcsLayer8Band is set to BAND7, it is impossible to set hcsLayer7Band to BAND8 and if hcsLayer6Band is set to BAND7, it is impossible to set hcsLayer7Band to BAND6.

attribute.name: hcsLayer8Band
attribute.description:
Designates Hierarchical Cell Structure band for cell layer 8.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: LAYER HCSBAND
attribute.dependencies: The layers must be defined in an increasing order. For instance, if hcsLayer7Band is set to BAND8, it is impossible to set hcsLayer8Band to BAND7.

attribute.name: hcsLayer3Band
attribute.description:
Designates Hierarchical Cell Structure band for cell layer 3.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: LAYER HCSBAND
attribute.dependencies: The layers must be defined in an increasing order. For instance, if hcsLayer4Band is set to BAND3, it is impossible to set hcsLayer3Band to BAND4 and if hcsLayer2Band is set to BAND3, it is impossible to set hcsLayer3Band to BAND2.

attribute.name: hcsLayer4Band
attribute.description:
Designates Hierarchical Cell Structure band for cell layer 4.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: LAYER HCSBAND
attribute.dependencies: The layers must be defined in an increasing order. For instance, if hcsLayer5Band is set to BAND4, it is impossible to set hcsLayer4Band to BAND5 and if hcsLayer3Band is set to BAND4, it is impossible to set hcsLayer4Band to BAND3.

attribute.name: hcsLayer5Band
attribute.description:
Designates Hierarchical Cell Structure band for cell layer 5.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: LAYER HCSBAND
attribute.dependencies: The layers must be defined in an increasing order. For instance, if hcsLayer6Band is set to BAND5, it is impossible to set hcsLayer5Band to BAND6 and if hcsLayer4Band is set to BAND5, it is impossible to set hcsLayer5Band to BAND4.

attribute.name: hcsLayer6Band
attribute.description:
Designates Hierarchical Cell Structure band for cell layer 6.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: LAYER HCSBAND
attribute.dependencies: The layers must be defined in an increasing order. For instance, if hcsLayer7Band is set to BAND6, it is impossible to set hcsLayer6Band to BAND7 and if hcsLayer5Band is set to BAND6, it is impossible to set hcsLayer6Band to BAND5.

attribute.name: hcsBandHyst
attribute.description:
Signal strength hysteresis which prioritizes cells between HCS bands.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: HCSBANDHYST

attribute.name: hcsBand1Thr
attribute.description:
Signal strength threshold for HCS band 1.
The signal strength threshold prioritizes cells within a HCS band.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: HCSBANDTHR HCSBAND

attribute.name: hcsBand8Thr
attribute.description:
Signal strength threshold for HCS band 8.
The signal strength threshold prioritizes cells within a HCS band.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: HCSBANDTHR HCSBAND

attribute.name: hcsBand2Thr
attribute.description:
Signal strength threshold for HCS band 2.
The signal strength threshold prioritizes cells within a HCS band.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: HCSBANDTHR HCSBAND

attribute.name: hcsBand3Thr
attribute.description:
Signal strength threshold for HCS band 3.
The signal strength threshold prioritizes cells within a HCS band.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: HCSBANDTHR HCSBAND

attribute.name: hcsBand4Thr
attribute.description:
Signal strength threshold for HCS band 4.
The signal strength threshold prioritizes cells within a HCS band.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: HCSBANDTHR HCSBAND

attribute.name: hcsBand5Thr
attribute.description:
Signal strength threshold for HCS band 5.
The signal strength threshold prioritizes cells within a HCS band.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: HCSBANDTHR HCSBAND

attribute.name: hcsBand6Thr
attribute.description:
Signal strength threshold for HCS band 6.
The signal strength threshold prioritizes cells within a HCS band.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: HCSBANDTHR HCSBAND

attribute.name: hcsBand7Thr
attribute.description:
Signal strength threshold for HCS band 7.
The signal strength threshold prioritizes cells within a HCS band.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHBC: HCSBANDTHR HCSBAND

class.name: MobilityBsc
class.description: MOC for configuration of MS mobility. Current MOC contains attributes for configuration of assignment and handover procedures, evaluation of urgency conditions, measurement thresholds and filters used during supervision of speech quality.

attribute.name: mobilityBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: highFerDlAFr
attribute.description:
FER threshold for AMR FR codec, DL.
Specifies the threshold value in FER units. Filtered FER measurements are compared to attribute value when evaluating urgency conditions.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HIGHFERDLAFR

attribute.name: highFerDlAHr
attribute.description:
FER threshold for AMR HR codec, DL.
Specifies the threshold value in FER units. Filtered FER measurements are compared to attribute value when evaluating urgency conditions.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HIGHFERDLAHR

attribute.name: highFerDlAWb
attribute.description:
FER threshold for AMR-WB codec, DL.
Specifies the threshold value in FER units. Filtered FER measurements are compared to attribute value when evaluating urgency conditions.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HIGHFERDLAWB

attribute.name: highFerDlEfr
attribute.description:
FER threshold for EFR codec, DL.
Specifies the threshold value in FER units. Filtered FER measurements are compared to attribute value when evaluating urgency conditions.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HIGHFERDLEFR

attribute.name: highFerDlFr
attribute.description:
FER threshold for FR codec, DL.
Specifies the threshold value in FER units. Filtered FER measurements are compared to attribute value when evaluating urgency conditions.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HIGHFERDLFR

attribute.name: highFerDlHr
attribute.description:
FER threshold for HR codec, DL.
Specifies the threshold value in FER units. Filtered FER measurements are compared to attribute value when evaluating urgency conditions.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HIGHFERDLHR

attribute.name: highFerUlAFr
attribute.description:
FER threshold for AMR FR codec, UL.
Specifies the threshold value in FER units. Filtered FER measurements are compared to attribute value when evaluating urgency conditions.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HIGHFERULAFR

attribute.name: highFerUlAHr
attribute.description:
FER threshold for AMR HR codec, UL.
Specifies the threshold value in FER units. Filtered FER measurements are compared to attribute value when evaluating urgency conditions.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HIGHFERULAHR

attribute.name: highFerUlAWb
attribute.description:
FER threshold for AMR-WB codec, UL.
Specifies the threshold value in FER units. Filtered FER measurements are compared to attribute value when evaluating urgency conditions.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HIGHFERULAWB

attribute.name: highFerUlEfr
attribute.description:
FER threshold for EFR codec, UL.
Specifies the threshold value in FER units. Filtered FER measurements are compared to attribute value when evaluating urgency conditions.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HIGHFERULEFR

attribute.name: highFerUlFr
attribute.description:
FER threshold for FR codec, UL.
Specifies the threshold value in FER units. Filtered FER measurements are compared to attribute value when evaluating urgency conditions.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HIGHFERULFR

attribute.name: highFerUlHr
attribute.description:
FER threshold for HR codec, UL.
Specifies the threshold value in FER units. Filtered FER measurements are compared to attribute value when evaluating urgency conditions.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HIGHFERULHR

attribute.name: badQDl
attribute.description:
Threshold value in Deci Transformed GSM Quality Unit for bad quality, DL.
Filtered quality measurements on the DL are compared to this value when evaluating urgency conditions.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=BADQDL

attribute.name: badQUl
attribute.description:
Threshold value in Deci Transformed GSM Quality Unit for bad quality, UL.
Filtered quality measurements on the UL are compared to this value when evaluating urgency conditions.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=BADQUL

attribute.name: lowSSDl
attribute.description:
Threshold value for attenuation of signal strength, DL.
Filtered DL signal strength values are compared with attribute value when analyzing urgency conditions.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LOWSSDL

attribute.name: lowSSUl
attribute.description:
Threshold value for attenuation of signal strength, UL.
Filtered UL signal strength values are compared with attribute value when analyzing urgency conditions.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=LOWSSUL

attribute.name: fastAssign
attribute.description:
Assignment without measurement result behavior.
Indicates how the cell candidate list is composed during assignment to serving cell by the function Locating.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=FASTASSIGN
attribute.dependencies: When Automatic Handover Optimization functionality is active in at least one internal cell in the BSC, value of fastAssign attribute is set to NO_WAIT and not allowed to be changed.

attribute.name: fetchImeiHo
attribute.description:
Fetch IMEI during handover.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=FETCHIMEIHO

attribute.name: hoReqLacCI
attribute.description:
HANDOVER REQUIRED message sending.
Allows sending the cell identity in HANDOVER REQUIRED message at Inter BSC Handover either by using the CGI or by using LAC and CI.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HOREQLACCI

attribute.name: noOfPhysInfoMsg
attribute.description:
The maximum number of repetitions of physical information messages during the handover procedure.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=NOOFPHYSINFOMSG

attribute.name: reEstL2
attribute.description:
State of function Re-establish Layer 2 in the BSC.
The function Re-establish Layer 2 in the BSC is used when trying to re-establish the connection on the old channel if a MS does not show up on the target channel during a handover.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFEHI: REEST RFEHE: REEST
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set to ON, if the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by attribute Mobility.ahoState, is ACTIVE in at least one internal cell in the BSC.

attribute.name: repFacch
attribute.description:
State of the function Repeated DL Fast Associated Control Channel in the BSC.
The function DL Fast Associated Control Channel in the BSC is used to enhance the probability of successful Fast Associated Control Channel signaling for DTAP and Base Station System Management Application Part messages.
Depends on RFEHI: REPFACCH RFEHE: REPFACCH
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set to ON, if the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by attribute Mobility.ahoState, is ACTIVE in at least one internal cell in the BSC.

attribute.name: timer3105
attribute.description:
The time between repetition of physical information messages during the handover procedure.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TIMER3105

attribute.name: ahoMode
attribute.description:
Automatic Handover Optimization operational mode.
Depends on RFAHC: AHOMODE

class.name: Locating800Bsc
class.description: Contains the data which is used by the BSC in locating process for global system type GSM800.

attribute.name: locating800BscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: assoc
attribute.description:
Defines if assignment to other cell than serving cell is allowed.
Depends on RLLBC: ASSOC
attribute.dependencies: Bsc.gSysType must be set to MIXED or GSM800 to change this attribute. Attribute cannot be set to NO if the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization is active at least in one internal cell in the BSC.

attribute.name: evalType
attribute.description:
Locating algorithm used at cell ranking.
Depends on RLLBC: EVALTYPE
attribute.dependencies: Bsc.gSysType must be set to MIXED or GSM800 to change this attribute.

attribute.name: iBHoAss
attribute.description:
State of Inter BSC handover during assignment.
Depends on RLLBC: IBHOASS
attribute.dependencies: Bsc.gSysType must be set to MIXED or GSM800 to change this attribute.

attribute.name: iBHoSiCh
attribute.description:
State of Inter BSC handover on signalling channel.
Depends on RLLBC: IBHOSICH
attribute.dependencies: Bsc.gSysType must be set to MIXED or GSM800 to change this attribute.

attribute.name: iHoSiCh
attribute.description:
State of Intra-cell handover on signalling channel.
Depends on RLLBC: IHOSICH
attribute.dependencies: Bsc.gSysType must be set to MIXED or GSM800 to change this attribute.

attribute.name: nHo
attribute.description:
Number of handovers before prioritizing candidates within higher cell layer is used.
Number of handovers during specified time, which are allowed before ranking by prioritizing candidates within higher cell layer is used. The time interval is specified by attribute tHo. This prioritized ranking will only be performed if fastMsReg is set to ON in the cell.
Depends on RLLBC: NHO
attribute.dependencies: Bsc.gSysType must be set to MIXED or GSM800 to change this attribute.

attribute.name: taAveLen
attribute.description:
Number of values in the averaging of timing advance.
For the evaluation of timing advance the algorithm uses a sliding window, the length of which is determined by taAveLen. taAveLen determines the total number of values to be used in the moving average. Is used only in cells where the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization is not active.
Depends on RLLBC: TAAVELEN
attribute.dependencies: Bsc.gSysType must be set to MIXED or GSM800 to change this attribute.

attribute.name: tAlloc
attribute.description:
Time between allocation attempts during better cell condition and when the first attempt has failed.
Minimum time between allocation attempts when there is a better cell condition and when the first allocation attempt has failed. The attribute is given as number of SACCH periods. Is used only in cells where the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization is not active.
Depends on RLLBC: TALLOC
attribute.dependencies: Bsc.gSysType must be set to MIXED or GSM800 to change this attribute.

attribute.name: tHo
attribute.description:
Time interval for handovers before ranking by prioritizing candidates within higher cell layer.
Time interval for measuring number of handovers before ranking by prioritizing candidates within higher cell layer is used. The number of handovers allowed is set by the attribute nHo. This prioritized ranking will only be performed if fastMsReg is set to ON in the cell. Also defines minimum time before a handover is allowed to a lower layer cell, after a handover has been performed to a higher layer cell for a fast moving mobile.
Depends on RLLBC: THO
attribute.dependencies: Bsc.gSysType must be set to MIXED or GSM800 to change this attribute.

attribute.name: tInit
attribute.description:
Minimum time before handover is allowed on an initial call or after a handover.
The attribute is given as number of SACCH periods.
Depends on RLLBC: TINIT
attribute.dependencies: Bsc.gSysType must be set to MIXED or GSM800 to change this attribute.

attribute.name: tUrgen
attribute.description:
Time between allocation attempts at an urgency condition and when the first attempt has failed.
Minimum time between allocation attempts at an urgency condition and when the first allocation attempt has failed. In the case an urgency handover attempt fails due to congestion, the locating process will proceed and even a handover candidate list will be prepared. However the candidate list will not be transferred to the handover function during the time specified by the attribute tUrgen, unless the candidate list contains a better cell. The attribute is given as number of SACCH periods. Is used only in cells where the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization is not active.
Depends on RLLBC: TURGEN
attribute.dependencies: Bsc.gSysType must be set to MIXED or GSM800 to change this attribute.

class.name: Locating900Bsc
class.description: Contains the data which is used by the BSC in locating process for global system type GSM900.

attribute.name: locating900BscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: assoc
attribute.description:
Defines if assignment to other cell than serving cell is allowed.
Depends on RLLBC: ASSOC
attribute.dependencies: Bsc.gSysType must be set to MIXED or GSM900 to change this attribute. Attribute cannot be set to NO if the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization is active at least in one internal cell in the BSC.

class.name: LchAvailSupervisionBsc
class.description: Contains the BSC level data used to configure logical channels seizure supervision.

attribute.name: lchAvailSupervisionBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: sdcchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for SDCCH.
Depends on RLVLC: CHTYPE ACL
attribute.dependencies: To change this attribute sdcchSupervisionStatus must be PASSIVE.

attribute.name: tchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for TCH.
Depends on RLVLC: CHTYPE ACL
attribute.dependencies: To change this attribute tchSupervisionStatus must be PASSIVE.

attribute.name: sdcchSupervisionStatus
attribute.description:
Supervision of SDCCH status in the BSC.
Depends on RLVLI: CHTYPE=SDCCH RLVLE: CHTYPE=SDCCH
attribute.dependencies: Before activating a supervision on SDCCH channel type, preferred cells must be set using the attribute LchAvailSupervision.sdcchSupervisionConnected.

attribute.name: tchSupervisionStatus
attribute.description:
Supervision of TCH status in the BSC.
Depends on RLVLI: CHTYPE=TCH RLVLE: CHTYPE=TCH
attribute.dependencies: Before activating a supervision on TCH channel type, preferred cells must be set using the attribute LchAvailSupervision.tchSupervisionConnected.

attribute.name: sdcchPl
attribute.description:
Supervision period length for SDCCH.
Depends on RLVLC: CHTYPE PL
attribute.dependencies: To change this attribute sdcchSupervisionStatus must be PASSIVE.

attribute.name: tchPl
attribute.description:
Supervision period length for TCH.
Depends on RLVLC: CHTYPE PL
attribute.dependencies: To change this attribute tchSupervisionStatus must be PASSIVE.

class.name: EUtraNetwork
class.description: Entry point for the external Evolved UTRAN configuration for the BSC.

attribute.name: eUtraNetworkId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: lteToGsmNacc
attribute.description:
State of support for LTE to GSM NACC in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFLNI RFLNE
attribute.precondition: The optional feature LTE to GSM NACC must be available in the system.

attribute.name: fr2LteNoMeas
attribute.description:
Fast Return to LTE for MS not supporting E-UTRA Measurement and Reporting. Indicates if MSs that do not support E-UTRA Measurement and Reporting during ongoing calls are sent to LTE if LTE has the highest RAT priority.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=FR2LTENOMEAS

class.name: CapacityLockBsc
class.description: Contains attributes to configure capacity locks and capacity lock alarms for the BSC.

attribute.name: capacityLockBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: maxNumPdchCLAl
attribute.description:
PDCH Allocation capacity lock alarm working status.
ACTIVE - all capacity lock alarms are generated. INACTIVE - the BSC CAPACITY LOCK EXCEEDED alarm with reason CL USE MISMATCH is generated only.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=MAXNUMPDCH CLAL

attribute.name: maxNumPdchClThr
attribute.description:
PDCH Allocation capacity lock supervision level threshold.
Controls the supervision level threshold as percentage of the capacity lock for number of simultaneous E-PDCH allocations in the BSC.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=MAXNUMPDCH CLTHR

attribute.name: maxNumPdchClMax
attribute.description:
PDCH Allocation capacity lock.
Limits the number of simultaneous PDCH Allocation in the BSC. If the attribute value is not defined, there is no restriction.
0-Capacity is unavailable
Depends on RACLP: CLNAME=MAXNUMPDCH CLMAX

attribute.name: vamosMaxTrafficCLAl
attribute.description:
VAMOS Maximum Traffic capacity lock alarm working status.
ACTIVE - all capacity lock alarms are generated. INACTIVE - the BSC CAPACITY LOCK EXCEEDED alarm with reason CL USE MISMATCH is generated only.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=VAMOSMAXTRAFFIC CLAL
attribute.statusInformation: Since G21.Q2 release, change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior.

attribute.name: vamosMaxTrafficClMax
attribute.description:
VAMOS Maximum Traffic capacity lock.
Limits the number of simultaneous traffic connections with VAMOS in the BSC. If attribute value is not defined, there is no restriction.
0 - Capacity is unavailable
Depends on RACLP: CLNAME=VAMOSMAXTRAFFIC CLMAX
attribute.statusInformation: Since G21.Q2 release, change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior.

attribute.name: vamosMaxTrafficClThr
attribute.description:
VAMOS Maximum Traffic capacity lock supervision level threshold.
Controls the supervision level threshold as percentage of the capacity lock for number of simultaneous VAMOS traffic connections in the BSC.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=VAMOSMAXTRAFFIC CLTHR
attribute.statusInformation: Since G21.Q2 release, change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior.

attribute.name: hrMaxTrafficCLAl
attribute.description:
HR Maximum Traffic capacity lock alarm working status.
ACTIVE - all capacity lock alarms are generated. INACTIVE - the BSC CAPACITY LOCK EXCEEDED alarm with reason CL USE MISMATCH is generated only.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=HRMAXTRAFFIC CLAL

attribute.name: hrMaxTrafficClMax
attribute.description:
HR Maximum Traffic capacity lock.
Limits the number of simultaneous traffic connections with HR in the BSC. If attribute value is not defined, there is no restriction.
0-Capacity is unavailable
Depends on RACLP: CLNAME=HRMAXTRAFFIC CLMAX

attribute.description:

attribute.name: a54MaxTrafficClMax
attribute.description:
A5/4 Maximum Traffic capacity lock.
Limits the number of simultaneous traffic connections with A5/4 ciphering in the BSC. If the attribute value is not defined, there is no restriction.
0-Capacity is unavailable
Depends on RACLP: CLNAME=A54MAXTRAFFIC CLMAX
attribute.statusInformation: Since G21.Q2 release, change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior.
