attribute.name: gbCapAlarmAct
attribute.description:
Gb capacity alarm activation state.
Indicates whether the support for Gb capacity alarms is activated and can be raised.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=GBCAPALARMACT

attribute.name: gbCapWarnThr
attribute.description:
Gb capacity warning threshold.
Specifies the threshold value for average Gb traffic throughput. If the throughput is higher than or equal to the specified threshold value, an alarm is raised. The attribute value is given in percents of attribute gbCap value.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=GBCAPWARNTHR

attribute.name: gbCap
attribute.description:
Gb capacity.
Gb traffic throughput capacity.
Depends on DBTSP: GBCAPACITY

attribute.name: abisIpClAl
attribute.description:
Packet Abis over IP capacity lock alarm working status.
ACTIVE - all capacity lock alarms are generated. INACTIVE - the alarm BSC CAPACITY LOCK EXCEEDED with reason CL USE MISMATCH is generated only.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=ABISIPCL CLAL

attribute.name: abisIpClMax
attribute.description:
Packet Abis over IP capacity lock.
Limits the number of TSs for which it is possible to activate the functionality Packet Abis over IP in the BSC. If the attribute value is not defined, there is no restriction.
0-Capacity is unavailable
Depends on RACLP: CLNAME=ABISIPCL CLMAX

attribute.name: abisIpClThr
attribute.description:
Packet Abis over IP capacity lock supervision level threshold.
Controls the supervision level threshold as percentage of the capacity lock for number of TSs for which it is possible to activate the functionality Packet Abis over IP in the BSC.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=ABISIPCL CLTHR

attribute.name: maxNumTrxClAl
attribute.description:
TRX Configuration capacity lock alarm working status.
ACTIVE - all capacity lock alarms are generated. INACTIVE - the alarm BSC CAPACITY LOCK EXCEEDED with reason CL USE MISMATCH is generated only.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=MAXNUMTRX CLAL

attribute.name: maxNumTrxClMax
attribute.description:
TRX Configuration capacity lock.
Limits the number of defined TRXs in the BSC. If the attribute value is not defined, there is no restriction.
0-Capacity is unavailable
Depends on RACLP: CLNAME=MAXNUMTRX CLMAX

attribute.name: maxNumTrxClThr
attribute.description:
TRX Configuration capacity lock supervision level threshold.
Controls the supervision level threshold as percentage of the capacity lock for number of defined TRXs in the BSC.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=MAXNUMTRX CLTHR

attribute.name: btsSoftSyncClAl
attribute.description:
BTS Soft Synchronization capacity lock alarm working status.
ACTIVE - all capacity lock alarms are generated. INACTIVE - the alarm BSC CAPACITY LOCK EXCEEDED with reason CL USE MISMATCH is generated only.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=BTSSOFTSYNC CLAL

attribute.name: btsSoftSyncClMax
attribute.description:
BTS Soft Synchronization capacity lock.
Limits the number of TSs for which it is possible to activate the functionality BTS Soft Synchronization in the BSC. If the attribute value is not defined, there is no restriction.
0-Capacity is unavailable
Depends on RACLP: CLNAME=BTSSOFTSYNC CLMAX

attribute.name: btsSoftSyncClThr
attribute.description:
BTS Soft Synchronization capacity lock supervision level threshold.
Controls the supervision level threshold as percentage of the capacity lock for number of TSs for which it is possible to activate the functionality BTS Soft Synchronization in the BSC.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=BTSSOFTSYNC CLTHR

attribute.name: edrxBucketCLAl
attribute.description:
Extended DRX capacity lock alarm working status.
ACTIVE All capacity lock alarms are generated. INACTIVE The alarm BSC CAPACITY LOCK EXCEEDED with reason CL USE MISMATCH is generated only.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=EDRXBUCKET CLAL

attribute.name: edrxBucketClThr
attribute.description:
Extended DRX Capacity Lock supervision level threshold.
Controls the supervision level threshold as percentage of the capacity lock for the number of 44.018 Immediate Assignment (PS) messages for Extended DRX traffic sent on the CCCH from BSC during a month before Extended DRX is disabled in the BSC.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=EDRXBUCKET CLTHR

attribute.name: ecgsmBucketCLAl
attribute.description:
Extended Coverage GSM capacity lock clarm working status.
ACTIVE All capacity lock alarms are generated. INACTIVE The alarm BSC CAPACITY LOCK EXCEEDED with reason CL USE MISMATCH is generated only.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=ECGSMBUCKET CLAL

attribute.name: ecgsmBucketClThr
attribute.description:
Extended Coverage GSM capacity lock supervision level threshold.
Controls the supervision level threshold as percentage of the capacity lock for the number of 44.018 EC Immediate Assignment messages sent on the CCCH and EC-CCCH from BSC during a month before EC-GSM IoT is disabled in the BSC.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=ECGSMBUCKET CLTHR

attribute.name: qosAcBucketCLAl
attribute.description:
QoS Admission Control capacity lock alarm working status.
ACTIVE All capacity lock alarms are generated. INACTIVE The alarm BSC CAPACITY LOCK EXCEEDED with reason CL USE MISMATCH is generated only.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=QOSACBUCKET CLAL

attribute.name: qosAcBucketClThr
attribute.description:
QoS Admission Control capacity lock supervision level threshold.
Controls the supervision level threshold as percentage of the capacity lock for the number of 44.018 Immediate Assignment (PS) messages sent on the CCCH from BSC during a month before QoS Admission Control is disabled in the BSC.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=QOSACBUCKET CLTHR

attribute.name: psPosCLAl
attribute.description:
PS Positioning capacity lock alarm working status.
ACTIVE All capacity lock alarms are generated. INACTIVE The alarm BSC CAPACITY LOCK EXCEEDED with reason CL USE MISMATCH is generated only.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=PSPOS CLAL

attribute.name: psPosClThr
attribute.description:
PS Positioning capacity lock supervision level threshold.
Controls the supervision level threshold as percentage of the capacity lock for the number of 48.018 PERFORM LOCATION REQUEST messages received by BSC during a month before functionality PS Positioning is disabled in the BSC.
Depends on RACLC: CLNAME=PSPOS CLTHR

attribute.name: ecgsmBucketClMax
attribute.description:
Extended Coverage GSM capacity lock.
Limits the total amount of EC-TBFs, which could be transmitted during a month in the BSC, divided by 1000. If attribute value is not defined, there is no restriction.
0-Capacity is unavailable
Depends on RACLP: CLNAME=ECGSMBUCKET CLMAX

attribute.name: edrxBucketClMax
attribute.description:
Extended DRX capacity lock.
Limits the total amount of immediate assignments for Extended DRX traffic, which could be transmitted during one month in the BSC divided by 1000. If attribute value is not defined, there is no restriction.
0-Capacity is unavailable
Depends on RACLP: CLNAME=EDRXBUCKET CLMAX

attribute.name: psPosClMax
attribute.description:
PS Positioning capacity lock.
Limits the maximum number of messages 48.018 PERFORM LOCATION REQUEST received by BSC during a month before functionality PS Positioning is disabled in the BSC divided by 10. If attribute value is not defined, there is no restriction.
0-Capacity is unavailable
Depends on RACLP: CLNAME=PSPOS CLMAX

attribute.name: qosAcBucketClMax
attribute.description:
QoS Admission Control capacity lock.
Total amount of prioritized TBFs, which could be transmitted during one month in the BSC, divided by 1000. If attribute value is not defined, there is no restriction.
0-Capacity is unavailable
Depends on RACLP: CLNAME=QOSACBUCKET CLMAX

class.name: SonBsc
class.description: Contains data for automatic radio network configuration for the BSC. Contains configuration related to Self Organizing Network functions in the BSC.

attribute.name: sonBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: aflpMcimAlg
attribute.description:
Algorithm for calculating average linear interference.
Sets the algorithm for calculating average linear interference used for creation of MAIO Cluster Interference Matrix by Automatic FLP or by Automatic AIRCT functionality.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFFBC: MCIMALG

attribute.name: aflpConfigTime
attribute.description:
Time when change of parameters by Automatic FLP or Automatic AIRCT functionality takes place.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFFBC: TIME

attribute.name: bscAflp
attribute.description:
State of the Automatic Frequency Load Planning functionality in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFFBI: BSCAFLP CLEARREC RFFBE: BSCAFLP
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set to ACTIVE, the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOptBsc.gascStatus, is automatically turned on in the BSC.

attribute.name: bscAirct
attribute.description:
State of the Automatic IRC Tuning functionality in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFFBI: BSCAIRCT CLEARREC RFFBE: BSCAIRCT

attribute.name: anrMode
attribute.description:
Automatic Neighbor Relations operating mode.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAANC: ANRMODE RAANP: ANRMODE
attribute.sideEffects: When the value of the attribute bscAnr is set to ACTIVE, then a change of this attribute to the value UPDATE triggers automatic creation of the MOCs GeranCellRelation and ExternalGeranCellRelation and removal of the MOCs GeranCellRelation, if the value of the attribute GeranCellRelation.cs is set to NO and the value of the attribute GeranCellRelation.relType is set to NEUTRAL, and the MOCs ExternalGeranCellRelation, if the value of the attribute ExternalGeranCellRelation.relType is set to NEUTRAL. When the value of the attribute bscAnr is set to ACTIVE, then a change of this attribute to the value UPDATE triggers automatic update of active BA list, set by the attribute GeranCell.baListActive, every day at a predefined time. When the value of the attribute bscAnr is set to ACTIVE and the value of the attribute anrIdleBaListOptimization is set to ON, then a change of this attribute to the value UPDATE triggers automatic update of idle BA list, set by the attribute GeranCell.baListIdle, every day at a predefined time, as it is performed for active BA list, set by the attribute baListActive.

attribute.name: bscAnr
attribute.description:
State of the Automatic Neighbor Relations functionality in the BSC.
The availability of the attribute value ACTIVE depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAANI RAANE RAANP: ANRSTATUS
attribute.sideEffects: When the value of the attribute anrMode is set to UPDATE, then a change of this attribute to the value ACTIVE triggers automatic creation of the MOCs GeranCellRelation and ExternalGeranCellRelation and removal of the MOCs GeranCellRelation, if the value of the attribute GeranCellRelation.cs is set to NO and the value of the attribute GeranCellRelation.relType is set to NEUTRAL, and the MOCs ExternalGeranCellRelation, if the value of the attribute ExternalGeranCellRelation.relType is set to NEUTRAL. When the value of the attribute anrMode is set to UPDATE, then a change of this attribute to the value ACTIVE triggers automatic update of active BA list, set by the attribute GeranCell.baListActive, every day at a predefined time. When the value of the attribute anrMode is set to UPDATE and the value of the attribute anrIdleBaListOptimization is set to ON, then a change of this attribute to the value UPDATE triggers automatic update of idle BA list, set by the attribute baListIdle, every day at a predefined time, as it is performed for active BA list, set by the attribute baListActive.
attribute.precondition: To activate the functionality, enough licensed capacity must be provided and file ROBLSONFILE must be defined.

attribute.name: hoMtd
attribute.description:
Indicates if the MTD data is requested in the handover command.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HOMTD

attribute.name: anrInterPlmnRelation
attribute.description:
Inter PLMN relation change indicator. Defines if is it allowed to add cell relations between different PLMNs for the functionality Automatic Neighbor Relations.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAANC: ITERPLMNREL RAANP: ITERPLMNREL

attribute.name: anrIdleBaListOptimization
attribute.description:
Idle BA list optimization by ANR indicator.
Defines if automatic optimization of idle BA lists is performed by the functionality Automatic Neighbor Relations.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAANC: IDLEBALISTOPT RAANP: IDLEBALISTOPT
attribute.sideEffects: When the value of the attribute bscAnr is set to ACTIVE and the value of the attribute anrMode is set to UPDATE, then a change of this attribute to the value ON triggers automatic update of idle BA list, set by the attribute GeranCell.baListIdle as it is performed for active BA list, set by the attribute GeranCell.baListActive.

class.name: MsQueuingBsc
class.description: Contains the data needed to configure MS Queuing functionality on BSC level.

attribute.name: msQueuingBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: msQueuing
attribute.description:
MS Queuing activation state.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL1
attribute.description:
Assignment time for priority connection for prioity level 1.
Determines the maximum time it is allowed to do assignment, including call queuing, for a priority connection for priority level 1. The availabity of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBQC: PRIOLEV QASSTIME

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL10

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL11

Assignment time for priority connection for prioity level 11.
Determines the maximum time it is allowed to do assignment, including call queuing, for a priority connection for priority level 11. The availabity of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBQC: PRIOLEV QASSTIME

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL12
attribute.description:
Assignment time for priority connection for prioity level 12.
Determines the maximum time it is allowed to do assignment, including call queuing, for a priority connection for priority level 12. The availabity of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBQC: PRIOLEV QASSTIME

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL13
attribute.description:
Assignment time for priority connection for prioity level 13.
Determines the maximum time it is allowed to do assignment, including call queuing, for a priority connection for priority level 13. The availabity of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBQC: PRIOLEV QASSTIME

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL14
attribute.description:
Assignment time for priority connection for prioity level 14.
Determines the maximum time it is allowed to do assignment, including call queuing, for a priority connection for priority level 14. The availabity of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBQC: PRIOLEV QASSTIME

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL2
attribute.description:
Assignment time for priority connection for prioity level 2.
Determines the maximum time it is allowed to do assignment, including call queuing, for a priority connection for priority level 2. The availabity of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBQC: PRIOLEV QASSTIME

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL3
attribute.description:
Assignment time for priority connection for prioity level 3.
Determines the maximum time it is allowed to do assignment, including call queuing, for a priority connection for priority level 3. The availabity of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBQC: PRIOLEV QASSTIME

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL4
attribute.description:
Assignment time for priority connection for prioity level 4.
Determines the maximum time it is allowed to do assignment, including call queuing, for a priority connection for priority level 4. The availabity of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBQC: PRIOLEV QASSTIME

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL5
attribute.description:
Assignment time for priority connection for prioity level 5.
Determines the maximum time it is allowed to do assignment, including call queuing, for a priority connection for priority level 5. The availabity of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBQC: PRIOLEV QASSTIME

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL6
attribute.description:
Assignment time for priority connection for prioity level 6.
Determines the maximum time it is allowed to do assignment, including call queuing, for a priority connection for priority level 6. The availabity of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBQC: PRIOLEV QASSTIME

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL7
attribute.description:
Assignment time for priority connection for prioity level 7.
Determines the maximum time it is allowed to do assignment, including call queuing, for a priority connection for priority level 7. The availabity of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBQC: PRIOLEV QASSTIME

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL8
attribute.description:
Assignment time for priority connection for prioity level 8.
Determines the maximum time it is allowed to do assignment, including call queuing, for a priority connection for priority level 8. The availabity of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBQC: PRIOLEV QASSTIME

attribute.name: assignTimePrioL9
attribute.description:
Assignment time for priority connection for prioity level 9.
Determines the maximum time it is allowed to do assignment, including call queuing, for a priority connection for priority level 9. The availabity of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBQC: PRIOLEV QASSTIME

attribute.name: msQHoPrio
attribute.description:
MS queuing priority.
Specifies whether handover has higher priority than assignment at calculating the ranking values for Priority Connections. If attribute is set to YES, then handovers are prioritized over assignments within each priority level in the following order: Urgency Handover, Handover, Assignment.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=MSQHOPRIO
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in a cell, this attribute is not used in this cell.

class.name: PowerSavingsBsc
class.description: Contains configuration data for the functionality Power Savings in the BSC.

attribute.name: powerSavingsBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: trxOffDelay
attribute.description:
Interval between disabling a TRX and the resumption of checking for a further TRX to disable.
Specifies the interval between disabling a TRX within a cell due to BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings and the resumption of checking for a further TRX to disable for BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings in the same cell. The value is given as a number of scans, where the time between each scan is approximately 10 seconds.
When the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier is active: Numeral 6-20 with default value 20.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TRXOFFDELAY

attribute.name: trxOffTarget
attribute.description:
Number of intervals with traffic under the low-traffic threshold level before disabling a TRX.
Specifies the number of intervals with traffic under the low-traffic threshold level before disabling a TRX with BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings.
When the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier is active: Numeral 20-36 with default value 36.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TRXOFFTARGET

attribute.name: trxOnTarget
attribute.description:
Number of intervals with traffic over the high-traffic threshold level before enabling a TRX.
Specifies the number of intervals with traffic over the high-traffic threshold level before enabling a TRX with BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings. Note that the number is decreased if the traffic level is far above the threshold.
When the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier is active: Numeral 49-100 with default value 49.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TRXONTARGET

attribute.name: trxtAutoIniTime
attribute.description:
The interval for initiation of automatic supervision.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TRXTAUTOINITIME

attribute.name: trxtAutoThrshld
attribute.description:
The threshold value for when the TRX test is initiated at automatic supervision.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TRXTAUTOTHRSHLD

attribute.name: mcpaBcchOff
attribute.description:
Disabling TRXs in MCPA with BCCH carrier.
Indicates if TRXs connected to MCPA with BCCH carrier can be disabled due to MCPA Power Savings.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=MCPABCCHOFF

class.name: MsQueuing
class.description:
Contains MS queuing data.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: msQueuingId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: qLength
attribute.description:
Defines the maximum number of priority connections that can be inserted in the queue.
If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.aHoState, is not active in the cell, this attribute describes the length of the queue where priority connections are queued. If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.aHoState, is active in the cell, this attribute describes the length of the queue where connections are queued due to assignment.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLMQC QLENGTH

attribute.name: resLimit
attribute.description:
Channel resource limit for the functionality MS Queuing in the cell.
Indicates the percentage of FR and HR TCHs, that are allocated to priority connections before allocating available channels to non priority connections.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLMQC RESLIMIT
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.aHoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used.

class.name: SmsCellBroadcast
class.description:
Contains the data needed for DRX mode for SMSCB messages in the cell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='fSlotsLessThanSperiod' test="(@fSlots lt @speriod)"> The value of the attribute fSlots must be less than value of the attribute speriod in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='fSlotsLessThanSperiod' test="(@fSlots lt @speriod)"> The value of the attribute fSlots must be less than value of the attribute speriod in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: smsCellBroadcastId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: drx
attribute.description:
Status of DRX mode for SMSCB in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLMDI RLMDE

attribute.name: fSlots
attribute.description:
Defines the number of free slots per scheduling period.
These slots are used to broadcast a new received SMSCB message in the cell. The availability of attribute value depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLMDC: FSLOTS
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value must be less than the value of attribute speriod.

attribute.name: speriod
attribute.description:
Defines the number of message slots within one scheduling period in DRX mode.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLMDC: SPERIOD
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value must be greater than the value of attribute fSlots.

class.name: ImsiHandoverBsc
class.description: Contains IMSI handover data for the BSC.

attribute.name: imsiHandoverBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: imsiHandoverBsc
attribute.description:
State of IMSI Handover GSM to GSM functionality in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFIMI RFIME

attribute.name: imsiSetA
attribute.description:
Allowed IMSI series patterns for set A. MS with IMSI which matches defined pattern is assigned to a specified set of IMSI patterns. MS which belongs to a specific set of IMSI patterns receives allowed PLMN color codes specified for this set only. MSs perform radio signal measurements only for these cells which belong to allowed NCCs, thus handovers are allowed only to cells with allowed NCCs.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFIMC: IMSIPAT
attribute.dependencies: IMSI series pattern cannot match other defined IMSI series patterns in the set and in other sets.

attribute.name: imsiSetANccPerm
attribute.description:
Allowed network color codes for set A.
Specifies network color codes on the BCCH carriers for which the MS is permitted to report measurements results for specific set of IMSI pattern series.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFIMC: NCCPERM
attribute.dependencies: The values of the attributes: imsiSetANccPerm, imsiSetBNccPerm, imsiSetCNccPerm, and imsiSetDNccPerm cannot be duplicated.

attribute.name: imsiSetB
attribute.description:
Allowed IMSI series patterns for set B. MS with IMSI which matches defined pattern is assigned to a specified set of IMSI patterns. MS which belongs to a specific set of IMSI patterns receives allowed PLMN color codes specified for this set only. MSs perform radio signal measurements only for these cells which belong to allowed NCCs, thus handovers are allowed only to cells with allowed NCCs.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFIMC: IMSIPAT
attribute.dependencies: IMSI series pattern cannot match other defined IMSI series patterns in the set and in other sets.

attribute.name: imsiSetBNccPerm
attribute.description:
Allowed network color codes for set B.
Specifies network color codes on the BCCH carriers for which the MS is permitted to report measurements results for specific set of IMSI pattern series.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFIMC: NCCPERM
attribute.dependencies: The values of the attributes: imsiSetANccPerm, imsiSetBNccPerm, imsiSetCNccPerm, and imsiSetDNccPerm cannot be duplicated.

attribute.name: imsiSetC
attribute.description:
Allowed IMSI series patterns for set C. MS with IMSI which matches defined pattern is assigned to a specified set of IMSI patterns. MS which belongs to a specific set of IMSI patterns receives allowed PLMN color codes specified for this set only. MSs perform radio signal measurements only for these cells which belong to allowed NCCs, thus handovers are allowed only to cells with allowed NCCs.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFIMC: IMSIPAT
attribute.dependencies: IMSI series pattern cannot match other defined IMSI series patterns in the set and in other sets.

attribute.name: imsiSetCNccPerm
attribute.description:
Allowed network color codes for set C.
Specifies network color codes on the BCCH carriers for which the MS is permitted to report measurements results for specific set of IMSI pattern series.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFIMC: NCCPERM
attribute.dependencies: The values of the attributes: imsiSetANccPerm, imsiSetBNccPerm, imsiSetCNccPerm, and imsiSetDNccPerm cannot be duplicated.

attribute.name: imsiSetD
attribute.description:
Allowed IMSI series patterns for set D. MS with IMSI which matches defined pattern is assigned to a specified set of IMSI patterns. MS which belongs to a specific set of IMSI patterns receives allowed PLMN color codes specified for this set only. MSs perform radio signal measurements only for these cells which belong to allowed NCCs, thus handovers are allowed only to cells with allowed NCCs.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFIMC: IMSIPAT
attribute.dependencies: IMSI series pattern cannot match other defined IMSI series patterns in the set and in other sets.

attribute.name: imsiSetDNccPerm
attribute.description:
Allowed network color codes for set D. Specifies network color codes on the BCCH carriers for which the MS is permitted to report measurements results for specific set of IMSI pattern series.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFIMC: NCCPERM
attribute.dependencies: The values of the attributes: imsiSetANccPerm, imsiSetBNccPerm, imsiSetCNccPerm, and imsiSetDNccPerm cannot be duplicated.

attribute.name: imsiSetASpid
attribute.description:
Sets SPID for IMSI set A.
SPID is set for IMSI set A for the functionality Fast Return to WCDMA after Call Release or Fast Return to LTE after Call Release.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFIMC: SPID

attribute.name: imsiSetBSpid
attribute.description:
Sets SPID for IMSI set B.
SPID is set for IMSI set B for the functionality Fast Return to WCDMA after Call Release or Fast Return to LTE after Call Release.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFIMC: SPID

attribute.name: imsiSetCSpid
attribute.description:
Sets SPID for IMSI set B.
SPID is set for IMSI set B for the functionality Fast Return to WCDMA after Call Release or Fast Return to LTE after Call Release.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFIMC: SPID

attribute.name: imsiSetDSpid
attribute.description:
Sets SPID for IMSI set B.
SPID is set for IMSI set B for the functionality Fast Return to WCDMA after Call Release or Fast Return to LTE after Call Release.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFIMC: SPID

class.name: TbfReservationBsc
class.description: Contains TBF reservation data for the BSC.

attribute.name: tbfReservationBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: dlDelay
attribute.description:
The maximum time DL TBF is kept in delayed release mode.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=DLDELAY
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality Packet Data Efficiency, set by the attribute TbfReservation.packetDataEffState, is ACTIVE in the cell, this attribute is not used in this cell.

attribute.name: eSDelay
attribute.description:
The maximum time DL TBF is kept in Early Set-up mode.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=ESDELAY
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality Packet Data Efficiency, set by the attribute TbfReservation.packetDataEffState, is ACTIVE in the cell, this attribute is not used in this cell.

attribute.name: tbfDlLimit
attribute.description:
DL TBF limit.
Specifies the number of simultaneous TBFs for each PDCH. The PDCH reservations must be avoided over that number unless it is not possible to do the PDCH reservations somewhere else.
A value given for this attribute is interpreted as 10 times the real value. For example, if the real DL TBF limit is 1.5, the numeral value of this attribute is 15.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TBFDLLIMIT

attribute.name: tbfUlLimit
attribute.description:
UL TBF limit.
Specifies the number of simultaneous TBFs for each PDCH. The PDCH reservations must be avoided over that number unless it is not possible to do the PDCH reservations somewhere else.
A value given for this attribute is interpreted as 10 times the real value. For example, if the real UL TBF limit is 1.5, the numeral value of this attribute is 15.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TBFULLIMIT

attribute.name: tfiLimit
attribute.description:
TFI limit.
Specifies the minimum number of TFIs within a PSET that must be unused to allow the procedures Early Set-up and Delayed Release of a DL TBF to proceed.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TFILIMIT
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality Packet Data Efficiency, set by the attribute TbfReservation.packetDataEffState, is ACTIVE in the cell, this attribute is not used in this cell.

attribute.name: ulDelay
attribute.description:
The maximum time UL TBF is kept in EUL TBF mode.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=ULDELAY
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality Packet Data Efficiency, set by the attribute TbfReservation.packetDataEffState, is ACTIVE in the cell, this attribute is not used in this cell.

attribute.name: usfLimit
attribute.description:
USF limit.
Indicates the minimum number of USFs within a PDCH assigned to an UL TBF, that must be unused to allow the procedure EUL TBF mode to proceed. If several PDCHs are assigned to the UL TBF this condition should be fulfilled on each of them.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=USFLIMIT
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality Packet Data Efficiency, set by the attribute TbfReservation.packetDataEffState, is ACTIVE in the cell, this attribute is not used in this cell.

class.name: LinkQualityControl
class.description:
Contains information for the selection of different Modulation and Coding Schemes. This information is used for RLC data blocks in every EGPRS TBF.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: linkQualityControlId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: e2aInitMcs
attribute.description:
Initial MCS, UAS, or DAS for an E2A-TBF.
For downlink TBFs, values 1-4 are interpreted as MCS 1 to MCS 4 and values 5-12 are interpreted as DAS 5 to DAS 12.
For uplink TBFs, values 1-6 are interpreted as MCS 1 to MCS 6, values 7-11 are interpreted as UAS 7 to UAS 11, and value 12 is interpreted as UAS 11.
Depends on RLGSC: E2AINITMCS
attribute.statusInformation: Since G18.Q4 release, change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior.

attribute.name: e2aLqc
attribute.description:
EGPRS2-A link quality control activation state in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLGSC: E2ALQC
attribute.statusInformation: Since G18.Q4 release, change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior.

attribute.name: eInitMcs
attribute.description:
Sets the initial MCS for an E-TBF. The values 1-9 are interpreted as MCS 1 to MCS 9.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLGSC: EINITMCS

attribute.name: rttiInitMcs
attribute.description:
Initial MCS, UAS, or DAS for a TBF in RTTI mode.
For uplink and downlink E-TBFs, the values 1-9 are interpreted as MCS 1 to MCS 9 and the values 10-12 are interpreted as MCS 9.
For downlink E2A-TBFs, values 1-4 are interpreted as MCS 1 to MCS 4 and values 5-12 are interpreted as DAS 5 to DAS 12.
For uplink E2A-TBFs, values 1-6 are interpreted as MCS 1 to MCS 6, values 7-11 are interpreted as UAS 7 to UAS 11, and value 12 is interpreted as UAS 11.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLGSC: RTTIINITMCS

attribute.name: la
attribute.description:
Link Adaptation downlink for GPRS activation state. When attribute is set to ON, the optimal CS is chosen to suit the radio conditions at any moment.
Depends on RLGSC: LA

class.name: TbfReservation
class.description:
This MOC contains temporary block flow reservation data.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: tbfReservationId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: osrThresh
attribute.description:
The buffer level threshold for the One-slot TBF Reservation functionality.
Initially, and with a buffer level below this threshold, the MS is allocated with at most 1 PDCH in both uplink and downlink directions. When the buffer level for the MS exceeds this threshold, the allocation is performed according to the MS multislot class.
The value 0 indicates that One-slot TBF Reservation is disabled. Allocation of an MS is always done according to its multislot class.
The values 1-99 are obsolete, kept for compatibility reason. When set, the values are automatically changed to 100.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLPUC: OSRTHRESH
attribute.dependencies: This attribute can be automatically changed if small PSETs are configured in the cell with the attribute odPsetSize, When the attribute pdeAuto is set to ON then this attribute has no impact on the system.

attribute.name: packetDataEffState
attribute.description:
Packet Data Efficiency activation state in the cell.
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLPUI RLPUE
attribute.sideEffects: Once the functionality Packet Data Efficiency is activated in the cell, the limits set by the attributes TbfReservation.tbfUplinkLim, TbfReservation.tbfDownlinkLim, TbfReservationBsc.tbfUlLimit, TbfReservationBsc.tbfDlLimit and the timer set by the attribute ChannelAllocationAndOptBsc.pILTimer are disabled for the cell; the attributes ChannelAllocAndOpt.fPdch, ChannelAllocAndOpt.sPdch, and ChannelAllocAndOpt.primpLim can be automatically changed.

attribute.name: tbfDlLim
attribute.description:
Limit for average number of simultaneous downlink TBFs on each PDCH in the cell. PDCH reservations will be avoided over this limit, unless it is not possible to do the PDCH reservation in another cell.
0 Downlink TBF limit for the cell is defined by the attribute TbfReservationBsc.tbfDlLimit.
7 Limits to an average of 0.7 simultaneous downlink TBFs on each PDCH in the cell.
8 Limits to an average of 0.8 simultaneous downlink TBFs on each PDCH in the cell. . . . 100 Limits to an average of 10 simultaneous downlink TBFs on each PDCH in the cell.
Depends on RLGSC: TBFDLLIM

attribute.name: tbfUlLim
attribute.description:
Limit for average number of simultaneous uplink TBFs on each PDCH in the cell. PDCH reservations will be avoided over this limit, unless it is not possible to reserve TBF on other PDCHs.
0 Uplink TBF limit for the cell is defined by the attribute TbfReservationBsc.tbfUlLimit.
7 Limits to an average of 0.7 simultaneous uplink TBFs on each PDCH in the cell.
8 Limits to an average of 0.8 simultaneous uplink TBFs on each PDCH in the cell. . . . 70 Limits to an average of seven simultaneous uplink TBFs on each PDCH in the cell.
Depends on RLGSC: TBFULLIM

attribute.name: e2aFactor
attribute.description:
Relative EGPRS2-A factor.
Sets E2A-TBFs priority over E-TBFs, G-TBFs, or B-TBFs on E2A-PDCHs, both in reservations and scheduling of the TBFs. Attribute also indicates if E-TBFs may change the mode to B-TBFs or G-TBFs, so they can be re-reserved on B-PDCHs or G-PDCHs when no E-PDCHS are available.
0 E2A-TBFs and E-TBFs are equally handled.
1 E-TBFs may change the mode to B-TBFs or G-TBFs so they can be re-reserved on B-PDCHs or G-PDCHs, when no E-PDCHs are available.
2 E2A-TBFs weight is multiplied by two which gives a more frequent scheduling of E2A-TBFs compared with other non E2A-TBFs on the same PDCHs. The higher weight also affects the reservations of TBFs to avoid multiplexing of E-TBFs and E2A-TBFs on the same PDCHs. E-TBFs may change the mode to B-TBFs or G-TBFs so they can be re-reserved on B-PDCH or G-PDCHs, when no E-PDCHs are available.
3 E2A-TBFs weight is multiplied by three which gives a more frequent scheduling of E2A-TBFs compared with other non E2A-TBFs on the same PDCHs. The higher weight also affects the reservations of TBFs to avoid multiplexing of E-TBFs and E2A-TBFs on the same PDCHs. E-TBFs may change the mode to B-TBFs or G-TBFs so they can be re-reserved on B-PDCH or G-PDCHs, when no E-PDCHs are available. . . . 100 E2A-TBFs weight is multiplied by 100 which gives a more frequent scheduling of E2A-TBFs compared with other non E2A-TBFs on the same PDCHs. The higher weight also affects the reservations of TBFs to avoid multiplexing of E-TBFs and E2A-TBFs on the same PDCHs. E-TBFs may change the mode to B-TBFs or G-TBFs so they can be re-reserved on B-PDCH or G-PDCHs, when no E-PDCHs are available.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLGSC: E2AFACTOR
attribute.statusInformation: Since G18.Q4 release, change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior.
attribute.dependencies: The optional feature EDGE Performance Package must be available and the functionality EGPRS Prioritized Over GPRS must be activated in the BSC.

attribute.name: eFactor
attribute.description:
Relative EGPRS factor.
Sets E-TBFs priority over G-TBFs on E-PDCHs, both in reservations and scheduling of the TBFs. The attribute also indicates if G-TBFs can change the mode to B-TBFs, so they can be re-reserved on B-PDCHs when no G-PDCHs are available.
0 The functionality is not activated.
1 G-TBFs may change the mode to B-TBFs so they can be re-reserved on B-PDCHs, when no G-PDCHs are available.
2 E-TBFs get a relative weight two times higher than G-TBFs on E-PDCHs, which affects both scheduling and reservations of the TBFs. G-TBFs may change the mode to B-TBFs so they can be re-reserved on B-PDCHs, when no G-PDCHs are available.
3 E-TBFs get a relative weight three times higher than G-TBFs on E-PDCHs, which affects both scheduling and reservations of the TBFs. G-TBFs may change the mode to B-TBFs so they can be re-reserved on B-PDCHs, when no G-PDCHs are available. . . . 100 E-TBFs get a relative weight 100 times higher than G-TBFs on E-PDCHs, which affects both scheduling and reservations of the TBFs. G-TBFs may change the mode to B-TBFs so they can be re-reserved on B-PDCHs, when no G-PDCHs are available.
Depends on RLGSC: EFACTOR
attribute.statusInformation: Since G18.Q4 release, change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior.
attribute.dependencies: The optional feature EDGE Performance Package must be available and the functionality EGPRS Prioritized Over GPRS must be activated in the BSC.

attribute.name: eftaState
attribute.description:
EFTA activation state in the cell.
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFEFI RFEFE

attribute.name: epasState
attribute.description:
EPAS activation state in the cell.
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLEPI RLEPE
attribute.dependencies: To change this attribute, attribute Gprs.gprsSupState must be set to NO.

attribute.name: dcdlAct
attribute.description:
Activation state of the functionality Dual Carrier Downlink.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDDI RLDDE

attribute.name: egRatio
attribute.description:
Relative EGPRS GPRS ratio, which affects both scheduling and reservations of the TBFs.
This attribute controls the ratio of scheduled E-TBF data to G-TBF data established on single E-PDCH. If the attribute is set to 10-3, the algorithm aims to schedule E-TBF to G-TBF data in proportion 10 to 3. When it is not possible to handle requests on E-PDCHs due to lack of resources, G-TBFs or E-TBFs may be downgraded to provide capacity for the type prioritized in this attribute.
Expressed as egprsfactor-gprsfactor priority where:
egprsfactor E-TBFs priority on E-PDCHs, numeral 1-20
gprsfactor G-TBFs priority on E-PDCHs, numeral 1-20
Depends on RLGSC: EGRATIO
attribute.sideEffects: Depending on the priority of GPRS and EGPRS, G-TBFs or E-TBFs may change the mode and be re-reserved on B-PDCHs or G-PDCHs, when they are available.

attribute.name: odPsetSize
attribute.description:
The preferred number of on-demand PDCHs in each PSET created on demand in a cell.
This attribute is used to control creation of new on-demand PSETs instead of upgrading existing ones until creating of new PSET in a cell is no longer possible. On-demand PSETs are those, that do not consist of GPRS dedicated and semi-dedicated channels.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLPUC: ODPSETSIZE
attribute.dependencies: When the attribute pdeAuto is set to ON then this attribute has no impact on the system.
attribute.sideEffects: When small PSETs are configured by this attribute, the value of the attribute osrThresh can be changed automatically.

attribute.name: pdeAuto
attribute.description:
Automated Packet Data Efficiency.
Automation status of the functionality Packet Data Efficiency in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLPUC: PDEAUTO
attribute.sideEffects: When the attribute is set to ON, then attributes osrThresh, odePsetSize, ChannelAllocAndOpt.puThreshL, and ChannelAllocAndOpt.puThreshU have no impact on the system.

class.name: IdleModeAndPagingBsc
class.description: Contains the BSC level data used to handle MS Idle mode behavior, Paging and the MS network access.

attribute.name: idleModeAndPagingBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: csCellPage
attribute.description:
State of CS Cell Page functionality in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFCPI RFCPE

attribute.name: pagBundle
attribute.description:
Time for bundling PAGING COMMAND messages into PAGING COMMAND 2 message.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=PAGBUNDLE

attribute.name: pagLimit
attribute.description:
Maximum number of paging orders that the CP is allowed to send to the TRH per second.
If attribute value is not defined, there is no limitation.
1 - 10 orders per second 2 - 20 orders per second
. . . 9 - 90 orders per second 10 - 100 orders per second
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=PAGLIMIT

attribute.name: psCellPage
attribute.description:
State of PS Cell Page functionality in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFPPI RFPPE

attribute.name: bcchNormal
attribute.description:
Allocation of SYSTEM INFORMATION TYPE 13 message on BCCH.
Indicates the BCCH mode used in SYSTEM INFORMATION TYPE 13 message.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=BCCHNORMAL
attribute.dependencies: If attribute is set to CHECK_AGBLK, then BCCH mode depends on the number of reserved access grant blocks set by the attribute IdleModeAndPaging.agBlk. If the attribute IdleModeAndPaging.agBlk is set to 0, then the BCCH mode NORMAL is used. If the attribute IdleModeAndPaging.agBlk is greater than 0, then BCCH mode EXTENDED is used.

attribute.name: timer3101
attribute.description:
Specifies the time for MS establishment on the signaling channel.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TIMER3101
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute can be changed only when Market Adaptation M-196 is activated.

attribute.name: rfraLimit
attribute.description:
Recurring failed random access limit.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=RFRALIMIT
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute can be changed only when Market Adaptation M-326 is activated.

class.name: ChannelAllocAndOptBsc
class.description: Contains the BSC level data used for channels allocation and re-allocation. This class contains the data which is common for all GERAN cells in the BSC and defines how the BSC allocates channels in active mode, and re-allocates them when resources are in short supply.

attribute.name: channelAllocAndOptBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: pILTimer
attribute.description:
Packet switched domain idle list timer, in seconds.
Sets the value for the packet switched domain idle list timer. When an ODPDCH becomes idle, it is placed in idle list for the packet switched domain and this timer is started. When the timer expires for a PDCH, the channel is returned to circuit switched domain. This timer is also applicable for idle semi-dedicated PDCHs which after its expiration are deactivated.
For a PDCH with non-flexibly allocated Abis path, the timer value is calculated in the following way:
timer value = pILTimer
For a PDCH with flexibly allocated Abis path, the timer value is calculated in the following way:
timer value = pILTimer * pILTimerFlex / 100
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=PILTIMER

attribute.name: pILTimerFlex
attribute.description:
Packet switched domain idle list timer factor for PDCHs with flexibly allocated Abis path.
Defines together with attribute pILTimer, the timer value that specifies:
-The time, after which a PDCH with flexibly allocated Abis path, becomes idle before the channel is returned to circuit switched domain. -The time, after the last E-TBF was removed from an E-PDCH with flexibly allocated Abis path, before a capability downgrade of this E-PDCH is initiated.
The timer value is calculated in the following way:
timer value = pILTimer * pILTimerFlex / 100
The value is given as a percentage of attribute pILTimer value.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=PILTIMERFLEX

attribute.name: pSetChkPeriod
attribute.description:
Time between periodical check of GPRS dedicated channels, in minutes.
Specifies how often a checks is performed to verify that the GPRS dedicated channels are allocated on the best possible TCH group in the cell.
The value 0 means that no check is performed.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=PSETCHKPERIOD

attribute.name: diffChannelAllocEmergPrl
attribute.description:
Priority level for differential channel allocation for emergency calls.
Depends on RLDCI: EMERGPRL RLDCE

attribute.name: fBChAlloc
attribute.description:
Frequency band channel allocation preference.
Indicates if TCHs and SDCCHs on the BCCH frequency band should be selected first, last, or if there is no preference at channel allocation.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=FBCHALLOC
attribute.statusInformation: Since G18.Q2 release, change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior.

attribute.name: halfRateSupp
attribute.description:
HR channel support state.
Indicates whether the BSC support for HR channels is activated.
If channels exist in a cell and the attribute value is changed the cell must be halted if new channels are added in the cell.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=HALFRATESUPP
attribute.takesEffect: If the attribute value is changed, the channels are only affected if they are created or when they are re-configured at a restart.

attribute.name: pHState
attribute.description:
Preemption handling state.
Specifies whether preemption handling is not activated or is activated with or without considering priority levels. This applies for a call with Preemption Capability Indicator set when congestion occurs at channel allocation.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=PHSTATE

attribute.name: tchOptimization
attribute.description:
Optimization of TCH usage state.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=TCHOPTIMIZATION

attribute.name: sdcchEmerg
attribute.description:
SDCCH emergency reservation state.
Indicates whether the last idle SDCCH in a cell is reserved for emergency calls.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=SDCCHEMERG

attribute.name: bscMc
attribute.description:
Defines if multiple channel allocation is allowed for each MS connection in BSC internal cells.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLCDC: BSCMC

attribute.name: dCAHandover
attribute.description:
Differential channel allocation at Intra BSC Inter Cell Handover.
Indicates if differentiation according to the stored priority level for the connection is applied. The attribute value is not used at handover during assignment.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=DCAHANDOVER

attribute.name: diffChannelAllocState
attribute.description:
State of differential channel allocation function in the BSC.
When differential channel allocation is active, the allocation of a resource type at assignment is done by determining if the subscriber has priority or not.
Depends on RLDCI RLDCE
attribute.dependencies: To turn off this function, attribute diffChannelAllocEmergPrl should be set to no value.To turn on this function, attribute diffChannelAllocEmergPrl should be set to value 1-15.

attribute.name: initTch
attribute.description:
Initial number of TCHs.
Specifies the maximum number of TCHs to configure in channel group 0 during the initial configuration phase. Initial configuration phase is made to set up signalling channels and a determined number of TCHs in channel group 0 in all cells connected to the TGs that are being configured.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=INITTCH

attribute.name: maxNoSdcchTrx
attribute.description:
Maximum number of SDCCH/8 per TRX.
Specifies the maximum allowed number of SDCCH/8s per TRX and consequently the maximum allowed number of TRXs per TRH.
Attribute should be set when configuring new SDCCH/8s. If any TRH is already configured with greater number of TRXs than the value indicated by this attribute, the value can be increased only on stand-by side.
For the BSC types: Evo Controller 8200/BSC, Evo Controller 8230, and vBSC, the value 4 is recommended. For these BSC types, the value of this attribute is unconditionally set to 4 during the BSC SW update.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=MAXNOSDCCHTRX
attribute.disturbances: An increased value of this attribute will reduce the number of supported TRXs in the BSC.

attribute.name: gascStatus
attribute.description:
Activation state of the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFASI RFASE
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set to ACTIVE, when the functionality Automatic FLP, set by the attribute SonBsc. bscAflp, is ACTIVE.

attribute.name: vcoMode
attribute.description:
The operational mode for the functionality Voice Capacity Optimization in the BSC.
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAVCC: VCOMODE

class.name: PowerControl
class.description:
Contains configuration related to Power Control functionality for the GERAN cell. When subcell structure is defined this MO holds configuration attributes for the underlaid subcell and PowerControlOverlaid MO holds configuration for overlaid subcell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: powerControlId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: amrPcState
attribute.description:
State of the functionality AMR Power Control in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLAPI RLAPE
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute PowerControlUplink.dmsPcState must be set to ACTIVE for the uplink AMR Power Control to work in the cell. The value of the attribute PowerControlDownlink.dBtsPcState must be set to ACTIVE for the downlink AMR Power Control to work in the cell. This attribute is automatically set to ACTIVE when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be set to INACTIVE only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: hpbState
attribute.description:
Handover Power Boost activation state in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLPBI RLPBE
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set to ACTIVE, if the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by attribute Mobility.ahoState, is ACTIVE. The value of the attribute hpbState can be set to INACTIVE only if the value of the attribute Mobility.ahoState is set to INACTIVE.

class.name: Son
class.description:
Contains data for automatic radio network configuration for the cell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

validationRules.rule:
<schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='disjointExceptionLists' test='not(some $multi in @anrMutualExceptionList satisfies $multi = @anrSingleExceptionList)'>Cell cannot be present in both anrMutualExceptionList and anrSingleExceptionList simultaneously in <name path="."/></assert>
<assert id='exceptionListLength' test='(count(@anrMutualExceptionList)+count(@anrSingleExceptionList)+count(@anrSingleExceptionListExt)) le 64'>Total number of cells added to attributes anrMutualExceptionList, anrSingleExceptionList, and anrSingleExceptionListExt cannot exceed 64 in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript:
<schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='disjointExceptionLists' test='not(some $multi in @anrMutualExceptionList satisfies $multi = @anrSingleExceptionList)'>Cell cannot be present in both anrMutualExceptionList and anrSingleExceptionList simultaneously in <name path="."/></assert>
<assert id='exceptionListLength' test='(count(@anrMutualExceptionList)+count(@anrSingleExceptionList)+count(@anrSingleExceptionListExt)) le 64'>Total number of cells added to attributes anrMutualExceptionList, anrSingleExceptionList, and anrSingleExceptionListExt cannot exceed 64 in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: sonId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: aIrcT
attribute.description:
Activation status of the functionality Automatic IRC Tuning in the cell.
The availability of the attribute value ACTIVE depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLFCC: AIRCT

attribute.name: anrExcept
attribute.description:
Indicates if the functionality Automatic Neighbor Relations omits this cell in the BSC.
If set to YES, the functionality Automatic Neighbor Relations is blocked from creating or removing relations for this cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLELC: FUNC=ANR
attribute.sideEffects: If the attribute anrExcept is set to YES, then attributes anrMutualExceptionList, anrSingleExceptionList, and anrSingleExceptionListExt are cleared.

attribute.name: aFlp
attribute.description:
Activation status of the functionality Automatic FLP in the cell.
The availability of the attribute value ACTIVE depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLFCC: AFLP
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set to ACTIVE, the functionality Quality based Timeslot Allocation, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.qtaStatus, is automatically turned on in the cell.

attribute.name: anrSingleExceptionList
attribute.description:
Single internal direction cell relation blacklist for functionality Automatic Neighbor Relations.
The functionality Automatic Neighbor Relations is blocked from creating or removing single relations between the internal cell and cells added to this list.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLELC: FUNC=ANR CELLR SINGLE
attribute.dependencies: A cell cannot be listed in both attributes anrMutualExceptionList and anrSingleExceptionList at the same time. The total number of cells, listed in attributes anrMutualExceptionList, anrSingleExceptionList, and anrSingleExceptionListExt, cannot exceed 64 elements. The attribute can only be set if the attribute anrExcept is set to NO.

attribute.name: anrMutualExceptionList
attribute.description:
Multi-direction cell relation blacklist for the functionality Automatic Neighbor Relations.
The functionality Automatic Neighbor Relations is blocked from creating or removing mutual relations between the internal cell and cells added to this list.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLELC: FUNC=ANR CELLR
attribute.dependencies: A cell cannot be listed in both attributes anrMutualExceptionList and anrSingleExceptionList at the same time. The total number of cells, listed in attributes anrMutualExceptionList, anrSingleExceptionList, and anrSingleExceptionListExt, cannot exceed 64 elements. The attribute can only be set if the attribute anrExcept is set to NO.

attribute.name: anrSingleExceptionListExt
attribute.description:
Single external direction cell relation blacklist for functionality Automatic Neighbor Relations.
The functionality Automatic Neighbor Relations is blocked from creating or removing single relations between the internal cell and cells added to this list.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLELC: FUNC=ANR CELLR SINGLE
attribute.dependencies: The total number of cells, listed in attributes anrMutualExceptionList, anrSingleExceptionList, and anrSingleExceptionListExt, cannot exceed 64 elements. The attribute can only be set if the attribute anrExcept is set to NO.

class.name: PowerControlBsc
class.description: Contains power control configuration data for GPRS and emergency calls.

attribute.name: powerControlBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: alpha
attribute.description:
Power control.
Defines the value of GPRS power control included in messages SYSTEM INFORMATION TYPE 13.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=ALPHA

attribute.name: maxPwrUtdoa
attribute.description:
Delay power control for emergency calls.
Specifies the time interval when MS is allowed to send on maximum allowed output power level during the Uplink-Time Difference of Arrival positioning. If attribute is set to 0, then functionality is not active.
The availability of the attribute values other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=MAXPWRUTDOA

attribute.name: dtxFul
attribute.description:
Number of measurement periods before FULL measurement periods are used on uplink.
Attribute is given asnumber of SACCH periods.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLMAC: DTXFUL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE in at least one internal cell in the BSC. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE in all internal cells in the BSC.

attribute.name: qLenDl
attribute.description:
Length of stationary quality filter on downlink used by the Dynamic BTS Power Control algorithm.
Attribute is given asthe number of SACCH periods.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBAC: QLENDL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE in at least one internal cell in the BSC. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE in all internal cells in the BSC.

attribute.name: qLenUl
attribute.description:
Length of stationary quality filter on uplink used by the Dynamic MS Power Control algorithm.
Attribute is given as number of SACCH periods.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLMAC: QLENUL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE in at least one internal cell in the BSC. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE in all internal cells in the BSC.

attribute.name: regIntDl
attribute.description:
Regulation interval on downlink used by the Dynamic BTS Power Control algorithm.
Attribute is given as number of SACCH periods.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBAC: REGINTDL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE in at least one internal cell in the BSC. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE in all internal cells in the BSC.

attribute.name: regIntUl
attribute.description:
Regulation interval on uplink used by the Dynamic MS Power Control algorithm.
Attribute is given as number of SACCH periods.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLMAC: REGINTUL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE in at least one internal cell in the BSC. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE in all internal cells in the BSC.

attribute.name: ssLenDl
attribute.description:
Length of signal strength filter on downlink used by the Dynamic BTS Power Control algorithm.
Attribute is given as number of SACCH periods.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBAC: SSLENDL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE in at least one internal cell in the BSC. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE in all internal cells in the BSC.

attribute.name: ssLenUl
attribute.description:
Length of signal strength filter on uplink used by the Dynamic MS Power Control algorithm.
Attribute is given as number of SACCH periods.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLMAC: SSLENUL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE in at least one internal cell in the BSC. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE in all internal cells in the BSC.

class.name: SmsCellBroadcastBsc
class.description: Contains Cell Broadcast data for the BSC.

attribute.name: smsCellBroadcastBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: smsCbS
attribute.description:
Source of SMSCB messages in BSC.
SMSCB messages defined by CBC node are automatically deleted when changing the source to MML.
The availability of the attribute value CBC depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFCBC: SMSCBS
attribute.precondition: Before changing SMSCB source to CBC node, all SMSCB messages defined in BSC must be removed.

class.name: Vamos
class.description:
Contains the data needed to configure VAMOS functionality in the cell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: vamosId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: aqpskOnBcch
attribute.description:
Enables AQPSK modulation for a TCH on the BCCH frequency.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: AQPSKONBCCH
attribute.precondition: To change this attribute, attribute GeranCell.state must be set to HALTED.

attribute.name: assv
attribute.description:
VAMOS allocation at reception of the message ASSIGNMENT REQUEST.
Indicates if the allocation of a channel for an MS in an active VAMOS pair at reception of the message ASSIGNMENT REQUEST is allowed.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: ASSV

attribute.name: clthV
attribute.description:
Indicates if the cell load thresholds for VAMOS allocation are enabled.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: CLTHV

attribute.name: qbaFrV
attribute.description:
Channel quality threshold for MSs in an active VAMOS pair using an AMR FR TCH.
Determines when an MS, using an AMR FR TCH, is removed from an active VAMOS pair due to bad quality.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: QBAFRV

attribute.name: qbaHrV
attribute.description:
Channel quality threshold for MSs in an active VAMOS pair using an AMR HR TCH.
Determines when an MS, using an AMR HR TCH, is removed from an active VAMOS pair due to bad quality.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: QBAHRV

attribute.name: qbAwbV
attribute.description:
Channel quality threshold for the MSs in an active VAMOS pair using an AMR-WB TCH.
Determines when an MS, using an AMR-WB TCH, is removed from an active VAMOS pair due to bad quality.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: QBAWBV

attribute.name: qbNaV
attribute.description:
Channel quality threshold for the MSs in an active VAMOS pair using a non-AMR TCH.
Determines when an MS using a non-AMR TCH is moved from an active VAMOS pair due to bad quality.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: QBNAV

attribute.name: qDesDlOffV
attribute.description:
VAMOS desired downlink quality offset.
Sets the offset for desired downlink quality for the used speech codec, when the MS becomes part of an active VAMOS pair.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: QDESDLOVN QDESDLOVP

attribute.name: qDesUlOffV
attribute.description:
VAMOS desired uplink quality offset.
Sets the offset for desired uplink quality for the used speech codec when the MS becomes part of an active VAMOS pair.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: QDESULOVN QDESULOVP

attribute.name: ssThrAssV
attribute.description:
Signal strength threshold at call setup for VAMOS allocation when ASSIGNMENT REQUEST is received.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: SSTHRASSV

attribute.name: ssThrV
attribute.description:
Changes the signal strength threshold for VAMOS allocation at call setup and handover.
The availability of attribure values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: SSTHRV

attribute.name: thrAV
attribute.description:
Sets the threshold for percentage of idle TCH BPCs, under which VAMOS allocation is initiated.
When the percentage of idle TCH BPCs in the cell falls below this value VAMOS allocation is initiated.
The availability of attribure values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: THRAV
attribute.dependencies: This attribute has effect on the system only if the attribute clthV is set to ON.

attribute.name: thrDV
attribute.description:
Sets the threshold for percentage of idle TCH BPCs, over which de-VAMOS evaluation is initiated.
When the percentage of idle TCH BPCs in the cell exceeds this value, de-VAMOS evaluation is initiated.
The availability of attribure values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: THRDV
attribute.dependencies: This attribute has effect on the system only if the attribute clthV is set to ON.

attribute.name: thrVp
attribute.description:
Sets the threshold for percentage of unblocked TCH BPCs, under which VAMOS packing is initiated.
When the percentage of unblocked TCH BPCs in the cell is below this value, VAMOS packing is initiated.
The availability of attribure values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: THRVP
attribute.dependencies: This attribute has effect on the system only if the attribute clthV is set to ON.

attribute.name: tscSet1Pairs
attribute.description:
MS use of TSC set 1 in an active VAMOS pair.
Determines if two MSs using TSC from TSC set 1 are allowed to form an active VAMOS pair.
NO Two MSs using TSC set 1 are not allowed to form an active VAMOS pair. YES Two MSs using TSC set 1 are allowed to form an active VAMOS pair.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC TSCSET1PAIRS
attribute.precondition: To change this attribute, attribute GeranCell.state must be set to HALTED.

attribute.name: vamosState
attribute.description:
State of the functionality VAMOS in the cell.
The availability of the attribute value ON depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCI RFVCE
attribute.dependencies: Can be set to ON only if the value of the attribute PowerControlUplink.dmsPcState is set to ACTIVE, and the value of the attributes GeranCell.irc and VamosBsc.vamosState is set to ON.
attribute.precondition: To change this attribute, attribute GeranCell.state must be set to HALTED. If the attribute GeranCell.xRange is set to YES, a subcell structure needs to be defined within the cell in order to set this attribute to ON.

attribute.name: vHoSuccess
attribute.description:
Status of the increased handover success rate for VAMOS.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: VHOSUCCESS

attribute.name: fullAqpsk
attribute.description:
Activation state of the function Full AQPSK.
Indicates if the output power from the BTS is to be shared unevenly between the two mobiles in a VAMOS pair.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFVCC: FULLAQPSK
attribute.precondition: To change this attribute, attribute GeranCell.state must be set to HALTED.

class.name: CellLoadSharing
class.description:
Contains the data needed for CLS configuration in the cell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='clsLevelLessThanClsAcc' test="(@clsLevel lt @clsAcc)">The value of the attribute clsLevel must be less than value of the attribute clsAcc in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='clsLevelLessThanClsAcc' test="(@clsLevel lt @clsAcc)">The value of the attribute clsLevel must be less than value of the attribute clsAcc in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: cellLoadSharingId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: clsAcc
attribute.description:
Cell load sharing acceptance level.
Sets percentage of available TCH BPCs, below which no handovers due to cell load sharing are accepted.
Depends on RLLCC: CLSACC
attribute.dependencies: Value must be greater than value of attribute CellLoadSharing.clsLevel.

attribute.name: clsLevel
attribute.description:
Cell load sharing level. Describes the percentage of available traffic channels, at which or below which cell load sharing evaluations are initiated.
Depends on RLLCC: CLSLEVEL
attribute.dependencies: Value must be less than value of attribute CellLoadSharing.clsAcc.

attribute.name: clsRamp
attribute.description:
Cell load sharing ramping time. Describes the interval, during which the value of attribute rHyst is ramped up from zero to the final value.
Depends on RLLCC: CLSRAMP

attribute.name: clsState
attribute.description:
State of the functionality Cell Load Sharing in the cell.
Depends on RLLCI RLLCE
attribute.dependencies: Attribute cannot be set to ACTIVE if Mobility.ahoState is set to ACTIVE.

attribute.name: hoClsAcc
attribute.description:
Status of handover due to cell load sharing accepted to this cell.
Depends on RLLCC: HOCLSACC
attribute.dependencies: Attribute cannot be set to ON if Mobility.ahoState is set to ACTIVE.

attribute.name: rHyst
attribute.description:
Reduction of the hysteresis values in the cell load sharing evaluation.
Depends on RLLCC: RHYST

class.name: HierarchicalCellStructure
class.description:
Contains the data needed for HCS configuration in cell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: hierarchicalCellStructureId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: fastMsReg
attribute.description:
Fast moving MS regulation handling state.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLLHC: FASTMSREG
attribute.precondition: Optional feature Radio Network Efficiency must be supported.

attribute.name: hcsIn
attribute.description:
HCS handover in threshold.
Specifies HCS traffic distribution level threshold to allow HCS handover into a neighbor internal GSM cell. For channel availability below this threshold HCS handover is not allowed.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLLHC: HCSIN

attribute.name: hcsOut
attribute.description:
HCS handover out threshold.
Specifies HCS traffic distribution level threshold to allow HCS handover out from a serving cell. For channel availability above this threshold HCS handover is not allowed.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLLHC: HCSOUT

attribute.name: layer
attribute.description:
HCS cell layer.
Each cell belongs to a layer. Layer 1 has the highest priority. It is recommended that the layers are defined in increasing order connected to the size of the area the cells cover.
For HCS with 3 layers and no HCS band: Numeral 1-3 For HCS with 8 layers and 8 HCS bands: Numeral 1-8
The availability of this attribute value depends on commercial agreements relating to optional feature Multi-Layer Hierarchical Cell Structures.
Depends on RLLHC: LAYER

attribute.name: layerHyst
attribute.description:
Signal strength hysteresis when changing cell layers.
Indicates when the signal strength hysteresis is used for cell ranking within each HCS band.
Depends on RLLHC: LAYERHYST

attribute.name: layerThr
attribute.description:
Signal strength threshold when changing cell layers.
Indicates when the signal strength threshold is used for ranking within each HCS band.
Depends on RLLHC: LAYERTHR

attribute.name: pSsTemp
attribute.description:
Signal strength penalty when cell layer change.
Depends on RLLHC: PSSTEMP

attribute.name: pTimTemp
attribute.description:
Penalty time when handover to different cell layer.
Depends on RLLHC: PTIMTEMP

attribute.name: pLayer
attribute.description:
Packet cell layer.
