Used to calculate the PRIORITY_CLASS for the cell using the formula 8 - pLayer.
When attribute is set to no value it means that broadcast value from procedure Locating Emulation is used.
Depends on RLPSC: PLAYER
attribute.dependencies: A Packet Broadcast Control Channel (PBCCH) has to be allocated in the cell in order to apply the functionality of this command.
attribute.precondition: Optional features Packet Specific Cell Plan and Multi-Layer Hierarchical Cell Structures must be available in the system.

attribute.name: pHcsThr
attribute.description:
Packet HCS threshold.
Defines the HCS signal strength threshold and is used to calculate HCS_THR for the cell. When the cell is a serving cell the formula pHcrThr(s) - layerHyst(s) is used, and when the cell is a neighboring cell the formula pHcrThr (n) + layerHyst(n) is used. (s) and (n) indicate whether the values for the serving or neighboring cell are applied.
When attribute is set to no value it means that broadcast value from procedure Locating Emulation is used.
Depends on RLPSC: PHCSTHR
attribute.dependencies: A Packet Broadcast Control Channel (PBCCH) has to be allocated in the cell in order to apply the functionality of this command. The value of the attribute pHcsThr must be even.
attribute.precondition: Optional features Packet Specific Cell Plan and Multi-Layer Hierarchical Cell Structures must be available in the system.

class.name: PowerControlOverlaid
class.description:
Contains configuration related to the Power Control functionality for the overlaid subcell. If this MOC exists, a subcell structure is defined in the cell. When a subcell structure is defined this MOC holds the configuration attributes for the overlaid subcell and the PowerControl MOC holds the configuration attributes for the underlaid subcell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: powerControlOverlaidId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

class.name: MobilityOverlaid
class.description:
Contains configuration data for locating, cell locating intracell handover, and locating urgency. In this MOC attributes are related to the overlaid subcell, when cell structure is defined.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: mobilityOverlaidId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: iho
attribute.description:
Activation status of the functionality Intracell Handover.
Depends on RLIHC: IHO
attribute.dependencies: An intracell handover, requested for O&M purpose, overrides this attribute setting. For example, at blocking of a Time Slot in the BTS, an intracell handover is always allowed.

attribute.name: maxIho
attribute.description:
Defines the maximum number of intracell handovers in a sequence.
Depends on RLIHC: MAXIHO
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOptBsc.gascStatus, is ACTIVE in the BSC and at least one channel group in the cell is sharing the spectrum, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: qCompUl
attribute.description:
Quality deviation compensator factor uplink.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLPCC: QCOMPUL
attribute.statusInformation: Since G19.Q1 release, this attribute is replaced by the attribute PowerControlOverlaidUplink.qCompUl.
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set to 0, no regulation towards the desired quality uplink, expressed by the attribute PowerControlOverlaidUplink.qDesUl, is performed.

attribute.name: qLimDl
attribute.description:
Quality limit downlink for handover, used for urgency detection.
Depends on RLLUC: QLIMDL
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: qLimDlAfr
attribute.description:
Quality limit downlink for handover, for codec type AMR FR, used for urgency detection.
Depends on RLLUC: QLIMDLAFR
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: qLimDlAwb
attribute.description:
Quality limit downlink for handover, for codec type AMR-WB, used for urgency detection.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLLUC: QLIMDLAWB
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: qLimUl
attribute.description:
Quality limit uplink for handover, used for urgency detection.
Depends on RLLUC: QLIMUL
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: qLimUlAfr
attribute.description:
Quality limit uplink for handover, for codec type AMR FR, used for urgency detection.
Depends on RLLUC: QLIMULAFR
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: qLimUlAwb
attribute.description:
Quality limit uplink for handover, for codec type AMR-WB, used for urgency detection.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLLUC: QLIMULAWB
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: qOffsetDl
attribute.description:
Defines the offset for quality, downlink.
Depends on RLIHC: QOFFSETDLP QOFFSETDLN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qOffsetDlAfr
attribute.description:
Defines the offset for quality for the codec type AMR-FR, downlink.
Depends on RLIHC: QOFFSETDLAFRP QOFFSETDLAFRN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qOffsetDlAwb
attribute.description:
Defines theoffset for quality for the codec type AMR-WB, downlink.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLIHC: QOFFSETDLAWBP QOFFSETDLAWBN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qOffsetUl
attribute.description:
Defines the offset for quality, uplink.
Depends on RLIHC: QOFFSETULP QOFFSETULN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qOffsetUlAfr
attribute.description:
Defines the offset for quality for the codec type AMR-FR, uplink.
Depends on RLIHC: QOFFSETULAFRP QOFFSETULAFRN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qOffsetUlAwb
attribute.description:
Defines the offset for quality for the codec type AMR-WB, uplink.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLIHC: QOFFSETULAWBP QOFFSETULAWBN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: tIho
attribute.description:
Defines the intracell handover inhibition timer.
Depends on RLIHC: TIHO

attribute.name: tMaxIho
attribute.description:
Defines the time period within which two intracell handovers are considered to be in a sequence.
Depends on RLIHC: TMAXIHO
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is not used by the system when the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is ACTIVE.

attribute.name: dtcb
attribute.description:
Defines the distance to the cell border.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLOLC: DTCBN DTCBP
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOptBsc.gascStatus, is ACTIVE in the BSC and at least one channel group in the cell is sharing the spectrum, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: dtcbHyst
attribute.description:
Defines the hysteresis for distance to the cell border.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLOLC: DTCBHYST
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOptBsc.gascStatus, is ACTIVE in the BSC and at least one channel group in the cell is sharing the spectrum, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: lol
attribute.description:
Defines the pathloss threshold.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLOLC: LOL
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOptBsc.gascStatus, is ACTIVE in the BSC and at least one channel group in the cell is sharing the spectrum, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: lolHyst
attribute.description:
Hysteresis for path loss.
Depends on RLOLC: LOLHYST
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOptBsc.gascStatus, is ACTIVE in the BSC and at least one channel group in the cell is sharing the spectrum, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: nDist
attribute.description:
Defines the distance to neighboring cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLOLC: NDIST
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOptBsc.gascStatus, is ACTIVE in the BSC and at least one channel group in the cell is sharing the spectrum, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: nnCells
attribute.description:
Defines the number of neighboring cells.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLOLC: NNCELLS
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOptBsc.gascStatus, is ACTIVE in the BSC and at least one channel group in the cell is sharing the spectrum, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: taOl
attribute.description:
Defines the timing advance threshold in bit periods.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLOLC: TAOL
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOptBsc.gascStatus, is ACTIVE in the BSC and at least one channel group in the cell is sharing the spectrum, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: taOlHyst
attribute.description:
Defines the hysteresis for timing advance in bit periods.
Depends on RLOLC: TAOLHYST
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality GSM Automatic Shared Carrier, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOptBsc.gascStatus, is ACTIVE in the BSC and at least one channel group in the cell is sharing the spectrum, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

class.name: LchAvailSupervisionOverlaid
class.description:
Contains data for supervision of logical channels availability for the overlaid subcell.
If this object exists, a subcell structure is defined in the cell. When a subcell structure is defined, this MO holds configuration attributes for the overlaid subcell and LchAvailSupervision MO holds configuration for the underlaid subcell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: lchAvailSupervisionOverlaidId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: bcchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type BCCH.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=BCCH ACL

attribute.name: bcchLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for for the channel type BCCH.
When BCCH is defined in the UL subcell: - The default value for BCCH in the cell or the UL subcell is equal to 1. - The default value for BCCH in the OL subcell and all other channel types is equal to 0.
When BCCH is defined in the OL subcell: - The default value for BCCH in the cell or the UL subcell is equal to 0. - The default value for BCCH in the OL subcell is equal to 1. - The default value for other channel types is equal to 0.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=BCCH LVA

attribute.name: cbchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type CBCH.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=CBCH ACL

attribute.name: cbchLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for for the channel type CBCH.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=CBCH LVA

attribute.name: tchAmrFrAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 3.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR SPV=3 ACL

attribute.name: tchAmrFrLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 3.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR SPV=3 LVA

attribute.name: tchAmrHrAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH/H with speech version 3.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=HR SPV=3 ACL

attribute.name: tchAmrHrLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type TCH/H with speech version 3.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=HR SPV=3 LVA

attribute.name: tchAmrwbAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 5.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCH SPV=5 ACL

attribute.name: tchAmrwbLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 5.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCH SPV=5 LVA

attribute.name: tchBpcAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type BPC with TCHs.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCHBPC ACL

attribute.name: tchBpcLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type BPC with TCHs.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCHBPC LVA

attribute.name: tchEfrAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 2.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR SPV=2 ACL

attribute.name: tchEfrLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 2.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR SPV=2 LVA

attribute.name: tchFrAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 1.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR SPV=1 ACL

attribute.name: tchFrLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type TCH/F with speech version 1.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=FR SPV=1 LVA

attribute.name: tchHrAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type TCH/H with speech version 1.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=HR SPV=1 ACL

attribute.name: tchHrLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type TCH/H with speech version 1.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=TCH CHRATE=HR SPV=1 LVA

attribute.name: sdcchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type SDCCH.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=SDCCH ACL

attribute.name: sdcchLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for the channel type SDCCH.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: SCTYPE=OL CHTYPE=SDCCH LVA
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality Quality based Timeslot Allocation is activated in the cell, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.qtaStatus, the limit value used for the alarm CELL LOGICAL CHANNEL AVAILABILITY SUPERVISION can be lower than the value of the attribute.

attribute.name: slcaState
attribute.description:
State of the supervision of logical channels availability.
If an alarm is issued for the cell when attribute is set to DEACTIVATED or PERMANENTLY_DEACTIVATED, the alarm is ceased and the supervision is disconnected. When attribute is set to ACTIVATED, no alarm is issued if a cell is in state HALTED. If the cell state is changed to HALTED during the supervision, any earlier given alarm will cease and the supervision of this cell will be passive until the cell becomes ACTIVE again. An alarm is issued if the actual number of logical channels falls below the alarm limit value for a period of time.
Depends on RLSLI RLSLE
attribute.dependencies:
For the cell with a defined subcell structure, the supervision for BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings related thresholds is activated, when the following conditions are fulfilled: -The functionality BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings is activated in the cell, -The functionality Supervision of Logical Channels Availability is activated in both subcells.
For the cell without a defined subcell structure, the supervision for BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings related thresholds is activated, when the following conditions are fulfilled: -The functionality BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings is activated in the cell, -The functionality Supervision of Logical Channels Availability is activated for the cell.
For the cell with a defined subcell structure, the supervision BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings related thresholds is deactivated, when at least one of the following conditions is fulfilled: -The functionality BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings is deactivated in the cell, -The functionality Supervision of Logical Channels Availability is deactivated in at least one subcell.
For the cell without a defined subcell structure, the supervision for BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings related thresholds is deactivated, when at least one of the following conditions is fulfilled: -The functionality BTS Power Savings or MCPA Power Savings is deactivated in the cell, -The functionality Supervision of Logical Channels Availability is deactivated for the cell.
attribute.sideEffects: When a subcell structure is defined for the cell and supervision of logical channels availability is set to PERMANENTLY_DISCONNECTED in at least one subcell, then BTS power savings and MCPA power savings related thresholds are set to their default values. When a subcell structure is not defined and supervision of logical channels availability is set to PERMANENTLY_DISCONNECTED in the cell, then BTS power savings and MCPA power savings related thresholds are set to default values.

attribute.name: ecBcchAcl
attribute.description:
Alarm class for the channel type EC-BCCH.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=ECBCCH ACL

attribute.name: ecBcchLva
attribute.description:
Limit value for availability for for the channel type EC-BCCH.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSLC: CHTYPE=ECBCCH LVA

class.name: ChannelAllocAndOptOverlaid
class.description:
Contains overlaid subcell level data used for channel allocation and re-allocation.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: channelAllocAndOptOverlaidId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

class.name: DynamicFrHrModeAdaption
class.description:
Contains dynamic FR/HR mode adaptation thresholds data. This data is used for subscribers, for which the priority level is not used. This class can also contain instances of FrHrSubscrPrioLevel class, which represent dynamic FR/HR mode adaptation thresholds data for defined subscriber priority level. To create such instances, the functionality Speech Quality Priority, set by attribute dmPr, must be active. The priority level 1 is the highest and the priority level 14 is the lowest.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: dynamicFrHrModeAdaptionId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: dmQb
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR to FR mode adaptation due to bad quality status.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMQB
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dmQbAmr
attribute.description:
Channel quality threshold for change from HR to FR for dual rate MSs capable of AMR.
Indicates channel quality threshold for AMR capable MSs using TCH HR for subscribers for which the priority level is not used.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMQBAMR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dmQbNAmr
attribute.description:
Channel quality threshold for change from HR to FR for dual rate MSs not capable of AMR.
Indicates channel quality threshold for MSs not capable of AMR using TCH HR for subscribers for which the priority level is not used.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMQBNAMR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dmQg
attribute.description:
Dynamic FR to HR mode adaptation quality evaluations status.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMQG
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dmQgNAmr
attribute.description:
Channel quality threshold for change from FR to HR for dual rate MSs not capable of AMR.
Indicates channel quality threshold for MSs not capable of AMR using TCH FR for subscribers for which the priority level is not used.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMQGNAMR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dmQgAmr
attribute.description:
Channel quality threshold for change from FR to HR for dual rate MSs capable of AMR.
Indicates channel quality threshold for MSs not capable of AMR using TCH FR for subscribers for which the priority level is not used.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMQGAMR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dmSupp
attribute.description:
Status of the functionality Dynamic FR/HR Mode Adaptation in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMI RLDME
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value can be set to ON only if the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.codecRest is set to NONE. This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dmtFAmr
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR to FR mode adaptation threshold for MSs capable of AMR using HR TCH.
Describes a percentage value of number of unblocked TCH BPCs in the cell when dynamic FR/HR mode adaptation is enabled. When the number of idle TCH BPCs in the cell is over the value dynamic HR to FR mode adaptation is initiated for calls on AMR TCHs.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMTFAMR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dmtFNAmr
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR to FR mode adaptation threshold for MSs not capable of AMR using HR TCH.
Describes a percentage value of number of unblocked TCH BPCs in the cell when dynamic FR/HR mode adaptation is enabled and when the number of idle TCH BPCs in the cell is over the value dynamic HR to FR mode adaptation is initiated for calls not on AMR TCHs.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMTFNAMR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dmtHAmr
attribute.description:
Dynamic FR to HR Mode Adaptation threshold for MSs capable of AMR.
Describes a percentage value of number of unblocked TCH BPCs in the cell when the function Dynamic FR/HR Mode Adaptation is activated and the MS supports AMR HR. When the number of idle TCH BPCs in the cell is below the value of this attribute dynamic FR to HR mode adaptation is initiated.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMTHAMR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dmtHNAmr
attribute.description:
Dynamic FR to HR Mode Adaptation threshold for MSs not capable of AMR.
Describes a percentage value of number of unblocked TCH BPCs in the cell when dynamic FR to HR mode adaptation is enabled and the MS does not support AMR HR and when the number of idle TCH BPCs in the cell is below the value dynamic FR to HR mode adaptation is initiated.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMTHNAMR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dmPr
attribute.description:
Speech Quality Priority for Dynamic FR/HR Mode Adaptation status.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMPR

class.name: DynamicHrAllocation
class.description:
Contains Dynamic HR Allocation thresholds data. This data is used for subscribers, for which the priority level is not used. This class can also contain instances of HrSubscrPrioLevel class, which represents Dynamic HR Allocation thresholds data for defined subscriber priority level. To create such instances, the functionality Speech Quality Priority, set by the attribute dhPr, must be active. The priority level 1 is the highest and the priority level 14 is the lowest.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: dynamicHrAllocationId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: dha
attribute.description:
Activation state of the functionality Dynamic HR Allocation.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDHC: DHA
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value can be set to ON only if the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.codecRest is set to NONE. This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dtHAmr
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR Allocation threshold for MSs capable of AMR HR.
Defines a percentage of unblocked TCH BPCs in the cell when the functionality Dynamic HR Allocation is enabled and the MS supports AMR HR.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDHC DTHAMR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dtHAmrWb
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR Allocation threshold for MSs capable of AMR-WB.
Defines a percentage of unblocked TCH BPCs in the cell when the functionality Dynamic HR Allocation is enabled and the MS supports AMR-WB.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDHC DTHAMRWB
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dtHNAmr
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR Allocation threshold for MSs not capable of AMR HR.
Defines a percentage of unblocked TCH BPCs in the cell when the functionality Dynamic HR Allocation is enabled and the MS does not support AMR HR.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDHC DTHNAMR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dhaSs
attribute.description:
Status of the functionality Dynamic HR Allocation signal strength thresholds.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLCSC: DHASS
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dhaSsThraSs
attribute.description:
Signal strength threshold at assignment for Dynamic HR Allocation.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLCSC: DHASSTHRASS
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dhaSsThrHo
attribute.description:
Signal strength threshold at handover for Dynamic HR Allocation.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLCSC: DHASSTHRHO
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dhPr
attribute.description:
Activation state of the functionality Speech Quality Priority for Dynamic HR Allocation.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDHC: DHPR

class.name: DynamicAllocationOnAbis
class.description:
Contains data needed for dynamic allocation on Abis.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: dynamicAllocationOnAbisId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: dAmRcrAbis
attribute.description:
Status of the functionality Allocation of AMR FR with Reduced Codec Set in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDAC DAMRCRABIS

attribute.name: dAmRcrAbisPr
attribute.description:
Speech Quality Priority for Allocation of AMR FR with Reduced Codec Set.
Describes the status of the functionality Speech Quality Priority for Allocation of AMR FR with Reduced Codec Set in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDAC DAMRCRABISPR

attribute.name: athAbis
attribute.description:
Status of the functionality Abis Triggered HR Allocation in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDAC: ATHABIS
attribute.dependencies: The attribute value can be set to ON only if the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.codecRest is set to NONE.

attribute.name: athAbisPr
attribute.description:
Status of the functionality Speech Quality Priority for Abis Triggered HR Allocation in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDAC ATHABISPR

class.name: IdleChannelMeasurement
class.description:
Contains idle channel measurement data for the cell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='limit1LessThanLimit2' test="(@limit1 lt @limit2)">The value of the attribute limit1 must be less than value of the attribute limit2 in <name path="."/></assert> <assert id='limit2LessThanLimit3' test="(@limit2 lt @limit3)">The value of the attribute limit2 must be less than value of the attribute limit3 in <name path="."/></assert> <assert id='limit3LessThanLimit4' test="(@limit3 lt @limit4)">The value of the attribute limit3 must be less than value of the attribute limit4 in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='limit1LessThanLimit2' test="(@limit1 lt @limit2)">The value of the attribute limit1 must be less than value of the attribute limit2 in <name path="."/></assert> <assert id='limit2LessThanLimit3' test="(@limit2 lt @limit3)">The value of the attribute limit2 must be less than value of the attribute limit3 in <name path="."/></assert> <assert id='limit3LessThanLimit4' test="(@limit3 lt @limit4)">The value of the attribute limit3 must be less than value of the attribute limit4 in <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: idleChannelMeasurementId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: intAve
attribute.description:
Interference average period.
Describes the number of measurements, in number of SACCH multiframes, that must be used in the calculation of the interference band for a channel.
Depends on RLIMC: INTAVE

attribute.name: limit1
attribute.description:
Interference measurement value within interference band 1. Describes the threshold limit that defines the interference band for the function.
0 less than -110 dBm
1 -110 dBm to -109 dBm
.
.
58 -53 dBm to -52 dBm
59 -52 dBm to -51 dBm
Depends on RLIMC: LIMIT1
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute must be less than the value of the attribute limit2.

attribute.name: limit2
attribute.description:
Interference measurement value within interference band 2. Describes the threshold limit that defines the interference band for the function.
1 -110 dBm to -109 dBm
2 -109 dBm to -108 dBm
.
.
59 -52 dBm to -51 dBm
60 -51 dBm to -50 dBm
Depends on RLIMC: LIMIT2
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute must be greater than value of the attribute limit1 and less than the value of the attribute limit3.

attribute.name: limit3
attribute.description:
Interference measurement value within interference band 3. Describes the threshold limit that defines the interference band for the function.
2 -109 dBm to -108 dBm
3 -108 dBm to -107 dBm
.
.
60 -51 dBm to -50 dBm
61 -50 dBm to -49 dBm
Depends on RLIMC: LIMIT3
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute must be greater than value of the attribute limit2 and less than the value of the attribute limit4.

attribute.name: limit4
attribute.description:
Interference measurement value within interference band 4. Describes the threshold limit that defines the interference band for the function.
3 -108 dBm to -107 dBm
4 -107 dBm to -106 dBm
.
.
61 -50 dBm to -49 dBm
62 -49 dBm to -48 dBm
Depends on RLIMC: LIMIT4
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute must be greater than value of the attribute limit3.

attribute.name: icmState
attribute.description:
Idle channel measurement state.
Depends on RLIMI RLIME

class.name: SubcellLoadDistribution
class.description:
Contains subcell load distribution data for a cell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: subcellLoadDistributionId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: scld
attribute.description:
Subcell load distribution state in cell.
Depends on RLLLC: SCLD
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality Quality based Timeslot Allocation, set by attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.qtaStatus is active in the cell, change of this attribute has no impact on BSC behavior.

attribute.name: scldLOl
attribute.description:
Subcell load distribution limit in the overlaid subcell.
Changes the percentage level of idle TCH BPCs in the overlaid subcell. A value equal to or below this level causes subcell load distribution from the overlaid subcell to the underlaid subcell to be attempted.
Depends on RLLLC: SCLDLOL
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality Quality based Timeslot Allocation, set by attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.qtaStatus is active in the cell, change of this attribute has no impact on BSC behavior. No attempt to distribute traffic connections is made if the number of idle TCH BPCs in the underlaid subcell is equal to or below the value set by the attribute scldLUl or if a subcell load distribution causes this to happen.

attribute.name: scldLUl
attribute.description:
Subcell load distribution limit in the underlaid subcell.
Changes the percentage level of idle TCH BPCs in the underlaid subcell. A value equal to or below this level causes subcell load distribution from the underlaid subcell to the overlaid subcell to be attempted.
Depends on RLLLC: SCLDLUL
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality Quality based Timeslot Allocation, set by attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.qtaStatus is active in the cell, change of this attribute has no impact on BSC behavior. No attempt to distribute traffic connections is made if the number of idle TCH BPCs in the overlaid subcell is equal to or below the value set by attribute scldLOl or if a subcell load distribution causes this to happen.

attribute.name: scldSc
attribute.description:
Preferred subcell at subcell load distribution.
Depends on RLLLC: SCLDSC
attribute.dependencies: When the functionality Quality based Timeslot Allocation, set by attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.qtaStatus is active in the cell, change of this attribute has no impact on BSC behavior.

class.name: LchAdaptiveConf
class.description:
Contains data for adaptive configuration of logical channel.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: lchAdaptiveConfId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: acState
attribute.description:
State of the functionality Adaptive Configuration of Logical Channels in the cell.
The function gives the system a possibility to manage peaks in SDCCH demand while keeping the number of available TCHs at a high overall level. From a basic configuration of SDCCH/8, the function can dynamically change the number of SDCCH/8 in the cell depending on the demand for such channels. The number of SDCCH/8 is never decreased below the basic configuration. An increase of the number of SDCCH/8 in the cell requires that idle TCHs exist. If a subcell structure is defined for the cell, then the number of SDCCH/8 is only changed in the underlaid cell.
The availability of the attribute value ON depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLACI RLACE
attribute.dependencies: When functionality Quality based Timeslot Allocation, set by the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.qtaStatus is active in the cell, change of this attribute has no impact on the BSC behavior.

attribute.name: sLevel
attribute.description:
Defines the level of remaining SDCCH subchannels during an attempt to increase SDCCH/8 number.
An SDCCH/8 is added if the number of idle SDCCH subchannels in the cell is as low as or lower than value of this attribute. If attribute is set to CONG, it is recommended that immediate assignment on TCH is used in the cell.
Depends on RLACC: SLEVEL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is not used when the functionality Quality based Timeslot Allocation, set by attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.qtaStatus, is active in the cell.

attribute.name: sTime
attribute.description:
SDCCH time interval.
Defines the minimum time interval before an SDCCH/8, added by the function Adaptive Configuration of Logical Channels, is reconfigured back to a TCH when SDCCH demands is low.
Depends on RLACC: STIME
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is not used when the functionality Quality based Timeslot Allocation, set by attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.qtaStatus, is active in the cell.

class.name: DiffChannelAllocPrio
class.description: Contains DCA priority profiles. DCA priority profiles are used to decide the probability of channel allocation failure for a given RT.

attribute.name: diffChannelAllocPrioId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: diffChanPrioSdcch
attribute.description:
Differential channel allocation priority profile for SDCCH.
When the attribute is set, the SDCCHs are connected to a priority profile. When the attribute is set to no value, the DEFAULT priority profile is used.
Depends on RLPRC: CELL SCTYPE CHTYPE PP

attribute.name: diffChanPrioTchFr
attribute.description:
Differential channel allocation priority profile for TCH/F.
When the attribute is set, the TCH/Fs are connected to a priority profile. When the attribute is set to no value, the DEFAULT priority profile is used.
Depends on RLPRC: CELL CHTYPE CHRATE PP

attribute.name: diffChanPrioTchHr
attribute.description:
Differential channel allocation priority profile for TCH/H.
When the attribute is set, the TCH/Hs are connected to a priority profile. When the attribute is set to no value, the DEFAULT priority profile is used.
Depends on RLPRC: CELL CHTYPE SCTYPE CHRATE PP

class.name: Mobility
class.description:
Defines assignment and handover, how MS is measured in active mode and when MS is considered lost.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: mobilityId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: aw
attribute.description:
Assignment to worse cell switch.
Depends on RLLOC: AW

attribute.name: bcchDtcb
attribute.description:
Distance to cell border for channel group 0.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreement.
Depends on RLLOC: BCCHDTCBP BCCHDTCBN

attribute.name: bcchDtcbHyst
attribute.description:
Hysteresis for distance to cell border for channel group 0. The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreement.
Depends on RLLOC: BCCHDTCBHYST

attribute.name: bcchLoss
attribute.description:
Separate pathloss threshold value for the channel group 0.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreement.
Depends on RLLOC: BCCHLOSS

attribute.name: bcchLossHyst
attribute.description:
Hysteresis for pathloss for channel group 0.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreement.
Depends on RLLOC: BCCHLOSSHYST

attribute.name: bcchReuse
attribute.description:
BCCH frequency reuse in the cell. The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreement.
Depends on RLLOC: BCCHREUSE

attribute.name: fbOffs
attribute.description:
Frequency band group offset.
Sets the difference in pathloss between the lower frequency band group and the higher frequency band group.
The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreement.
Depends on RLLOC: FBOFFSP FBOFFSN

attribute.name: hystSep
attribute.description:
Signal strength separator for high and low signal strength cells.
Depends on RLLOC: HYSTSEP
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.aHoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: missNM
attribute.description:
Maximum number of consecutive missing measurements.
Specifies the maximum number of consecutive missing measurements, for serving or a neighboring cell, permitted before all old measurements are considered invalid.
The attribute is given as a number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
Depends on RLLOC: MISSNM
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.aHoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: scho
attribute.description:
SDCCH handover switch.
Indicates if handover on SDCCH is allowed.
Depends on RLLOC: SCHO

attribute.name: nshState
attribute.description:
State of the functionality Network Synchronized Handover in the cell.
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
The number of TSs supporting functionality Network Synchronized Handover depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLHSI RLHSE
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set to ACTIVE, if the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by attribute Mobility.ahoState, is ACTIVE.

attribute.name: emrState
attribute.description:
State of the functionality Enhanced Measurement Reporting in the cell.
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLEMI RLEME
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the BSC.

attribute.name: ncMode2Status
attribute.description:
Activation status of the functionality NC Mode 2 in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLNMI RLNME

attribute.name: ncProf
attribute.description:
NC profile list in the cell.
The newly added profile is inserted at the end of the list. The priority of profiles is determined by the order they are added. The profile that is added as first has the highest priority. The profile that is added as last has the lowest priority.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLNPI RLNPE

attribute.name: ncrpt
attribute.description:
NC time period for cell reselection measurement reporting in packet transfer mode.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLNMC: NCRPT

attribute.name: maxTa
attribute.description:
Timing advance limit when MS is considered lost.
Attribute is given in number of bit periods.
The attribute value ranges: For normal range cell: Numeral 0 - 63 For extended range cell: Numeral 0 - 219
The attribute value ranges, when Market Adaptation M-056 is activated: For normal range cell: Numeral 0 - 64 For extended range cell: Numeral 0 - 219.
Depends on RLLDC: MAXTA
attribute.dependencies: When Market Adaptation M-056 is activated, the value of the attribute for normal range cell can be set to 64. The value of the attribute can be greater than 63, when it is set for extended range cell, set by the attribute GeranCell.xRange to YES.

attribute.name: mbcr
attribute.description:
Multi band cells reported.
This attribute changes the number of neighbor cells for each frequency band supported, which must be included in the measurement report. Multi band cells reported are valid for multi band MSs.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSSC: MBCR
attribute.precondition: It is not allowed to change the attribute if the value of the attribute AxeParameterBsc.cceBaR is ACTIVE and the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: ahoState
attribute.description:
Activation status of the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization in the cell.
The availability of the attribute value ACTIVE depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLAHI RLAHE
attribute.sideEffects: During activation of the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization in the cell the following changes are performed: - The functionality Cell Load Sharing, set by the attribute CellLoadSharing.clsState, is automatically turned off in the cell. - Handover due to Cell Load Sharing is not accepted by the cell, assignment to Worse Cell is not allowed in the cell. - Assignment to cell other than serving cell is automatically turned on in the BSC. - The functionality Fast Assignment is automatically turned on in at least one cell in the BSC. - The functionality Enhanced HO Success Rate, set by attributes MobilityBsc.reEstL2 and MobilityBsc.repFAcch, is automatically turned on in the BSC. - The functionality Handover Power Boost, set by attribute PowerControl.hpbState, is automatically turned on in the cell. - The functionality Network Synchronized Handover, set by attribute nshState, is automatically turned on in the cell.
attribute.precondition: The value of the attribute cannot be changed to ACTIVE if there is no free space in Active BA-list or the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64. The value of the attribute cannot be changed to INACTIVE if the value of the attribute Mobility.ahoAddBcch is YES and the function Active BA-list Recording is active in the cell for any MO BaRecording other than system defined instance with identity GENNAMEBAR64.

attribute.name: ahoAddBcch
attribute.description:
Indicates if BCCH is added to Active BA-list by functionality Automatic Handover Optimization.
Depends on RLAHI RLDEC

attribute.name: ncThr
attribute.description:
NC buffer level threshold.
Specifies the value of the threshold, which controls permission for MS to enter or leave NC2 in packet transfer mode depending on the packet data size in the buffer to be send on the DL.
The attribute is expressed in bytes multiplied by 5120.
If the value of the attribute is set to 0, buffer level threshold does not affect changing of MS NC mode.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLNMC: NCTHR

class.name: LocatingFilter
class.description:
Contains configuration data for the cell locating filter. The evaluation selection attributes determine the type of filter to be used at quality and signalling evaluation of signalling or speech/data.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: locatingFilterId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: ferLen
attribute.description:
Defines how many FER values are used for calculating filtered FER value.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLLFC: FERLEN

attribute.name: qEvalSd
attribute.description:
The filter type for quality filtering in speech or data channel mode.
1 - 5 General FIR filters
6 Straight average filter
7 Exponential filter
8 First order Butterworth filter
9 Median filter
Depends on RLLFC: QEVALSD
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the filtering algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: qEvalSi
attribute.description:
The filter type for quality filtering in signalling channel mode.
1 - 5 General FIR filters
6 Straight average filter
7 Exponential filter
8 First order Butterworth filter
9 Median filter
Depends on RLLFC: QEVALSI
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the filtering algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: qLenSd
attribute.description:
Duration of the quality filtering in speech or data channel mode.
The attribute is given as a number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
Depends on RLLFC: QLENSD
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the filtering algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: qLenSi
attribute.description:
Duration of the quality filtering in signaling channel mode.
The attribute is given as a number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
Depends on RLLFC: QLENSI
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the filtering algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: ssEvalSd
attribute.description:
The filter type for signal strength filtering in speech or data channel mode.
1 - 5 General FIR filters
6 Straight average filter
7 Exponential filter
8 First order Butterworth filter
9 Median filter
Depends on RLLFC: SSEVALSD
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the filtering algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: ssEvalSi
attribute.description:
The filter type for signal strength filtering in signaling channel mode.
1 - 5 General FIR filters
6 Straight average filter
7 Exponential filter
8 First order Butterworth filter
9 Median filter
Depends on RLLFC: SSEVALSI
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the filtering algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: ssLenSd
attribute.description:
Duration of the signal strength filtering in speech or data channel mode.
The attribute is given as a number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
Depends on RLLFC: SSLENSD
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the filtering algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: ssLenSi
attribute.description:
Duration of the ramping up in speech or data channel mode.
The attribute is given as a number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
Depends on RLLFC: SSLENSI
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the filtering algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: ssRampSd
attribute.description:
Duration of the ramping up in signaling channel mode.
The attribute is given as a number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
Depends on RLLFC: SSRAMPSD
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the filtering algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: ssRampSi
attribute.description:
Duration of the ramping up in signaling channel mode.
The attribute is given as a number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
Depends on RLLFC: SSRAMPSI
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the filtering algorithm in the cell.

class.name: LocatingPenalty
class.description:
Contains data for handover penalty.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: locatingPenaltyId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: pSsBq
attribute.description:
Signal strength penalty when handover due to bad quality.
Depends on RLLPC: PSSBQ
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.aHoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: pSsHf
attribute.description:
Signal strength penalty when handover failure.
Depends on RLLPC: PSSHF
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.aHoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: pSsTa
attribute.description:
Signal strength penalty when handover due to too large timing advance.
Depends on RLLPC: PSSTA
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.aHoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: pTimBq
attribute.description:
Penalty time when handover due to bad quality.
Depends on RLLPC: PTIMHF
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.aHoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: pTimHf
attribute.description:
Penalty time when handover failure.
Depends on RLLPC: PTIMHF
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.aHoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: pTimTa
attribute.description:
Penalty time when handover due to too large timing advance.
Depends on RLLPC: PTIMTA
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.aHoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by locating algorithm in the cell.

class.name: LocatingUrgency
class.description:
This MOC holds the cell locating urgency data attributes. When subcell structure is defined, this MOC holds configuration attributes for the whole cell and for the underlaid subcell. The MobilityOverlaid MO holds the corresponding configuration attributes for the overlaid subcell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: locatingUrgencyId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: cellQ
attribute.description:
Cell quality defines whether a cell is suitable for TRH RP load regulation.
Depends on RLLUC: CELLQ

attribute.name: qLimDl
attribute.description:
Quality limit downlink for handover used for urgency detection.
Depends on RLLUC: QLIMDL
attribute.dependencies: Used only in cells where the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by attribute Mobility.aHoState is not active. When subcell structure is defined, this is the configuration attribute for the underlaid subcell. The corresponding configuration attribute for the overlaid subcell is held in the MobilityOverlaid MO.

attribute.name: qLimDlAfr
attribute.description:
Quality limit downlink for handover for codec type AMR FR used for urgency detection.
Depends on RLLUC: QLIMDLAFR
attribute.dependencies: Used only in cells where the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by attribute Mobility.aHoState is not active. When subcell structure is defined, this is the configuration attribute for the underlaid subcell. The corresponding configuration attribute for the overlaid subcell is held in the MobilityOverlaid MO.

attribute.name: qLimDlAwb
attribute.description:
Quality limit downlink for handover for codec type AMR-WB used for urgency detection.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLLUC: QLIMDLAWB
attribute.dependencies: Used only in cells where the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by attribute Mobility.aHoState is not active. When subcell structure is defined, this is the configuration attribute for the underlaid subcell. The corresponding configuration attribute for the overlaid subcell is held in the MobilityOverlaid MO.

attribute.name: qLimUl
attribute.description:
Quality limit uplink for handover used for urgency detection.
Depends on RLLUC: QLIMUL
attribute.dependencies: Used only in cells where the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by attribute Mobility.aHoState is not active. When subcell structure is defined, this is the configuration attribute for the underlaid subcell. The corresponding configuration attribute for the overlaid subcell is held in the MobilityOverlaid MO.

attribute.name: qLimUlAfr
attribute.description:
Quality limit uplink for handover for codec type AMR FR used for urgency detection.
Depends on RLLUC: QLIMULAFR
attribute.dependencies: Used only in cells where the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by attribute Mobility.aHoState is not active. When subcell structure is defined, this is the configuration attribute for the underlaid subcell. The corresponding configuration attribute for the overlaid subcell is held in the MobilityOverlaid MO.

attribute.name: qLimUlAwb
attribute.description:
Quality limit uplink for handover for codec type AMR-WB used for urgency detection.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLLUC: QLIMULAWB
attribute.dependencies: Used only in cells where the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by attribute Mobility.aHoState is not active. When subcell structure is defined, this is the configuration attribute for the underlaid subcell. The corresponding configuration attribute for the overlaid subcell is held in the MobilityOverlaid MO.

attribute.name: taLim
attribute.description:
Timing advance limit for handover used for urgency detection.
Attribute is given in number of bit periods.
The attribute value ranges: For normal range cell: Numeral 0 - 63 For extended range cell: Numeral 0 - 219
The attribute value ranges, when Market Adaptation M-056 is activated: For normal range cell: Numeral 0 - 64 For extended range cell: Numeral 0 - 219.
Depends on RLLUC: TALIM
attribute.dependencies: When Market Adaptation M-056 is activated, the value of the attribute for normal range cell can be set to 64. The value of the attribute can be greater than 63, when it is set for extended range cell, set by the attribute GeranCell.xRange to YES.

class.name: LocatingIntraCellHandover
class.description:
This MOC contains IntraCellHandover related attributes. These attributes define certain conditions and circumstances under which IntraCellHandover will be performed. In this MOC, attributes are related to the cell when cell structure is not defined. In MobilityOverlaid, the same attributes are related to the subcell when cell structure is defined.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: locatingIntraCellHandoverId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: iho
attribute.description:
Indicates if intracell handover is allowed or not.
Intracell handover is a channel change between two channels within the same subcell, and if certain conditions are fulfilled a subcell change within a cell. Note: An intracell handover requested for O&M purpose, overrides this attribute setting. For example, at blocking of a Time Slot in the Base Station, an intracell handover is always allowed. Attribute is related to the cell when cell structure is not defined.
Depends on RLIHC: IHO

attribute.name: maxIHo
attribute.description:
Maximum number of Intracell handovers for the cell in a sequence.
Attribute is related to the cell when cell structure is not defined.
Depends on RLIHC: MAXIHO

attribute.name: qOffsetDl
attribute.description:
Offset for quality downlink.
Attribute is related to the cell when cell structure is not defined.
Depends on RLIHC: QOFFSETDLP QOFFSETDLN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qOffsetDlAfr
attribute.description:
Offset for quality downlink.
Used only for the codec type AMR-FR. Attribute is related to the cell when cell structure is not defined.
Depends on RLIHC: QOFFSETDLAFRP QOFFSETDLAFRN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qOffsetDlAwb
attribute.description:
Offset for quality downlink.
Used only for the codec type AMR-WB. Attribute is related to the cell when cell structure is not defined. The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLIHC: QOFFSETDLAWBP QOFFSETDLAWBN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qOffsetUl
attribute.description:
Offset for quality uplink.
Attribute is related to the cell when cell structure is not defined.
Depends on RLIHC: QOFFSETULP QOFFSETULN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qOffsetUlAfr
attribute.description:
Offset for quality uplink.
Attribute is used only for the codec type AMR-FR. Attribute is related to the cell when cell structure is not defined.
Depends on RLIHC: QOFFSETULAFRP QOFFSETULAFRN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qOffsetUlAwb
attribute.description:
Offset for quality uplink.
Used only for the codec type AMR-WB. Attribute is related to the cell when cell structure is not defined. The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLIHC: QOFFSETULAWBP QOFFSETULAWBN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: tiHo
attribute.description:
Intracell handover inhibition timer.
Attribute is related to the cell when cell structure is not defined.
Depends on RLIHC: TIHO

attribute.name: tMaxiHo
attribute.description:
Time within which two intracell handovers are considered being in a sequence.
Attribute is related to the cell when cell structure is not defined.
Depends on RLIHC: TMAXIHO
attribute.dependencies: Used only in cells where the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by attribute Mobility.aHoState, is not active.

class.name: RadioLinkTimeout
class.description:
Contains attributes related to Radio Link Timeout. These attributes define the time of the particular conditions and circumstances due to which call is disconnected.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: radioLinkTimeoutId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: rLinkT
attribute.description:
Radio link time-out on DL for non-AMR.
Defines the time before an MS disconnects a call due to failure in decoding SACCH messages for non AMR. The attribute is given as number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
Depends on RLSSC: RLINKT

attribute.name: rLinkTaFr
attribute.description:
Radio link timeout on DL for AMR FR.
Defines the time before an MS disconnects a call due to a failure in decoding SACCH messages for AMR FR. The attribute is given as number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSSC: RLINKTAFR

attribute.name: rLinkTaHr
attribute.description:
Radio link timeout on DL for AMR HR.
Defines the time before an MS disconnects a call due to failure in decoding SACCH messages for AMR HR. The attribute is given as number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSSC: RLINKTAHR

attribute.name: rLinkTAwb
attribute.description:
Radio link timeout on DL for AMR WB.
Defines the time before an MS disconnects a call due to failure in decoding SACCH messages for AMR-WB. The attribute is given as number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSSC: RLINKTAWB

attribute.name: rLinkUp
attribute.description:
The maximum value of the radio link timeout on UL counter for non-AMR.
The attribute is given as number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
Depends on RLLDC: RLINKUP

attribute.name: rLinkUpAfr
attribute.description:
The maximum value of the radiolink timeout on UL counter for AMR FR.
The attribute is given as number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLLDC: RLINKUPAFR

attribute.name: rLinkUpAhr
attribute.description:
The maximum value of the radiolink timeout on UL counter for AMR HR.
The attribute is given as number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLLDC: RLINKUPAHR

attribute.name: rLinkUpAwb
attribute.description:
The maximum value of the radiolink timeout on UL counter for AMR-WB.
The attribute is given as number of SACCH periods (480 ms).
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLLDC: RLINKUPAWB

class.name: PowerControlUplink
class.description:
This MOC contains configuration of the Power Control Uplink in the cell. When a subcell structure is defined, this MOC holds the configuration attributes for the underlaid subcell and PowerControlOverlaidDownlink MOC holds configuration attributes for the overlaid subcell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='msPcsAndMsrPwrHo' test="(not(@dmsPcState=0 and @msrPwrHoState=1))">The attribute msrPwrHoState can be set to ACTIVE only if the attribute dmsPcState is set to ACTIVE. The attribute dmsPcState cannot be set to INACTIVE if the attribute msrPwrHoState is set to ACTIVE. Faulty MO: <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='msPcsAndMsrPwrHo' test="(not(@dmsPcState=0 and @msrPwrHoState=1))">The attribute msrPwrHoState can be set to ACTIVE only if the attribute dmsPcState is set to ACTIVE. The attribute dmsPcState cannot be set to INACTIVE if the attribute msrPwrHoState is set to ACTIVE. Faulty MO: <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: powerControlUplinkId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: aPsUplinkPcState
attribute.description:
Activation state of the functionality Advanced PS UL Power Control.
The availability of the attribute value ACTIVE depends on commercial agreements.
Activation of the functionality Advanced PS UL Power Control increases the number of TSs supporting the feature in the BSC. The number of TSs supporting Advanced PS UL Power Control depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFUPI RFUPE

attribute.name: cchPwr
attribute.description:
The maximum transmit power an MS may use when accessing on a CCH.
Default values: For GSM 800: 39 For GSM 900: 39 For GSM 1800: 30 For GSM 1900: 30
The attribute value ranges: For GSM 800: Numeral 13 - 43 in steps of 2 For GSM 900: Numeral 13 - 43 in steps of 2 For GSM 1800: Numeral 4 - 30 in steps of 2 For GSM 1900: Numeral 4 - 30 in steps of 2
The attribute value ranges, when Market Adaptation M-254 is activated: For GSM 800: Numeral 5 - 39 in steps of 2 For GSM 900: Numeral 5 - 39 in steps of 2 For GSM 1800: Numeral 0 - 30 in steps of 2 For GSM 1900: Numeral 0 - 30 in steps of 2
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSSC: CCHPWR

attribute.name: dmsPcState
attribute.description:
Activation state of the functionality Dynamic MS Power Control.
The availability of the attribute value ACTIVE depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLPCI RLPCE RLPCP: DMPSTATE
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute cannot be changed to INACTIVE when the value of the attribute msrPwrHoState is ACTIVE. This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dtxU
attribute.description:
UL DTX use indicator for the cell.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLSSC: DTXU

attribute.name: gamma
attribute.description:
Power regulation, used by the MS to output power control.
Depends on RLGSC: GAMMA

attribute.name: msrPwrHoState
attribute.description:
Activation state of the functionality Reduced MS Power Level After Handover.
The availability of the attribute value ACTIVE depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLMRI RLMRE
attribute.dependencies: This attribute can be set to ACTIVE only if the attribute dmsPcState is set to ACTIVE. This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: msrPwrOffset
attribute.description:
MS power offset for the functionality Reduced Power Level After Handover in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLMRC: MSRPWROFFSETP MSRPWROFFSETN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: msRxMin
attribute.description:
Lower limit of signal strength in MS.
Specifies the minimum required signal strength, received at the MS in a given cell, to consider the cell a possible candidate for a handover.
Depends on RLLOC: MSRXMIN
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: msRxSuff
attribute.description:
Specifies the sufficient signal strength for path loss criteria in MS.
Depends on RLLOC: MSRXSUFF
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: msTxPwr
attribute.description:
Maximum transmit power for MS on connection.
Default values: For GSM 800: 39 For GSM 900: 39 For GSM 1800: 30 For GSM 1900: 30
The attribute value ranges: For GSM 800: Numeral 13 - 43 in steps of 2 For GSM 900: Numeral 13 - 43 in steps of 2 For GSM 1800: Numeral 4 - 30 in steps of 2 For GSM 1900: Numeral 4 - 30 in steps of 2
The attribute value ranges, when Market Adaptation M-254 is activated: For GSM 800: Numeral 5 - 39 in steps of 2 For GSM 900: Numeral 5 - 39 in steps of 2 For GSM 1800: Numeral 0 - 30 in steps of 2 For GSM 1900: Numeral 0 - 30 in steps of 2
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLCPC: MSTXPWR

attribute.name: qCompUl
attribute.description:
Quality deviation compensator factor uplink.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLPCC: QCOMPUL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set to 0, no regulation towards the desired quality uplink, expressed by the attribute qDesUl, is performed.

attribute.name: lCompUl
attribute.description:
Path loss compensator factor uplink.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLPCC: LCOMPUL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set to 0, no regulation towards the desired signal strength uplink expressed by the attribute ssDesUl, is performed.

attribute.name: qDesUl
attribute.description:
Desired quality uplink.
If the functionality AMR Power Control, set by the attribute PowerControl.amrPcState, is INACTIVE, this attribute is also used for the codec types AMR FR and AMR HR.
Depends on RLPCC: QDESUL
