attribute.dependencies: When attribute qCompUl is set to 0, no regulation towards the desired quality uplink is performed. This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qDesUlAfr
attribute.description:
Desired quality for the codec type AMR FR, uplink.
Depends on RLAPC: QDESULAFR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qDesUlAhr
attribute.description:
Desired quality for the codec type AMR HR, uplink.
Depends on RLAPC: QDESULAHR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qDesUlAwb
attribute.description:
Desired quality for the codec type AMR-WB, uplink.
The availability of this attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLAPC: QDESULAWB
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: ssDesUl
attribute.description:
Desired signal strength uplink.
If the functionality AMR Power Control, set by the attribute PowerControl.amrPcState, is INACTIVE, this attribute is also used for the codec types AMR FR and AMR HR.
Attribute is used internally in calculations as a negative value.
Depends on RLPCC: SSDESUL
attribute.dependencies: When the attribute lCompUl is set to 0, no regulation towards the desired signal strength uplink is performed. This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: ssDesUlAfr
attribute.description:
Desired signal strength for the codec type AMR FR, uplink.
Attribute is used internally in calculations as a negative value.
Depends on RLAPC: SSDESULAFR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: ssDesUlAhr
attribute.description:
Desired signal strength for the codec type AMR HR, uplink.
Attribute is used internally in calculations as a negative value.
Depends on RLAPC: SSDESULAHR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: ssDesUlAwb
attribute.description:
Desired signal strength for the codec type AMR-WB, uplink.
Attribute is used internally in calculations as a negative value.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLAPC: SSDESULAWB
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: ssOffsetUl
attribute.description:
Defines the offset for signal strength, uplink.
Depends on RLIHC: SSOFFSETULP SSOFFSETULN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: ssOffsetUlAfr
attribute.description:
Defines the offset for signal strength for the codec type AMR-FR, uplink.
Depends on RLIHC: SSOFFSETULAFRP SSOFFSETULAFRN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: ssOffsetUlAwb
attribute.description:
Defines the offset for signal strength for the codec type AMR-WB, downlink.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLIHC: SSOFFSETULAWBP SSOFFSETULAWBN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: ssDes16qam
attribute.description:
Desired signal strength for 16-QAM GPRS for the functionality Advanced PS UL Power Control.
The availability of this attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFUPC: SSDES16QAM

attribute.name: ssDes8psk
attribute.description:
Desired signal strength for 8-PSK GPRS for the functionality Advanced PS UL Power Control.
The availability of this attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFUPC: SSDES8PSK

attribute.name: ssDesGmsk
attribute.description:
Desired signal strength for GMSK GPRS for the functionality Advanced PS UL Power Control.
The availability of this attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFUPC: SSDESGMSK

attribute.name: bsRxMin
attribute.description:
Lower limit of signal strength.
Specifies the minimum required signal strength, received at the reference point, to consider the cell as a possible candidate for a handover.
Depends on RLLOC: BSRXMIN
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: bsRxSuff
attribute.description:
Specifies the sufficient signal strength for path loss criteria in base station.
Depends on RLLOC: BSRXSUFF
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.aHoState is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by locating algorithm in the cell.

class.name: PowerControlDownlink
class.description:
This MOC contains the configuration of the Power Control Downlink in the cell. When a subcell structure is defined, this MOC holds configuration attributes for the underlaid subcell and the PowerControlOverlaidDownlink MOC holds the configuration attributes for the overlaid subcell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='btsPcsAndBsPwrHo' test='(not(@dBtsPcState=0 and @rBsPwrHoState=1))'>The attribute rBsPwrHoState can be set to ACTIVE only if the attribute dBtsPcState is set to ACTIVE. The attribute dBtsPcState cannot be set to INACTIVE if the attribute rBsPwrHoState is set to ACTIVE. Faulty MO: <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='btsPcsAndBsPwrHo' test='(not(@dBtsPcState=0 and @rBsPwrHoState=1))'>The attribute rBsPwrHoState can be set to ACTIVE only if the attribute dBtsPcState is set to ACTIVE. The attribute dBtsPcState cannot be set to INACTIVE if the attribute rBsPwrHoState is set to ACTIVE. Faulty MO: <name path="."/></assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: powerControlDownlinkId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: bsPwr
attribute.description:
Base station effective radiated power.
Specifies the base station ERP, for the absolute RF channel in the cell defined for BCCH.
Depends on RLLOC: BSPWR
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: bsPwrB
attribute.description:
BS output power for BCCH RF channel numbers.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLCPC: BSPWRB
attribute.statusInformation: Since G19.Q2 release, this attribute is replaced by the attribute bsPwrBDec.
attribute.dependencies: The current BTS version may have specific restrictions. See the documentation for the current BTS version.

attribute.name: bsPwrMin
attribute.description:
Minimum BTS ERP used by the functionality Dynamic BTS Power Control.
The value is given for the absolute RF channel defined in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBCC: BSPWRMIN
attribute.dependencies: Current BTS version may have specific restrictions. See the documentation for current BTS version. This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: bsPwrT
attribute.description:
BS output power for non-BCCH RF channel numbers.
Sets the BS output power for non-BCCH RF channel numbers for a cell or underlaid subcell if a subcell structure is defined.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLCPC: BSPWRT
attribute.statusInformation: Since G19.Q2 release, this attribute is replaced by the attribute bsPwrTDec.
attribute.dependencies: If the attribute ChannelGroup.bsPwrT is set, it is used instead of the value of this attribute. The current BTS version may have specific restrictions. See the documentation for the current BTS version.
attribute.sideEffects: If subcell structure is defined change of this attribute overrides the attribute ChannelGroup.BsPwrTDec for the channel groups for which the attribute ChannelGroup.scType equals UL. If subcell structure is not defined change of this attribute overrides the attribute ChannelGroup.BsPwrTDec for all channel groups of the cell.

attribute.name: rBsPwrHoState
attribute.description:
State of the functionaliy reduced BTS power level after handover in the cell.
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBRI RLBRE
attribute.dependencies: Can only be set to ACTIVE if PowerControlDownlink.dBtsPcState=ACTIVE. This attribute is automatically set to ACTIVE when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be set to INACTIVE only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: bsRPwrOffset
attribute.description:
BTS power offset for the functionality Reduced Power Level After Handover in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBRC: BSRPWROFFSETP BSRPWROFFSETN
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: bsTxPwr
attribute.description:
Base station effective radiated power.
Specifies the base station ERP for the absolute RF channels in the cell or subcell not defined for BCCH.
Depends on RLLOC: BSTXPWR
attribute.dependencies: If the functionality Automatic Handover Optimization, set by the attribute Mobility.ahoState, is active in the cell, this attribute is not used by the locating algorithm in the cell.

attribute.name: dBtsPcState
attribute.description:
State of the functionality dynamic BTS power control.
The availability of the attribute value ACTIVE depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBCI RLBCE RLBCP: DBPSTATE
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute cannot be changed to INACTIVE when the value of the attribute rBsPwrHoState is ACTIVE. This attribute is automatically set to ACTIVE when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be set to INACTIVE only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: dlPcE
attribute.description:
Activation state of the functionality PS Downlink Power Control for EGPRS in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFPCI: DLPCE RFPCE: DLPCE

attribute.name: dlPcE2a
attribute.description:
Activation state of the functionality PS Downlink Power Control for EGPRS2-A in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFPCI: DLPCE2A RFPCE: DLPCE2A

attribute.name: dlPcG
attribute.description:
Activation state of the functionality PS Downlink Power Control for GPRS in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFPCI: DLPCG RFPCE: DLPCG

attribute.name: dtxD
attribute.description:
State of the functionality Downlink Discontinous Transmission in the cell.
Depends on RLCXC: DTXD

attribute.name: initDlPcE2a
attribute.description:
Sets the initial power reduction level used for PS Downlink Power Control for EGPRS2-A in the cell.
Depends on RFPCC: INITDLPCE2A

attribute.name: initDlPcG
attribute.description:
Sets the initial power reduction level used for PS Downlink Power Control for GRPS in the cell.
Depends on RFPCC: INITDLPCG

attribute.name: initDlPcE
attribute.description:
Sets the initial power reduction level used for PS Downlink Power Control for EGPRS in the cell.
Depends on RFPCC: INITDLPCE

attribute.name: qCompDl
attribute.description:
Quality deviation compensator factor, downlink, used by the Dynamic BTS Power Control algorithm.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBCC: QCOMPDL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set to 0, no regulation towards the desired quality downlink expressed by the attribute qDesDl is performed.

attribute.name: lCompDl
attribute.description:
Path loss compensator factor, downlink, used by the Dynamic BTS Power Control algorithm.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBCC: LCOMPDL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set to 0, no regulation towards desired signal strength downlink, expressed by the attribute ssDesDl, is performed.

attribute.name: qDesDl
attribute.description:
Desired quality downlink used by the Dynamic BTS Power Control algorithm.
If the functionality AMR Power Control, set by the attribute PowerControl.amrPcState, is INACTIVE, this attribute is also used for the codec types AMR FR and AMR HR.
Attribute is given in dtqu.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLBCC: QDESDL
attribute.dependencies: When the attribute qCompDl is set to 0, no regulation towards the desired quality downlink is performed. This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qDesDlAfr
attribute.description:
Desired quality for the codec type AMR FR, downlink.
Depends on RLAPC: QDESDLAFR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qDesDlAhr
attribute.description:
Desired quality for the codec type AMRHR, downlink.
Depends on RLAPC: QDESDLAHR
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: qDesDlAwb
attribute.description:
Desired quality for the codec type AMR-WB, downlink.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLAPC: QDESDLAWB
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: ssDesDl
attribute.description:
Desired signal strength downlink used by the Dynamic BTS Power Control algorithm.
If the functionality AMR Power Control, set by the attribute PowerControl.amrPcState, is INACTIVE, this attribute is also used for the codec types AMR FR and AMR HR.
Attribute is used internally in calculations as a negative value.
Depends on RLBCC: SSDESDL
attribute.dependencies: When the attribute lCompDl is set to 0, no regulation towards the desired signal strength downlink is performed. This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: ssDesDlAfr
attribute.description:
Desired signal strength for the codec type AMR FR, downlink.
Attribute is used internally in calculations as a negative value.

attribute.name: ssDesDlAhr
attribute.description:
Desired signal strength for the codec type AMR HR, downlink.

attribute.name: ssDesDlAwb
attribute.description:
Desired signal strength for the codec type AMR-WB, downlink.

attribute.name: ssOffsetDl

attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: bsPwrTDec
attribute.description:
BS output power for non-BCCH RF channel numbers with a decimal part of the value.
Sets the BS output power for non-BCCH RF channel numbers for a cell or underlaid subcell if a subcell structure is defined.
This attribute is interpreted as a fixed-point number, which means that 436 corresponds to 43.6 dBm and 430 to 43 dBm.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLCPC: BSPWRT
attribute.dependencies: If the attribute ChannelGroup.bsPwrTDec is set, it is used instead of the value of this attribute. The current BTS version may have specific restrictions. See the documentation for the current BTS version.
attribute.sideEffects: If subcell structure is defined change of this attribute overrides the attribute ChannelGroup.BsPwrTDec for the channel groups for which the attribute ChannelGroup.scType equals UL. If subcell structure is not defined change of this attribute overrides the attribute ChannelGroup.BsPwrTDec for all channel groups of the cell.

attribute.name: bsPwrBDec
attribute.description:
BS output power for BCCH RF channel numbers with a decimal part of the value.
This attribute is interpreted as a fixed-point number, which means that 436 corresponds to 43.6 dBm and 430 to 43 dBm.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLCPC: BSPWRB
attribute.dependencies: The current BTS version may have specific restrictions. See the documentation for the current BTS version.

Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

The value is given for the absolute RF channel defined in the cell.

Depends on RLBCC: BSPWRMINN BSPWRMINP
attribute.dependencies: Current BTS version may have specific restrictions. See the documentation for current BTS version. This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.

attribute.name: msTxPwr
attribute.description:
Maximum transmit power for MS on connection.
Default values: For GSM 800: 39 For GSM 900: 39 For GSM 1800: 30 For GSM 1900: 30
The attribute value ranges: For GSM 800: Numeral 13 - 43 in steps of 2 For GSM 900: Numeral 13 - 43 in steps of 2 For GSM 1800: Numeral 4 - 30 in steps of 2 For GSM 1900: Numeral 4 - 30 in steps of 2
The attribute value ranges, when Market Adaptation M-254 is activated: For GSM 800: Numeral 5 - 39 in steps of 2 For GSM 900: Numeral 5 - 39 in steps of 2 For GSM 1800: Numeral 0 - 30 in steps of 2 For GSM 1900: Numeral 0 - 30 in steps of 2
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLCPC: MSTXPWR

attribute.name: qCompUl
attribute.description:
Quality deviation compensator factor uplink.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLPCC: QCOMPUL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is automatically set when the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to ACTIVE. The value of the attribute can be changed only if the value of the attribute ChannelAllocAndOpt.vcoStatus is set to INACTIVE.
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set to 0, no regulation towards the desired quality uplink, expressed by the attribute PowerControlOverlaidUplink.qDesUl, is performed.

class.name: DiffChannelAllocPrioOverlaid
class.description:
Contains DCA priority profiles for the overlaid subcell.
DCA priority profiles are used to decide the probability of channel allocation failure for a given RT.

attribute.name: diffChannelAllocPrioOverlaidId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: diffChanPrioSdcch
attribute.description:
Differential channel allocation priority profile for SDCCH for the overlaid subcell.
When the attribute is set, the SDCCHs are connected to a priority profile. If the attribute is set to no value, the DEFAULT priority profile is used.
Depends on RLPRC: CELL SCTYPE CHTYPE PP

attribute.name: diffChanPrioTchFr
attribute.description:
Differential channel allocation priority profile for TCH/F for the overlaid subcell.
When the attribute is set, the TCH/Fs are connected to a priority profile. When the attribute is set to no value, the DEFAULT priority profile is used.
Depends on RLPRC: CELL CHTYPE CHRATE PP

attribute.name: diffChanPrioTchHr
attribute.description:
Differential channel allocation priority profile for TCH/H for the overlaid subcell.
When the attribute is set, the TCH/Hs are connected to a priority profile. When the attribute is set to no value, the DEFAULT priority profile is used.
Depends on RLPRC: CELL CHTYPE CHRATE PP

class.name: G12SubscrPrioLevel
class.description:
G12 Subscriber priority level.
Represents subscriber priority level for Abis paths thresholds data for TG MO in BTS logical model G12.
Instances of this MO are automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: g12SubscrPrioLevelId
attribute.description:
Holds the subscriber priority level for codec allocation and is also used when identifying the MO.
Defines the priority level for which dynamic HR allocation and AMR FR reduced codec allocation thresholds for 16 kbps pool of Abis paths and SCs are set.
The priority level 1 is the highest and the priority level 14 is the lowest.
The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RXATC: AHPRL

attribute.name: dAmrRedAbisThr
attribute.description:
AMR FR with reduced codec allocation threshold for 16 kbps pool of Abis paths.
Defines a threshold value for starting and stopping the allocation of AMR FR channels with reduced codec set using Abis devices from the 16 kbps pool for specific subscriber priority level. The threshold value is expressed as percentage of idle 16 kbps devices, out of nominal number of devices in the pool. The allocation of these channels due to shortage of Abis resources starts when the number of idle 16 kbps devices falls below the threshold value and ends when the number of idle 16 kbps Abis devices exceeds the value determined by this attribute. Default value for TG in the transmission mode TDM is 20.
The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RXATC: DAMRREDABISTHR

attribute.name: dHraAbisThr
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR allocation threshold for 16 kbps pool of Abis paths.
Changes a threshold value for starting and stopping the allocation of AMR HR and HR channels using Abis devices from the 16 kbps pool for specific subscriber priority level. The threshold value is expressed as percentage of idle 16 kbps Abis devices, out of nominal number of devices in the pool. The allocation of HR channels due to shortage of Abis resources starts when the number of idle 16 kbps Abis devices falls below the threshold value and ends when the number of idle 16 kbps Abis devices exceeds the value determined by this attribute. The allocation is stopped when the threshold value is set to 0. Default value for TG in the transmission mode TDM is 0.
The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RXATC: DHRAABISTHR

attribute.name: dHraAbisThrWb
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR allocation threshold for 16 kbps pool of Abis paths for AMR WB capable MSs.
Describes a threshold value for starting and stopping the allocation of AMR HR and HR channels using Abis devices from the 16 kbps pool for specific subscriber priority level. This threshold is used in AMR-WB capable cells for MSs that support AMR-WB. The threshold value is expressed as percentage of idle 16 kbps Abis devices, out of nominal number of devices in the pool. The allocation of HR channels due to shortage of Abis resources starts when the number of idle 16 kbps Abis devices falls below the threshold value and ends when the number of idle 16 kbps Abis devices exceeds the value determined by this attribute. The allocation is stopped when the threshold value is set to 0. Default value for TG in the transmission mode TDM is 0.
The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RXATC: DHRAABISTHRWB

attribute.name: sdAmrRedAbisThr
attribute.description:
AMR FR with reduced codec allocation threshold for packet Abis.
Describes a threshold value for starting and stopping the allocation of AMR FR channels with reduced codec set, in case of high transmission load on a packet Abis. The threshold value is expressed as percentage counted as the number of HDLC packets transmitted through the packed Abis divided by the maximum number of HDLC packets that can be transmitted within the timeframe. The allocation of these channels due to shortage of packet Abis resources starts when the number of transmitted HDLC packets exceeds the threshold value and ends when the number of transmitted HDLC packets falls below the value determined by this attribute. The allocation is stopped when the threshold value is set to 100. Default value for TG in the transmission mode SCM is 100.
The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RXATC: SDAMRREDABISTHR
attribute.dependencies: Can be changed only if TG transmission mode, set by the attribute g12Tg.tMode, is SCM.

attribute.name: sdHraAbisThr
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR allocation threshold for packet Abis.
Describes a threshold value for starting and stopping the allocation of AMR HR and HR channels, in case of high transmission load on packet Abis. This threshold is used in AMR-WB capable cells for MSs that support AMR-WB. The threshold value is expressed as percentage counted as the number of HDLC packets transmitted through the packet Abis divided by the maximum number of HDLC packets that can be transmitted within the timeframe. The allocation of HR channels due to shortage of packet Abis resources starts when the number of transmitted HDLC packets exceeds the threshold value and ends when the number of transmitted HDLC packets falls below the value determined by this attribute. The allocation is stopped when the threshold value is set to 100. Default value for TG in the transmission mode SCM is 100.
The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RXATC: SDHRAABISTHR
attribute.dependencies: Can be changed only if TG transmission mode, set by the attribute G12Tg.tMode, is SCM.

attribute.name: sdHraAbisThrWb
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR allocation threshold for packet Abis for AMR WB capable MSs.
Describes a threshold value for starting and stopping the allocation of AMR HR and HR channels, in case of high transmission load on packet Abis. This threshold is used in AMR-WB capable cells for MSs that support AMR-WB. The threshold value is expressed as percentage counted as the number of HDLC packets transmitted through the packet Abis divided by the maximum number of HDLC packets that can be transmitted within the timeframe. The allocation of HR channels due to shortage of packet Abis resources starts when the number of transmitted HDLC packets exceeds the threshold value and ends when the number of transmitted HDLC packets falls below the value determined by this attribute. The allocation is stopped when the threshold value is set to 100. Default value for TG in the transmission mode SCM is 100.
The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RXATC: SDHRAABISTHRWB
attribute.dependencies: Can be changed only if TG transmission mode, set by the attribute G12Tg.tMode, is SCM.

class.name: Dcp
class.description: DCP which is used as termination point in the BTS for the Abis path in the BTS logical model G12. This MO defines Abis path between the BSC and BTS. Creation of this MO is only possible for TGs in the transmission mode TDM.

attribute.name: dcpId
attribute.description:
Holds the DCP number and is also used when identifying the MO.
DCP is used as termination point in the BTS for the Abis path.
Depends on RXAPI: DCP RXAPE: DCP
attribute.dependencies: Can be set only if TG transmission mode, set by the attribute G12Tg.tMode, is TDM.

attribute.name: dev
attribute.description:
Transmission device for Abis path.
Only devices of the following types can be used: RBLT, RBLT2, RBLT3, and RBLT24.
Attribute cannot be changed once owning MO is created. Note: In case when attribute value needs to be changed, owning MO should be removed and created with new attribute value. This must be performed in two different transactions: first, DCP MO should be removed, then new DCP MO with required attribute value must be created.
1-13 characters expressed as dety-n. Where: dety Device type, identifier 1 - 7 characters n Device number, numeral 0 - MAX
The value MAX is determined by the SAE in the device owning block. Usually SAE 500. For details, see Application Information for appropriate block.
Example: RBLT2-4199.
Depends on RXAPI: DEV

attribute.name: res64k
attribute.description:
64 kbps Abis paths reservation indicator. Indicates if the pool of Abis paths dedicated to 64 kbps traffic is reserved for using by suitably configured TS only.
Attribute cannot be changed once owning MO is created. Note: In case when attribute value needs to be changed, owning MO should be removed and created with new attribute value. This must be performed in two different transactions: first, DCP MO should be removed, then new DCP MO with required attribute value must be created.
Depends on RXAPI: RES64K

attribute.name: dcpIndividual
attribute.description: Internal individual id.

class.name: G31SubscrPrioLevel
class.description:
Subscriber priority level and contains configuration of Abis path threshold data for it.
Instances of this MO are automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: g31SubscrPrioLevelId
attribute.description:
Holds the subscriber priority level for codec allocation and is also used when identifying the MO. This attributes specifies the priority level for which dynamic Half Rate (HR) allocation and Adaptive Multi-Rate Full Rate (AMR FR) reduced codec allocation thresholds are set. The priority level 1 is the highest and the priority level 14 is the lowest. The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RXATC: AHPRL

attribute.name: sdAmrRedAbisThr
attribute.description:
AMR FR with reduced codec allocation threshold for packed Abis. Defines a threshold value for starting and stopping the allocation of AMR FR channels with reduced codec set, in case of high transmission load on a packed Abis for specific subscriber priority level. The threshold value is expressed as percentage counted as the number of High-Level Data Link Control (HDLC) packets transmitted through the packed Abis divided by the maximum number of HDLC packets that can be transmitted within the timeframe. The allocation of these channels due to shortage of packet Abis resources starts when the number of transmitted HDLC packets exceeds the threshold value and ends when the number of transmitted HDLC packets falls below the value determined by this attribute. The allocation is stopped when the threshold value is set to 100. The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RXATC: AHPRL SDAMRREDABISTHR

attribute.name: sdHraAbisThr
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR allocation threshold for packet Abis. Defines a threshold value for starting and stopping the allocation of AMR HR and HR channels, in case of high transmission load on packet Abis for specific subscriber priority level. The threshold value is expressed as percentage counted as the number of High-Level Data Link Control (HDLC) packets transmitted through the packet Abis divided by the maximum number of HDLC packets that can be transmitted within the timeframe. The allocation of HR channels due to shortage of packet Abis resources starts when the number of transmitted HDLC packets exceeds the threshold value and ends when the number of transmitted HDLC packets falls below the value determined by this attribute. The allocation is stopped when the threshold value is set to 100. The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RXATC: AHPRL SDHRAABISTHR

attribute.name: sdHraAbisThrWb
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR allocation threshold for packet Abis for AMR-WB capable MSs. Defines a threshold value for starting and stopping the allocation of AMR HR and HR channels, in case of high transmission load on packet Abis for specific subscriber priority level. This threshold is used in AMR-WB capable cells forMSs that support AMR-WB. The threshold value is expressed as percentage counted as the number of HDLC packets transmitted through the packet Abis divided by the maximum number of HDLC packets that can be transmitted within the timeframe. The allocation of HR channels due to shortage of packet Abis resources starts when the number of transmitted HDLC packets exceeds the threshold value and ends when the number of transmitted HDLC packets falls below the value determined by this attribute. The allocation is stopped when the threshold value is set to 100. The availability of this attribute depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RXATC: AHPRL SDHRAABISTHRWB

class.name: BscM
class.description: Contains BSC configuration data.

attribute.name: bscMId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

class.name: PwsDisablingPeriod
class.description:
Contains configuration data for disabling periods per day of the week.
Disabling periods can be configured for MCPA or BTS Power Savings functionality.
MOC ID corresponds to the day of the week, where: 0 - Monday 1 - Tuesday 2 - Wednesday 3 - Thursday 4 - Friday 5 - Saturday 6 - Sunday

attribute.name: pwsDisablingPeriodId
attribute.description:
Holds the name of the day of the week the schedule is for, which is used when identifying the MO.
0 - Monday 1 - Tuesday 2 - Wednesday 3 - Thursday 4 - Friday 5 - Saturday 6 - Sunday
Depends on RLSVC: DAY

attribute.name: schedule1Begin
attribute.description:
Start time of the first schedule.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVC: DPSTIME
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is set to no value, when the attribute schedule1Period is set to no value.

attribute.name: schedule1Period
attribute.description:
Duration of the first disabling period.
A disabling time period must fall in the same day, that is, its duration cannot exceed midnight.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVC: DISABLETP
attribute.sideEffects: If this attribute is set to no value, then the attribute schedule1Begin is also set to no value.

attribute.name: schedule2Period
attribute.description:
Duration of the second disabling period.
A disabling time period must fall in the same day, that is, its duration cannot exceed midnight.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVC: DISABLETP
attribute.sideEffects: If this attribute is set to no value, then the attribute schedule2Begin is also set to no value.

attribute.name: schedule2Begin
attribute.description:
Start time of the second schedule.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVC: DPSTIME
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is set to no value, when the attribute schedule2Period is set to no value.

attribute.name: schedule3Period
attribute.description:
Duration of the third disabling period.
A disabling time period must fall in the same day, that is, its duration cannot exceed midnight.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVC: DISABLETP
attribute.sideEffects: If this attribute is set to no value, then the attribute schedule3Begin is also set to no value.

attribute.name: schedule3Begin
attribute.description:
Start time of the third schedule.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLSVC: DPSTIME
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is set to no value, when the attribute schedule3Period is set to no value.

class.name: GeranCellM
class.description: This MOC contains configuration of GERAN cells managed by the BSC.

attribute.name: geranCellMId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

class.name: SecurityBsc
class.description: Contains security configuration for Air interface on BSC level.

attribute.name: securityBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: algA51
attribute.description:
Status of the A5/1 ciphering algorithm in the BSC.
Depends on RLCAC: ALG

attribute.name: algA52
attribute.description:
Status of the A5/2 ciphering algorithm in the BSC.
Depends on RLCAC: ALG

attribute.name: algA53
attribute.description:
Status of the A5/3 ciphering algorithm in the BSC. The availability of this attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLCAC: ALG

attribute.name: algA54
attribute.description:
Status of the A5/4 ciphering algorithm in the BSC. The availability of this attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLCAC: ALG

attribute.name: rndFill
attribute.description:
Random Fill Bits support state.
Specifies if random filler bits are used in Layer 2 Data link messages on the Air interface.
The availability of the attribute value other than the default one depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=RNDFILL

attribute.name: repTchHo
attribute.description:
Repeated TCH handovers interval.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=REPTCHHO
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute can be changed only when Market Adaptation M-204 is activated.

attribute.name: cmcSdcchHo
attribute.description:
SDCCH handover after Ciphering Mode Complete.
Depends on RAEPC: PROP=CMCSDCCHHO
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute can be changed only when Market Adaptation M-202 is activated.

class.name: Security
class.description:
Contains configuration data for Air interface security.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: securityId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: ciph
attribute.description:
Activation status of ciphering in the cell.
Changes to the ciphering status do not affect established connections.
Depends on RLCAC: CIPH

attribute.name: rfbSi6
attribute.description:
State of the randomization of message System Information Type 6 in the cell.
The availability of the attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLRSI: RFBSI6 RLRSE: RFBSI6

class.name: FrHrSubscrPrioLevel
class.description:
Contains dynamic FR/HR mode adaptation thresholds data for defined subscriber priority level.
Instances of this MO are automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: frHrSubscrPrioLevelId
attribute.description:
Holds the subscriber priority level identity for dynamic FR/HR mode adaptation thresholds.
The priority level 1 is the highest and the priority level 14 is the lowest.
Depends on RLDMP: DMPRL

attribute.name: dmQbAmr
attribute.description:
Channel quality threshold for change from HR to FR for dual rate MSs capable of AMR.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMQBAMR

attribute.name: dmQbNAmr
attribute.description:
Channel quality threshold for change from HR to FR for dual rate MSs not capable of AMR.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMQBNAMR

attribute.name: dmQgNAmr
attribute.description:
Channel quality threshold for change from FR to HR for dual rate MSs not capable of AMR.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMQGNAMR

attribute.name: dmQgAmr
attribute.description:
Channel quality threshold for change from FR to HR for dual rate MSs capable of AMR.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDMC: DMQGAMR

class.name: IoT
class.description:
Contains IoT configuration data for the cell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: ioTId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: eDrxStatus
attribute.description:
Activation status of the functionality Extended DRX in the cell.
Depends on RLEDI: EDRXSTATUS RLEDE: EDRXSTATUS
attribute.dependencies: To set this attribute to ACTIVE, the BTS Soft Synchronization, set by attribute G12Tf.btsSoftSyncState or G31Tf.btsSoftSyncState, must be set to ACTIVE in TG, that is connected to channel group 0 of the current cell.

attribute.name: eabSubCat
attribute.description:
Targeted subcategory of MSs configured for EAB.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLILC: EABSUBCAT

attribute.name: iotLCStatus
attribute.description:
Activation status of the functionality IoT Load Control in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLILI: IOTLCSTATUS RLILE: IOTLCSTATUS

attribute.name: eabACManual
attribute.description:
Defines the EAB access classes, that are barred in the cell.
When set to no value, no EAB access classes are barred.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLILC: EABAC
attribute.dependencies: This attribute has no effect on the system, if the attribute eabACAuto is set to YES.

attribute.name: eabACAuto
attribute.description:
Defines if EAB access classes are barred automatically, based on load in the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLILC: EABAC
attribute.sideEffects: If this attribute is set to YES, attribute eabACManual has no effect on the system.

class.name: HrSubscrPrioLevel
class.description:
Contains Dynamic HR Allocation thresholds data for defined subscriber priority level.
Instances of this MO are automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: hrSubscrPrioLevelId
attribute.description:
Holds the subscriber priority level for dynamic HR mode allocation thresholds.
The priority level 1 is the highest and the priority level 14 is the lowest.
Depends on RLDHP: DHPRL

attribute.name: dtHAmr
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR Allocation threshold for MSs capable of AMR HR.
Describes a percentage of unblocked TCH BPCs in the cell when the functionality Dynamic HR Allocation is enabled and the MS supports AMR HR.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDHC DTHAMR

attribute.name: dtHNAmr
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR Allocation threshold for MSs not capable of AMR HR.
Describes a percentage of unblocked TCH BPCs in the cell when the functionality Dynamic HR Allocation is enabled and the MS does not support AMR HR.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDHC DTHNAMR

attribute.name: dtHAmrWb
attribute.description:
Dynamic HR Allocation threshold for MSs capable of AMR-WB.
Describes a percentage of unblocked TCH BPCs in the cell when the functionality Dynamic HR Allocation is enabled and the MS supports AMR-WB.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLDHC DTHAMRWB

class.name: IoTBsc
class.description: Contains IoT configuration data for the BSC.

attribute.name: ioTBscId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: qosAcStatus
attribute.description:
Activation status of the functionality GPRS Quality of Service Admission Control in the BSC.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFGQI: FUNC=QOSAC RFGQE: FUNC=QOSAC
attribute.dependencies: This attribute can be set to ACTIVE only if attributes QualityOfServiceBsc.qosMapping and QualityOfServiceBsc.pcuQos are set to INACTIVE in the BSC.

attribute.name: rplStatus
attribute.description:
Radio priority levels support for the GPRS Quality of Service Admission Control.
Activation status of the functionality Radio priority levels support for the GPRS Quality of Service Admission Control in the BSC. The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFGQI: FUNC=RPL RFGQE: FUNC=RPL
attribute.dependencies: This attribute can be set to ACTIVE only if attributes QualityOfServiceBsc.qosMapping and QualityOfServiceBsc.pcuQos are set to INACTIVE.
attribute.sideEffects: When set to ACTIVE, the functionality GPRS Quality of Service Admission Control, set by attribute qosAcStatus, will be activated.

attribute.name: psPosStatus
attribute.description:
Activation status of the functionality PS Positioning in the BSC.
The availability of the attribute value ACTIVE depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFPSI RFPSE

attribute.description:

attribute.dependencies: The attribute is set only if attributes rULogicalIdExt and rULogicalIdExt2 are set to no value.

attribute.description:

attribute.description:

attribute.dependencies: The attribute is set only if the attribute rULogicalIdExt2 is set to no value.

attribute.name: rULogicalIdExt2
attribute.description:

class.name: SpidEutranFrequency
class.description: Contains E-UTRAN ARFCN frequency SPID data.

attribute.name: spidEutranFrequencyId
attribute.description:
Holds E-UTRAN ARFCN from the Subscriber Profile ID Data.
Depends on RFSDC: EARFCN
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute SubcriberProfileIdTable.tState must be set to INACTIVE, the value of the attribute SubscriberProfileIdTable.tableType cannot be set to GW, and the value of the attribute SubscriberProfileId.action must be set to DEFPRIO to create the MO SpidEutranFrequency. The value of the attribute SubcriberProfileIdTable.tState must be set to INACTIVE to delete MO SpidEutranFrequency.

attribute.name: lPrio
attribute.description:
Sets the LTE frequency individual priority on E-UTRAN ARFCN.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RFSDC: LPRIO
attribute.dependencies: Can be set only if the value of the attribute SubscriberProfileId.action is set to DEFPRIO. Attributes SubscriberProfileId.gPrio, SpidEutranFrequency.lPrio, and SpidUtranFddFrequency.wPrio must not have the same priority values.

class.name: SpidUtranFddFrequency
class.description: Contains UTRAN FDD frequency SPID data.

attribute.name: spidUtranFddFrequencyId
attribute.description:
Holds UTRAN FDD ARFCN from the Subscriber Profile ID Data.
Depends on RFSDC: FDDARFCN
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute SubcriberProfileIdTable.tState must be set to INACTIVE, the value of the attribute SubscriberProfileIdTable.tableType cannot be set to GL, and the value of the attribute SubscriberProfileId.action must be set to DEFPRIO to create MO SpidUtranFddFrequency.

attribute.name: wPrio
attribute.description:
Sets the WCDMA frequency individual priority.
Depends on RFSDC: WPRIO
attribute.dependencies: Can be set only if the value of the attribute SubscriberProfileId.action is set to DEFPRIO. Attributes SubscriberProfileId.gPrio, SpidEutranFrequency.lPrio, and SpidUtranFddFrequency.wPrio must not have the same priority values.

class.name: SpidDefaultEutranFrequency
class.description: Contains default data for E-UTRAN ARFCN frequency in Subsriber Profile ID Data Table.

attribute.name: spidDefaultEutranFrequencyId
attribute.description:
Holds E-UTRAN ARFCN from the Subscriber Profile ID Data Table.
Depends on RFSDC: EARFCN SPID=DEFAULT
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute SubcriberProfileIdTable.tState must be set to INACTIVE, the value of the attribute SubscriberProfileIdTable.tableType cannot be set to GW, and the value of the attribute SubscriberProfileIdTable.defaultAction must be set to DEFPRIO to create the MO SpidDefaultEutranFrequency. The value of the attribute SubcriberProfileIdTable.tState must be set to INACTIVE to delete MO SpidDefaultEutranFrequency.

attribute.name: defaultLPrio
attribute.description:
Sets the default LTE frequency individual priority on E-UTRAN ARFCN.
Depends on RFSDC: LPRIO
attribute.dependencies: Can be set only if the value of the attribute SubscriberProfileId.action is set to DEFPRIO. Attributes SubscriberProfileIdTable.defaultGPrio, SpidDefaultEutranFrequency.defaultLPrio, and SpidDefaultUtranFddFrequency.defaultWPrio must not have the same priority values.

class.name: SpidDefaultUtranFddFrequency
class.description: Contains default data for an UTRAN FDD frequency in Subscriber Profile ID Data Table.

attribute.name: spidDefaultUtranFddFrequencyId
attribute.description:
Holds UTRAN FDD ARFCN from the Subscriber Profile ID Data Table.
Depends on RFSDC: FDDARFCN SPID=DEFAULT
attribute.dependencies: The value of the attribute SubcriberProfileIdTable.tState must be set to INACTIVE, the value of the attribute SubscriberProfileIdTable.tableType cannot be set to GL, and the value of the attribute SubscriberProfileIdTable.defaultAction must be set to DEFPRIO to create MO SpidDefaultUtranFddFrequency. The value of the attribute SubcriberProfileIdTable.tState must be set to INACTIVE to delete MO SpidDefaultUtranFddFrequency.

attribute.name: defaultWPrio
attribute.description:
Sets the default WCDMA frequency individual priority for Subscriber Profile ID Data Table.
Depends on RFSDC: WPRIO
attribute.dependencies: Can be set only if the value of the attribute SubscriberProfileId.action is set to DEFPRIO. Attributes SubscriberProfileIdTable.defaultGPrio, SpidDefaultEutranFrequency.defaultLPrio, and SpidDefaultUtranFddFrequency.defaultWPrio must not have the same priority values.

class.name: ConfResultM
class.description: Container for MOs with configuration results.

attribute.name: confResultMId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: transactionIdentity
attribute.description:
Transaction identity.
Internal attribute. Is used only by the system. Must not be used by a user. Contains confResultId of running configuration transaction from BSC AP to BSC CP. The attribute value is cleared when ongoing transaction is finished.

attribute.name: transactionContext
attribute.description:
Contains context of running configuration transaction from BSC AP to BSC CP.
Internal attribute. Is used only by the system. Must not be used by a user. The attribute value is cleared when ongoing transaction is finished.

attribute.name: continueOnError
attribute.description:
Sets continue on error behavior for transaction.
This internal attribute is used only by the system and must not be used by a user. If the attribute is set to YES within a transaction, then all formed MML commands are sent towards BSC CP even if some of them fail during MML execution. If the attribute is not set within a transaction or is set to NO, then MML commands execution stops on the first error. The attribute value is cleared when ongoing transaction is finished.
attribute.disturbances: Value YES shall be used carefully. All formed MML commands required for configuration are sent towards BSC CP. It could lead to the situation when one of the dependent commands is executed successfully and another failed. For example, if you configure cell and activate it in one transaction, cell configuration could fail but activation could succeed.

attribute.name: performValidationOnly
attribute.description:
Initiates validation of configuration changes without applying them.
This internal attribute is used only by the system and must not be used by a user. If the attribute is set to YES within a transaction, then configuration changes are validated for correctness in BSC AP, MML commands are not sent towards BSC CP. If the attribute is not set within a transaction or is set to NO, then configuration changes are validated in BSC AP and if validation is successfully passed then corresponding MML commands are sent towards BSC CP. The attribute value is always equal to NO.

class.name: ConfResult
class.description: Represents result of configuration transaction from the BSC AP to the BSC CP.

attribute.name: confResultId
attribute.description:
Holds the name used when identifying the MO.
Values 1-100 represent configuration progress result for transactions triggered from ECLI. Other values represent configuration progress result for transactions triggered from ENM tools.

attribute.name: errorMessage
attribute.description:
Error message containing the reason why configuration has failed on BSC CP.
Example: Command: RLSTC:CELL=LVIV,STATE=ACTIVE; Result: FAULT CODE 26, NO TG CONNECTED.

attribute.name: failedDnsAndAttributes
attribute.description:
Contains attributes and DNs of MOs for which MML command execution has failed towards BSC CP.
An attribute is stored in the value, if the attribute change request was provided in the configuration transaction and the corresponding MML command has failed towards the BSC CP. A DN of an MO is stored in the value, if creation or deletion of the MO was provided in the configuration transaction and the corresponding MML command has failed towards BSC CP.
If multiple attributes are provided in the configuration transaction and are handled by the same failed MML command, then all these attributes are stored in the value. In such cases, some of those attributes could be changed successfully on the BSC CP.
Example of an MO DN: BscM=1,Bsc=1,SonBsc=1
Example of an attribute representation: BscM=1,Bsc=1,SonBsc=1.bscAflp
Each value has a corresponding errorMessage.

attribute.name: confStatus
attribute.description: Status of configuration transaction from BSC AP to BSC CP.

attribute.name: succeededDnsAndAttributes
attribute.description:
Contains attributes and DNs of MOs, for which the configuration was successfully executed.
An attribute is stored in the value, if the attribute change request was provided in the configuration transaction and all corresponding MML commands were successfully executed towards the BSC CP. A DN of an MO is stored in the value, if the creation or deletion of the MO was provided in the configuration transaction and all corresponding MML commands were successfully executed towards the BSC CP.
Example of an MO DN: BscM=1,Bsc=1,SonBsc=1
Example of an attribute representation: BscM=1,Bsc=1,SonBsc=1.bscAflp

attribute.name: timeFinished
attribute.description: Date and time of when the configuration towards the BSC CP finished.

attribute.name: timeStarted
attribute.description: Date and time of when the configuration towards the BSC CP started.

attribute.name: transactionContext
attribute.description: Contains context of configuration transaction from BSC AP to BSC CP.

class.name: PhysicalData
class.description:
Contains physical data for the internal GERAN cell.
Instance of this MO is automatically created during the parent MO creation.

attribute.name: physicalDataId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

attribute.name: latitude
attribute.description:
Latitudinal position of the cell.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLDPC: LATITUDE

attribute.name: longitude
attribute.description:
Longitudinal position of the cell.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLDPC: LONGITUDE

attribute.name: minAltitude
attribute.description:
The lowest location in the cell with radio coverage.
Positive values correspond to the lowest location in the cell with radio coverage above the sea level and negative values correspond to the lowest location in the cell with radio coverage below the sea level.
Depends on RLDPC: MINALTP MINALTN

attribute.name: maxAltitude
attribute.description:
The highest location in the cell with radio coverage.
Positive values correspond to the highest location in the cell with radio coverage above the sea level and negative values correspond to the highest location in the cell with radio coverage below the sea level.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLDPC: MAXALTP MAXALTN

attribute.name: altitude
attribute.description:
Height or elevation of the ground above the WGS-84 ellipsoid.
Height or elevation of the ground above the WGS-84 ellipsoid on which the antenna structure is mounted.
Depends on RLDPC: ALTP ALTN

attribute.name: maxCellRadius
attribute.description:
Maximum radius for cell signal coverage.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system.
Depends on RLDPC: MAXCELLR

attribute.name: antennaHeight
attribute.description:
Antenna height over the ground.
Positive values correspond to antenna height over the ground above the sea level and negative values correspond to antenna height over the ground below the sea level.
Depends on RLDPC: HEIGHTP HEIGHTN

attribute.name: cellDirection
attribute.description:
Direction of a sector cell.
0 degrees mean north, 90 degrees mean east, 180 degrees mean south, 270 degrees mean west. Value 360 denotes an omnidirectional cell.
Depends on RLDPC: CELLDIR

attribute.name: antennaGain
attribute.description:
Antenna gain.
Depends on RLDPC: ANTGAINP ANTGAINN

attribute.name: antennaTilt
attribute.description:
Antenna tilt relative to the horizontal plane centered at the antenna output.
Positive values correspond to antenna tilt above the plane and negative values correspond to antenna tilt below the plane.
Depends on RLDPC: ANTTILTP ANTTILTN

attribute.name: sectorAngle
attribute.description:
The opening angle for the cell, aperture angle.
This attribute is not considered if the cell is omnidirectional.
Depends on RLDPC: SECTANG

attribute.name: envChar
attribute.description:
Environment characterization of the cell.
0 - Possible heavy multi-path and no LoS conditions. 1 - No or light multi-path and LoS conditions.
Depends on RLDPC: ENVCHAR

attribute.name: antennaType
attribute.description:
Antenna type.
Depends on RLDPC: ANTTYPE

class.name: SharedCarrier
class.description: Contains configuration data for shared spectrum central carrier in the cell.

attribute.name: sharedCarrierId
attribute.description:
Shared spectrum central carrier. Indicates shared spectrum central carrier for the cell. The value of shared spectrum central carrier is expressed in 100 kHz units.
Depends on RLASC: SSCARRIER

attribute.name: ssBandwidth
attribute.description:
Shared spectrum central bandwidth. Indicates shared spectrum bandwidth for shared spectrum central carrier for the cell.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLASC: SSBANDWIDTH

attribute.name: ssLFreq
attribute.description:
Shared spectrum lowest frequency. Indicates shared spectrum lowest frequency for shared spectrum central carrier.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLASC: SSLFREQ

attribute.name: ssHFreq
attribute.description:
Shared spectrum highest frequency. Indicates shared spectrum highest frequency for shared spectrum central carrier.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLASC: SSHFREQ

attribute.name: pucchod
attribute.description:
PUCCH over dimensioning. Specifies the number of NBRs, that must be shifted by the PUCCH at each band edge.
The attribute value ranges: For ssBandwith 0-14: Numeral 0 For ssBandwith 6-30: Numeral 0-3 For ssBandwith 32-50: Numeral 0-8 For ssBandwith 52-100: Numeral 0-20 For ssBandwith 102-150: Numeral 0-34 For ssBandwith 152-65534: Numeral 0-49
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLASC: PUCCHOD
attribute.dependencies: Setting the attribute pucchod to no value is possible together with setting the attributes ppp, pcid1, pcid2, pcid3, pcid4, pcid5, pcid6, pcid7, pcid8 to no value in one commit.
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set and the attribute ppp doesn't have value, then the value of the attribute ppp is set to 2.

attribute.name: ppp
attribute.description:
PUCCH PRB pairs. Indicates the number of PRB pairs used for PUCCH.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLASC: PPP
attribute.dependencies: Setting the attribute ppp to no value is possible together with setting the attributes pucchod, pcid1, pcid2, pcid3, pcid4, pcid5, pcid6, pcid7, pcid8 to no value in one commit.
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set and the attribute pucchod doesn't have value, then the value of the attribute pucchod is set to 0.

attribute.name: pcid1
attribute.description:
Indicates the 1st physical layer cell identity defined to shared spectrum central carrier.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLASC: PCID
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set and attributes ppp and pucchod don't have value, then the value of the attribute ppp is set to 2 and the value of the attribute pucchod is set to 0.

attribute.name: pcid8
attribute.description:
Indicates the 8th physical layer cell identity defined to shared spectrum central carrier.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLASC: PCID
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set and attributes ppp and pucchod don't have value, then the value of the attribute ppp is set to 2 and the value of the attribute pucchod is set to 0.

attribute.name: pcid2
attribute.description:
Indicates the 2nd physical layer cell identity defined to shared spectrum central carrier.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLASC: PCID
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set and attributes ppp and pucchod don't have value, then the value of the attribute ppp is set to 2 and the value of the attribute pucchod is set to 0.

attribute.name: pcid3
attribute.description:
Indicates the 3rd physical layer cell identity defined to shared spectrum central carrier.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLASC: PCID
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set and attributes ppp and pucchod don't have value, then the value of the attribute ppp is set to 2 and the value of the attribute pucchod is set to 0.

attribute.name: pcid4
attribute.description:
Indicates the 4th physical layer cell identity defined to shared spectrum central carrier.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLASC: PCID
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set and attributes ppp and pucchod don't have value, then the value of the attribute ppp is set to 2 and the value of the attribute pucchod is set to 0.

attribute.name: pcid5
attribute.description:
Indicates the 5th physical layer cell identity defined to shared spectrum central carrier.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLASC: PCID
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set and attributes ppp and pucchod don't have value, then the value of the attribute ppp is set to 2 and the value of the attribute pucchod is set to 0.

attribute.name: pcid6
attribute.description:
Indicates the 6th physical layer cell identity defined to shared spectrum central carrier.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLASC: PCID
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set and attributes ppp and pucchod don't have value, then the value of the attribute ppp is set to 2 and the value of the attribute pucchod is set to 0.

attribute.name: pcid7
attribute.description:
Indicates the 7th physical layer cell identity defined to shared spectrum central carrier.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RLASC: PCID
attribute.sideEffects: When this attribute is set and attributes ppp and pucchod don't have value, then the value of the attribute ppp is set to 2 and the value of the attribute pucchod is set to 0.

class.name: PmRecordingM
class.description: This MOC contains all BSC recording MOCs.

attribute.name: pmRecordingMId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying MO.

class.name: BaRecordingM
class.description: This MOC contains all BaRecording MOs.

attribute.name: baRecordingMId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

class.name: BaRecording
class.description:
Contains the data needed to configure the BA recording.
DurationTime attribute is mandatory at MO creation. ConnectedCells or recCSystype is mandatory at MO creation. It is possible to create 64 user defined MOs. Instance GENNAMEBAR64 is system defined and it is not possible to delete it. Instances of this MO disappears after CP restart.

attribute.name: baRecordingId
attribute.description:
Holds the name used when identifying the MO.
Values in format GENNAMEBARxx, where xx is a number from 00 to 64 are not allowed.
Depends on RABII: BARNAME

attribute.name: durationTime
attribute.description:
Recording duration.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system. Attribute durationTime is mandatory at MO creation.
Depends on RABRI: DTIME

attribute.name: currentState
attribute.description:
Active BA-list recording state.
The functionality Active BA-list Recording is active if the value of the attribute is RECORDING, CONFIG_BA_LISTS, or TERMINATION_ONGOING.
Depends on RABRP

attribute.name: baRecordingIndividual
attribute.description:
Active BA-list recording identity.
Depends on RABIE: RID

attribute.name: abssThr
attribute.description:
Absolute signal strength threshold.
Depends on RABDC: ABSS

attribute.name: connectedCells
attribute.description:
Specifies cells to which BaRecording MO is connected.
Depends on RABDC: CELL RABDP
attribute.dependencies: Cannot be set if attribute recCSysType is set to value ALL. Only cells with another system type than specified by attribute recCSysType are allowed. Cell should not be connected to other BaRecording.

attribute.name: ecnoAbssThr
attribute.description:
Absolute signal quality threshold.
Depends on RABDC: ECNOABSS

attribute.name: eRsrpAbssThr
attribute.description:
Absolute RSRP threshold.
Depends on RABDC: ERSRPABSS

attribute.name: numFreq
attribute.description:
Indicates the maximum number of ARFCNs.
Depends on RABDC: NUMFREQ

attribute.name: numUmfi
attribute.description:
Indicates the maximum number of TUMFIs.
Depends on RABDC: NUMUMFI

attribute.name: relssThr
attribute.description:
Relative signal strength threshold 1.
Depends on RABDC: RELSSP RELSSN

attribute.name: relss2Thr
attribute.description:
Relative signal strength threshold 2.
Depends on RABDC: RELSS2P RELSS2N

attribute.name: relss3Thr
attribute.description:
Relative signal strength threshold 3.
Depends on RABDC: RELSS3P RELSS3N

attribute.name: relss4Thr
attribute.description:
Relative signal strength threshold 4.
Depends on RABDC: RELSS4P RELSS4N

attribute.name: relss5Thr
attribute.description:
Relative signal strength threshold 5.
Depends on RABDC: RELSS5P RELSS5N

attribute.name: segTime
attribute.description:
Recording segment time.
Depends on RABDC: SEGTIME

attribute.name: tFddMrr
attribute.description:
Temporary multi-RAT reporting.
Depends on RABDC: TFDDMRR

attribute.name: tEarfcn
attribute.description:
Test E-UTRAN ARFCN.
Depends on RABDC: TEARFCN RABDE: TEARFCN

attribute.name: tEmrr
attribute.description:
Temporary multi-RAT reporting for E-UTRAN.
Depends on RABDC: TEMRR

attribute.name: tmBcchNo
attribute.description:
ARFCN for test measurement on BCCH.
1 - 124 (GSM 900, P-band) 128 - 251 (GSM 800) 512 - 885 (GSM 1800) 512 - 810 (GSM 1900) 975 - 1023, 0 (GSM 900, G1-band)
Depends on RABDC: TMBCCHNO

attribute.name: tMbcr
attribute.description:
Temporary multi band cells which are reported.
0 Reporting of the six strongest cells The MS reports the six strongest neighbor cells, with known and allowed National Color Code (NCC) part of Base Transceiver Station Identity Code (BSIC), irrespective of the band used.
1 Reporting of the strongest cell The MS reports the strongest cell, with known and allowed NCC part of BSIC in each of the frequency bands in the neighbor cell list, excluding the frequency band of the serving cell. The remaining positions in the measurement report are used for reporting of cells in the band of serving cell. If there are still remaining positions, these are used to report the next strongest identified neighbors in the other band irrespective of the band used.
2 Reporting of the two strongest cells The MS reports the two strongest cells, with known and allowed NCC part of BSIC in each of the frequency bands in the neighbor cell list, excluding the frequency band of the serving cell. The remaining positions in the measurement report are used for reporting of cells in the band of serving cell. If there are still remaining positions, these are used to report the next strongest identified neighbors in the other band irrespective of the band used.
3 Reporting of the three strongest cells The MS reports the three strongest cells, with known and allowed NCC part of BSIC in each of the frequency bands in the neighbor cell list, excluding the frequency band of the serving cell. The remaining positions in the measurement report are used for reporting of cells in the band of serving cell. If there are still remaining positions, these are used to report the next strongest identified neighbors in the other band irrespective of the band used.
Depends on RABDC: TMBCR

attribute.name: tNccPerm
attribute.description:
Temporary NCC is permitted.
Depends on RABDC: TNCCPERM

attribute.name: tUmfi
attribute.description:
Test UTRAN measurement frequency information.
Value is expressed as mfddarfcn-mscrcode-diversity, where:
mfddarfcn ARFCN for the UTRAN cell Numeral 0 - 16383 mscrcode Scrambling code Numeral 0 - 511 diversity Diversity DIV Diversity is applied for the UTRAN cell. NODIV Diversity is not applied for the UTRAN cell.
Depends on RABDC: TUMFI RABDE: TUMFI

attribute.name: recCSysType
attribute.description:
System type identifier.
Depends on RABDC: CSYSTYPE
attribute.dependencies: At least one cell within specified system type must be defined in the BSC.

attribute.name: nCellType
attribute.description:
Indicates the type of neighboring GSM cells.
Depends on RABDC: NCELLTYPE

attribute.name: nuCellType
attribute.description:
Indicates the type of neighboring UTRAN cells.
Depends on RABDC: NUCELLTYPE

attribute.name: reportResult
attribute.description:
Result of report order.
Depends on RABTI

attribute.name: termReason
attribute.description:
Recording termination reason.
Depends on RABRE: REASON

attribute.name: mrnicAtRecordingActivation
attribute.description:
Indicates if measurement results are interpreted correctly.
Depends on RABRI: MRNIC

attribute.name: startTime
attribute.description:
Start time of the recording GENNAMEBAR64.
This attribute shows start time of the recording GENNAMEBAR64 calculated for the current day. The duration time of the recording GENNAMEBAR64 is 3 hours.

attribute.name: arfcns
attribute.description:

Sets the ARFCN for the carrier frequencies for which interference measurements are made. Numeral 128 - 251 (GSM 800) Numeral 1 - 124 (GSM 900, P-band) Numeral 0, 975 - 1023 (GSM 900, G1-band) Numeral 512 - 810 (GSM 1900) Numeral 512 - 885 (GSM 1800)
Depends on RARDC: ARFCN

attribute.name: percVal
attribute.description:
Percentile value.
Depends on RARTI: PERCVAL

attribute.name: confResult
attribute.description:
Result of the recording configuration order.
Depends on RARCI

attribute.name: termReason
