Recording termination reason.
Depends on RARRE: REASON

class.name: MrRecordingM
class.description: This MOC contains all MrRecording MOs.

attribute.name: mrRecordingMId
attribute.description: Holds the name used when identifying the MO.

class.name: MrRecording
class.description:
Contains the data needed to configure the Measurement Result Recording.
DurationTime attribute is mandatory at MO creation. ConnectedCells or recCSysType is mandatory at MO creation. It is possible to create 10 user-defined MOs. Instances of this MO disappears after CP restart.
By the measType quantities: RXQUALLEV, RXQUALTA, RXLEVTA, RXLEVFER, FERTA, and the attribute measLink, it is possible to specify a combination of signal quality, signal strength, FER and timing advance to be considered for both uplink and downlink or uplink and downlink separately, when selecting the measurement results to be collected. A triggering value or values and a triggering criteria are specified by the attributes measInterval and measLimit. The value of the attribute measInterval relates to all single quantities: uplink, downlink, or both. Valid attribute combinations for measurement types specified by the attribute measType are:
RXQUALLEV: When measLink=UL: - measLimit must be given as [RXQUALUL, RXLEVUL] - Triggering Criteria is specified by the attribute measInterval When measLink=DL: - measLimit must be given as [RXQUALDL, RXLEVDL] -Triggering Criteria is specified by the attribute measInterval When measLink=BOTH: - measLimit must be given as [RXQUALUL, RXLEVUL, RXQUALDL, RXLEVDL] - Triggering Criteria is specified by the attribute measInterval
RXQUALTA: When measLink=UL: - measLimit must be given as [RXQUALUL, TAVAL] - Triggering Criteria is fulfilled when uplink signal quality is greater than or equal to the value of the attribute measLimit, and the timing advance is equal to or smaller than the value of the attribute measLimit When measLink=DL: - measLimit must be given as [RXQUALDL, TAVAL] - Triggering Criteria is fulfilled when downlink signal quality is greater than or equal to the value of the attribute measLimit, and the timing advance is equal to or smaller than the value of the attribute measLimit When measLink=BOTH: - measLimit must be given as [RXQUALUL, TAVAL, RXQUALDL] - Triggering Criteria is fulfilled when uplink signal quality is greater than or equal to the value of the attribute measLimit and the timing advance is equal to or smaller than the value of the attribute measLimit, or if the downlink signal quality is greater than or equal to the value of the attribute measLimit and the timing advance is equal to or smaller than the value of the attribute measLimit
RXLEVTA: When measLink=UL: - measLimit must be given as [RXLEVUL, TAVAL] - Triggering Criteria is specified by the attribute measInterval When measLink=DL: - measLimit must be given as [RXLEVDL, TAVAL] - Triggering Criteria is specified by the attribute measInterval When measLink=BOTH: - measLimit must be given as [RXLEVUL, TAVAL, RXLEVDL] - Triggering Criteria is specified by the attribute measInterval
RXLEVFER: When measLink=UL: - measLimit must be given as [RXLEVUL, FERUL] - Triggering Criteria is specified by the attribute measInterval When measLink=DL: - measLimit must be given as [RXLEVDL, FERDL] -Triggering Criteria is specified by the attribute measInterval When measLink=BOTH: - measLimit must be given as [RXLEVUL, FERUL, RXLEVDL, FERDL] - Triggering Criteria is specified by the attribute measInterval
FERTA: When measLink=UL: - measLimit must be given as [FERUL, TAVAL] - Triggering Criteria is fulfilled when FER uplink is greater than or equal to the value of the attribute measLimit, and the timing advance is equal to or smaller than the value of the attribute measLimit When measLink=DL: - measLimit must be given as [FERDL, TAVAL] - Triggering Criteria is fulfilled when FER downlink is greater than or equal to the value of the attribute measLimit, and the timing advance is equal to or smaller than the value of the attribute measLimit When measLink=BOTH: - measLimit must be given as [FERUL, TAVAL, FERDL] - Triggering Criteria is fulfilled when FER uplink is greater than or equal to the value of the attribute measLimit and the timing advance is equal to or smaller than the value of the attribute measLimit, or if the FER downlink is greater than or equal to the value of the attribute measLimit and the timing advance is equal to or smaller than the value of the attribute measLimit

attribute.name: mrRecordingId
attribute.description:
Holds the name used when identifying the MO.
Values in format GENNAMEMRRxx, where xx is a number from 00 to 09 are not allowed.
Depends on RAMII: MRRNAME

attribute.name: mrRecordingIndividual
attribute.description:
Measurement Result Recording identity.
Depends on RAMIE: RID

attribute.name: conType
attribute.description:
Type of connections to collect measurement results from.
The availability of the attribute value AMR-WB depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAMDC: CONTYPE

attribute.name: dtmFilter
attribute.description:
Specifies the filter for collecting measurement reports for the DTM connections.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAMDC: DTMFILTER

attribute.name: vamosFilter
attribute.description:
Specifies the filter for collecting measurement reports for the VAMOS connections.
The availability of attribute values depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAMDC: VAMOSFILTER

attribute.name: measType
attribute.description:
Specifies the type of quantity to be used when selecting the measurement results.
The availability of attribute values FERDL, FERTA, FERUL, and RXLEVFER depends on commercial agreements.
Depends on RAMDC: MEASTYPE

attribute.name: measInterval
attribute.description:
Measurement interval.
Depends on RAMDC: MEASINT
attribute.dependencies: It is not allowed to set this attribute if the attribute measType is set to value NOTYPE, RXQUALTA, or FERTA.

attribute.name: measLink
attribute.description:
Specifies the link that is considered when selecting the measurement results.
Depends on RAMDC: MEASLINK
attribute.dependencies: Attribute can be set only if the attribute measType is set to the value RXQUALLEV, RXLEVTA, RXQUALTA, RXLEVFER, or FERTA.

attribute.name: measLimit
attribute.description:
Measurement limit.
For unit, see 3GPP 48.008.
Depends on RAMDC: MEASLIM
attribute.dependencies: Attribute values and number of elements depend on the attributes measType and measLink. For valid attribute values combination, see MO description. If the attribute measType is set to the value RXLEVUL or RXLEVDL, the valid value range for the attribute measLimit is 0 – 63. If the attribute measType is set to the value RXQUALUL or RXQUALDL, the valid value range for the attribute measLimit is 0 – 7. If the attribute measType is set to the value TAVAL for ordinary cell, the valid value range for the attribute measLimit is 0 – 61. If the attribute measType is set to the value TAVAL for cell with extended range, the valid value range for the attribute measLimit is 0 – 219. If the attribute measType is set to the value PLDIFF, the valid value range for the attribute measLimit is 0 – 25. If the attribute measType is set to the value FERUL or FERDL, the valid value range for the attribute measLimit is 0 – 96. It is not allowed to set this attribute if the attribute measNegPathLossDiff is set.

attribute.name: recCSysType
attribute.description:
System type identifier.
If the value of the attribute is ALL, then all internal cells applied.
Depends on RAMDC: CSYSTYPE
attribute.dependencies: At least one cell must be specified within the selected attribute recCSysType.

attribute.name: connectedCells
attribute.description:
Specifies cells to which MrRecording MO is connected.
Depends on RAMDC: CELL RAMDP
attribute.dependencies: It is not possible to set this attribute if the attribute recCSysType is set to ALL. If the attribute recCSysType is specified, then cells within selected type are not allowed. Cells that are already connected to other MrRecording MO are not allowed.

attribute.name: durationTime
attribute.description:
Recording duration.
Attribute can be set to no value only by the system. The attribute durationTime is mandatory at MO creation.
Depends on RAMRI: DTIME

attribute.name: termReason
attribute.description:
Recording termination reason.
Depends on RAMRE: REASON

attribute.name: currentState
attribute.description:
Recording state.
Depends on RAMRP

attribute.name: reportResult
attribute.description:
Result of the report order.
Depends on RAMTI: RESULT

attribute.name: measNegPathLossDiff
attribute.description:
Negative measurement limit.
Depends on RAMDC: MEASLIMN
attribute.dependencies: Attribute can be set only if the attribute measType is set to the value PLDIFF. It is not allowed to set this attribute if the attribute measLimit is set.
